00517 //MOUSE_REGION          gShopKeeperCoverTacticalButtonMouseRegion;
00518 
00519 MOUSE_REGION            gArmsDealersFaceMouseRegions;
00520 void SelectArmsDealersFaceRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason );
00521 
00522 
00523 //Region to allow the user to drop items to the ground
00524 MOUSE_REGION            gArmsDealersDropItemToGroundMouseRegions;
00525 void SelectArmsDealersDropItemToGroundRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason );
00526 void SelectArmsDealersDropItemToGroundMovementRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason );
00527

00539 void              GetShopKeeperInterfaceUserInput();
00540 void              DestroySkiInventorySlotMouseRegions( );
00541 void              CreateSkiInventorySlotMouseRegions( );
00542 void              InitializeShopKeeper( BOOLEAN fResetPage );
00543 void              CalculateFirstItemIndexOnPage( );
00544 void              DisplayArmsDealerCurrentInventoryPage( );
00545 BOOLEAN           DetermineArmsDealersSellingInventory( );
00546 void              StoreObjectsInNextFreeDealerInvSlot( UINT16 usItemIndex, SPECIAL_ITEM_INFO *pSpclItemInfo, INT16 sSpecialItemElement, UINT8 ubHowMany, UINT8 ubOwner );
00547 void              AddItemsToTempDealerInventory(UINT16 usItemIndex, SPECIAL_ITEM_INFO *pSpclItemInfo, INT16 sSpecialItemElement, UINT8 ubHowMany, UINT8 ubOwner );
00548 BOOLEAN           RepairIsDone(UINT16 usItemIndex, UINT8 ubElement);
00549 
00550 UINT32            DisplayInvSlot( UINT8 ubSlotNum, UINT16 usItemIndex, UINT16 usPosX, UINT16 usPosY, OBJECTTYPE   *ItemObject, BOOLEAN fHatchedOut, UINT8   ubItemArea );
00551 void              DisplayArmsDealerOfferArea();

00553 BOOLEAN           RemoveItemFromArmsDealerOfferArea( INT8   bSlotId, BOOLEAN fKeepItem );
00554 void              SetSkiRegionHelpText( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT *pInv, MOUSE_REGION* pRegion, UINT8 ubScreenArea );
00555 void              SetSkiFaceRegionHelpText( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT *pInv, MOUSE_REGION* pRegion, UINT8 ubScreenArea );
00556 void              RestoreTacticalBackGround();

00558 UINT32            CalcShopKeeperItemPrice( BOOLEAN fDealerSelling, BOOLEAN fUnitPriceOnly, UINT16 usItemID, FLOAT dModifier, OBJECTTYPE   *pItemObject );
00559 FLOAT             ItemConditionModifier(UINT16 usItemIndex, INT16 bStatus);
00560 BOOLEAN           RemoveItemFromPlayersOfferArea( INT8 bSlotIdInOtherLocation );

00674 
00675 //ppp
00676 
00677 
00678 
00679 //
00680 // screen handler functions
00681 //
00682 
00683 UINT32      ShopKeeperScreenInit()
00684 {
00685       //Set so next time we come in, we can set up
00686       gfSKIScreenEntry = TRUE;
00687 
00688 
00689       return( TRUE );
00690 }
00691 
00692 
00693 UINT32      ShopKeeperScreenHandle()
00694 {
00695       StartFrameBufferRender();
00696 
00697       if( gfSKIScreenEntry )
00698       {
00699             PauseGame();
00700 
00701             if( !EnterShopKeeperInterface() )
00702             {
00703                   gfSKIScreenExit = TRUE;
00704                   EnterTacticalScreen( );
00705 
00706                   return( SHOPKEEPER_SCREEN );
00707             }
00708             else
00709             {
00710                   gfSKIScreenEntry = FALSE;
00711                   gfSKIScreenExit = FALSE;
00712             }
00713             gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
00714             gfRenderScreenOnNextLoop = TRUE;
00715 
00716             InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00717       }
00718 
00719       if( gfRenderScreenOnNextLoop )
00720             gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
00721 
00722       RestoreBackgroundRects();
00723 
00724       GetShopKeeperInterfaceUserInput();
00725 
00726 
00727       // Check for any newly added items...
00728       if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->fCheckForNewlyAddedItems )
00729       {
00730             // Startup any newly added items....
00731             CheckForAnyNewlyAddedItems( gpSMCurrentMerc );
00732             gpSMCurrentMerc->fCheckForNewlyAddedItems = FALSE;
00733       }
00734       
00735 
00736       HandleShopKeeperInterface();
00737 
00738 
00739       if( gubSkiDirtyLevel == SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2 )
00740       {
00741             RenderShopKeeperInterface();
00742 
00743             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
00744 
00745             gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL0;
00746       }
00747       else if( gubSkiDirtyLevel == SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL1 )
00748       {
00749             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
00750 
00751             gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL0;
00752       }
00753 
00754       // render buttons marked dirty      
00755 //ATM:
00756       DisableSMPpanelButtonsWhenInShopKeeperInterface( FALSE );
00757       RenderButtons( ); 
00758 
00759       // render help
00760       SaveBackgroundRects( );
00761       RenderButtonsFastHelp( );
00762 
00763       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
00764       EndFrameBufferRender();
00765 
00766       if( gfSKIScreenExit )
00767       {
00768             ExitShopKeeperInterface();
00769             gfSKIScreenExit = FALSE;
00770             gfSKIScreenEntry = TRUE;
00771             EnterTacticalScreen( );
00772             UnPauseGame();
00773       }
00774 
00775       if ( gfDisplayNoRoomMsg )
00776       {
00777             // tell player there's not enough room in the player's offer area
00778             // ARM: message is delayed because we need the mouse restriction to be in place BEFORE it comes up so it gets lifted/restored
00779             DoSkiMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (STR16)SKI_Text[ SKI_TEXT_NO_MORE_ROOM_IN_PLAYER_OFFER_AREA ], SHOPKEEPER_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00780 
00781             gfDisplayNoRoomMsg = FALSE;
00782       }
00783 
00784 
00785       return( SHOPKEEPER_SCREEN );
00786 }
00787 
00788 
00789 
00790 UINT32      ShopKeeperScreenShutdown()
00791 {
00792       ShutDownArmsDealers();
00793 
00794       return( TRUE );
00795 }
00796 
00797 
00798 
00799 
00800 
00801 //
00802 // 
00803 // 
00804 
00805 
00806 
00807 
00808 
00809 BOOLEAN EnterShopKeeperInterface()
00810 {
00811       VOBJECT_DESC            VObjectDesc;
00812       UINT8                               ubCnt;
00813       CHAR8                               zTemp[32];
00814       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
00815       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
00816 
00817 
00818       // make sure current merc is close enough and eligible to talk to the shopkeeper.
00819       AssertMsg( CanMercInteractWithSelectedShopkeeper( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] ), "Selected merc can't interact with shopkeeper.  Send save AM-1");
00820 
00821       // Create a video surface to blt corner of the tactical screen that still shines through
00822       vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00823       vs_desc.usWidth = SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_WIDTH;
00824       vs_desc.usHeight = SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_HEIGHT;
00825       vs_desc.ubBitDepth = 16;
00826       if( !AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &guiCornerWhereTacticalIsStillSeenImage) )
00827       {
00828             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00829                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Failed to create Surface where tactical map shows through" );
00830             #endif
00831 
00832             return( FALSE );
00833       }
00834 
00835 
00836       //Clear out all the save background rects
00837       EmptyBackgroundRects( );
00838 
00839       // WANNE 2
00840       ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT - INV_INTERFACE_HEIGHT );
00841 
00842       if( gfExitSKIDueToMessageBox )
00843       {
00844             gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
00845             gfExitSKIDueToMessageBox = FALSE;
00846       }
00847 
00848       //Check to make sure the inventory is null ( should always be null if we are just coming in to the SKI )
00849       Assert( gpTempDealersInventory == NULL );
00850 
00851       //Reinitialize the team panel to be the SM panel
00852       SetCurrentInterfacePanel( SM_PANEL );
00853       SetCurrentTacticalPanelCurrentMerc( (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier );
00854       SetSMPanelCurrentMerc( (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier );
00855 
00856       // load the Main trade screen backgroiund image
00857       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00858       FilenameForBPP("InterFace\\TradeScreen.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00859       if( !AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMainTradeScreenImage ))
00860       {
00861 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00862             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Failed to load TradeScreen.sti" );
00863 #endif
00864 
00865             return( FALSE );
00866       }
00867 
00868 
00869       // load the Main trade screen background image
00870       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00871       FilenameForBPP("InterFace\\itemcrossout.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00872       if( !AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiItemCrossOut ))
00873       {
00874 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00875             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Failed to load itemcrossout.sti" );
00876 #endif
00877             return( FALSE );
00878       }
00879 
00880 
00881       
00882 /*
00883 ATM:
00884       // load the Main trade screen backgroiund image
00885       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00886       FilenameForBPP("InterFace\\TradeScreenAtm.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00887       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiSkiAtmImage ));
00888 */
00889 
00890       //Create an array of all mercs (anywhere!) currently in the player's employ, and load their small faces
00891       // This is to support showing of repair item owner's faces even when they're not in the sector, as long as they still work for player
00892       gubNumberMercsInArray = 0;
00893       for( ubCnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; ubCnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; ubCnt++ )
00894       {
00895             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubCnt ];
00896 
00897             if( pSoldier->bActive && ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE ) &&
00898                   !(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
00899             {
00900                   // remember whose face is in this slot
00901                   gubArrayOfEmployedMercs[ gubNumberMercsInArray ] = pSoldier->ubProfile;
00902 
00903                   //Create the string for the face file name
00904                   sprintf( zTemp, "FACES\\33FACE\\%02d.sti", gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubFaceIndex );
00905 
00906                   //While we are at it, add their small face
00907                   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00908                   FilenameForBPP( zTemp, VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00909                   if(!AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiSmallSoldiersFace[ gubNumberMercsInArray ] ))
00910                   {
00911                         #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00912                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Failed to load %s", zTemp );
00913                         #endif
00914                         return( FALSE );
00915                   }
00916 
00917                   gubNumberMercsInArray++;
00918             }
00919       }
00920 
00921       //Load the graphic for the arrow button
00922       guiSKI_InvPageUpButtonImage = LoadButtonImage("INTERFACE\\TradeScrollArrows.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00923       guiSKI_InvPageDownButtonImage = UseLoadedButtonImage( guiSKI_InvPageUpButtonImage, -1,2,-1,3,-1 );
00924 
00925 
00926       //Page up button for the merchant inventory
00927       guiSKI_InvPageUpButton = QuickCreateButton( guiSKI_InvPageUpButtonImage, SKI_PAGE_UP_ARROWS_X, SKI_PAGE_UP_ARROWS_Y,
00928                                                             BUTTON_NEWTOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00929                                                             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnSKI_InvPageUpButtonCallback );
00930       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiSKI_InvPageUpButton, DISABLED_STYLE_HATCHED );
00931 
00932       //Page down button for the merchant inventory
00933       guiSKI_InvPageDownButton = QuickCreateButton( guiSKI_InvPageDownButtonImage, SKI_PAGE_DOWN_ARROWS_X, SKI_PAGE_DOWN_ARROWS_Y,
00934                                                             BUTTON_NEWTOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00935                                                             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnSKI_InvPageDownButtonCallback );
00936       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiSKI_InvPageDownButton, DISABLED_STYLE_HATCHED );
00937 
00938 
00939 
00940 //Evaluate:
00941       //    guiSKI_EvaluateButtonImage = LoadButtonImage("INTERFACE\\TradeButtons.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00942 //    guiSKI_TransactionButtonImage = UseLoadedButtonImage( guiSKI_EvaluateButtonImage, -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00943       guiSKI_TransactionButtonImage = LoadButtonImage("INTERFACE\\TradeButtons.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00944       guiSKI_DoneButtonImage = UseLoadedButtonImage( guiSKI_TransactionButtonImage, -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00945 
00946 /*
00947 //Evaluate:
00948       //Evaluate button
00949       guiSKI_EvaluateButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiSKI_EvaluateButtonImage, SKI_Text[SKI_TEXT_EVALUATE], SKI_BUTTON_FONT, 
00950                                                                                SKI_BUTTON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00951                                                                                SKI_BUTTON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00952                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00953                                                                                SKI_EVALUATE_BUTTON_X, SKI_EVALUATE_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00954                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnSKI_EvaluateButtonCallback);
00955       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiSKI_EvaluateButton, DISABLED_STYLE_HATCHED );
00956 */
00957 
00958       //Transaction button
00959       guiSKI_TransactionButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiSKI_TransactionButtonImage, SKI_Text[SKI_TEXT_TRANSACTION], SKI_BUTTON_FONT, 
00960                                                                                SKI_BUTTON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00961                                                                                SKI_BUTTON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00962                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00963                                                                                SKI_TRANSACTION_BUTTON_X, SKI_TRANSACTION_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00964                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnSKI_TransactionButtonCallback);
00965       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiSKI_TransactionButton, DISABLED_STYLE_HATCHED );
00966 
00967       //if the dealer repairs, use the repair fast help text for the transaction button
00968       if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
00969             SetButtonFastHelpText( guiSKI_TransactionButton, SkiMessageBoxText[ SKI_REPAIR_TRANSACTION_BUTTON_HELP_TEXT ] );
00970       else
00971             SetButtonFastHelpText( guiSKI_TransactionButton, SkiMessageBoxText[ SKI_TRANSACTION_BUTTON_HELP_TEXT ] );
00972 
00973 
00974       //Done button
00975       guiSKI_DoneButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiSKI_DoneButtonImage, SKI_Text[SKI_TEXT_DONE], SKI_BUTTON_FONT, 
00976                                                                                SKI_BUTTON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00977                                                                                SKI_BUTTON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00978                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00979                                                                                SKI_DONE_BUTTON_X, SKI_DONE_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+10,
00980                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnSKI_DoneButtonCallback);
00981       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiSKI_DoneButton, DISABLED_STYLE_HATCHED );
00982       SetButtonFastHelpText( guiSKI_DoneButton, SkiMessageBoxText[ SKI_DONE_BUTTON_HELP_TEXT ] );
00983 
00984 
00985       //Blanket the entire screen
00986       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSKI_EntireScreenMouseRegions, 0, 0, (SCREEN_WIDTH - 1), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - INV_INTERFACE_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH-2,
00987                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK); 
00988       MSYS_AddRegion( &gSKI_EntireScreenMouseRegions );
00989 
00990 
00991 
00992 
00993 /*
00994 //ATM:
00995       //Blanket the tactical buttons where the ATM will go
00996       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gShopKeeperCoverTacticalButtonMouseRegion, SKI_ATM_PANEL_X, SKI_ATM_PANEL_Y, (UINT16)(SKI_ATM_PANEL_X+SKI_ATM_PANEL_WIDTH), (UINT16)(SKI_ATM_PANEL_Y+SKI_ATM_PANEL_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH-1,
00997                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK); 
00998       MSYS_AddRegion( &gSKI_EntireScreenMouseRegions );
00999 */
01000 
01001       //Create the mouse regions for the inventory slot
01002       CreateSkiInventorySlotMouseRegions( );
01003 
01004 
01005 
01006       //Create the mouse region to limit the movement of the item cursos
01007       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSkiInventoryMovementAreaMouseRegions, SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_X, SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_Y, (UINT16)(SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_X+SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_WIDTH), (UINT16)(SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_Y+SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH-1,
01008                         CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK ); //SelectSkiInventoryMovementAreaRegionCallBack
01009       MSYS_AddRegion( &gSkiInventoryMovementAreaMouseRegions );
01010 
01011       //Disable the region that limits the movement of the cursor with the item
01012       MSYS_DisableRegion( &gSkiInventoryMovementAreaMouseRegions );
01013 
01014 
01015       //Create the mouse region for the shopkeeper's face
01016       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gArmsDealersFaceMouseRegions, SKI_FACE_X, SKI_FACE_Y, (UINT16)(SKI_FACE_X+SKI_FACE_WIDTH), (UINT16)(SKI_FACE_Y+SKI_FACE_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH-1,
01017                         CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectArmsDealersFaceRegionCallBack );
01018       MSYS_AddRegion( &gArmsDealersFaceMouseRegions );
01019 
01020 
01021       //Create the atm button
01022 //ATM:
01023       //    CreateSkiAtmButtons();
01024 
01025       memset( ArmsDealerOfferArea, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) * SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS );
01026       memset( PlayersOfferArea, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) * SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS );
01027 
01028 
01029       if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
01030       {
01031             HandlePossibleRepairDelays();
01032       }
01033 
01034 
01035       //Setup the currently selected arms dealer
01036       InitializeShopKeeper( TRUE );
01037 
01038       
01039 
01040 
01041       //Set the flag indicating that we are in the shop keeper interface
01042       guiTacticalInterfaceFlags |= INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE;
01043 
01044       memset( &gMoveingItem, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
01045 
01046       memset( &gfCommonQuoteUsedThisSession, FALSE, sizeof( gfCommonQuoteUsedThisSession ) );
01047 
01048       //Init the shopkeepers face
01049       InitShopKeepersFace( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubShopKeeperID );
01050 
01051       gfDoneBusinessThisSession = FALSE;
01052 
01053       //Call this to set the fact that we just entered the screen
01054       HandleShopKeeperDialog( 1 );
01055 
01056       ResetAllQuoteSaidFlags();
01057 
01058       //Reset the highlighted item pointer;
01059       gpHighLightedItemObject = NULL;
01060 
01061       //Reset
01062       gfRemindedPlayerToPickUpHisStuff = FALSE;
01063       gfUserHasRequestedToLeave = FALSE;
01064       gubCurrentSkiAtmMode = SKI_ATM_DISABLED_MODE;
01065       gfDisplayNoRoomMsg = FALSE;
01066 
01067       //Disable the map radar region
01068       MSYS_DisableRegion(&gRadarRegion);
01069 
01070       gfDoEvaluationAfterOpening = FALSE;
01071 
01072       if( gItemToAdd.fActive )
01073       {
01074             BOOLEAN fAddedOK = FALSE;
01075             INT8 bSlotNum = gItemToAdd.bPreviousInvPos;
01076 
01077             //if this is NOT a repair dealer or he is is but there is enough space in the player's offer area
01078             // (you can't be out of space if it isn't a repairman, only they can fill it up with repaired items!)
01079             if( ( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer != ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS ) ||
01080                         ( CountNumberOfItemsInThePlayersOfferArea( ) < SKI_NUM_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_SLOTS ) )
01081             {
01082                   // if we're supposed to store the original pocket #, but that pocket still holds more of these
01083                   if ( ( bSlotNum != -1 ) && ( gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ bSlotNum ].ubNumberOfObjects > 0 ) )
01084                   {
01085                         // then we can't store the pocket #, because our system can't return stacked objects
01086                         bSlotNum = -1;
01087                   }
01088 
01089                   if ( OfferObjectToDealer( &(gItemToAdd.ItemObject), gpSMCurrentMerc->ubProfile, bSlotNum ) )
01090                   {
01091                         fAddedOK = TRUE;
01092                   }
01093             }
01094 
01095             if ( fAddedOK )
01096             {
01097                   // evaluate it
01098                   gfDoEvaluationAfterOpening = TRUE;
01099             }
01100             else
01101             {
01102                   //add the item back to the current PC into the slot it came from
01103                   CopyObj( &gItemToAdd.ItemObject, &Menptr[ gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID ].inv[ gItemToAdd.bPreviousInvPos ] );
01104             }
01105 
01106             //Clear the contents of the structure
01107             memset( &gItemToAdd, 0, sizeof( ITEM_TO_ADD_AFTER_SKI_OPEN ) );
01108             gItemToAdd.fActive = FALSE;
01109       }
01110 
01111       // Dirty the bottom panel
01112       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
01113 
01114 
01115       gfDealerHasSaidTheEvaluateQuoteOnceThisSession = FALSE;
01116       guiRandomQuoteDelayTime = SKI_DEALERS_RANDOM_QUOTE_DELAY;
01117 
01118       pShopKeeperItemDescObject = NULL;
01119 
01120 
01121 //Region to allow the user to drop items to the ground
01122       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gArmsDealersDropItemToGroundMouseRegions, SKI_DROP_ITEM_TO_GROUND_START_X, SKI_DROP_ITEM_TO_GROUND_START_Y, SCREEN_WIDTH - 1, SCREEN_HEIGHT - INV_INTERFACE_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
01123                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, SelectArmsDealersDropItemToGroundMovementRegionCallBack, SelectArmsDealersDropItemToGroundRegionCallBack ); 
01124 //                                   CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectArmsDealersDropItemToGroundRegionCallBack ); 
01125       MSYS_AddRegion( &gArmsDealersDropItemToGroundMouseRegions );
01126 
01127       gfSkiDisplayDropItemToGroundText = FALSE;
01128 
01129       // by default re-enable calls to PerformTransaction()
01130       gfPerformTransactionInProgress = FALSE;
01131 
01132       return( TRUE );
01133 }
01134 
01135 
01136 BOOLEAN InitShopKeepersFace( UINT8 ubMercID )
01137 {
01138       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubShopKeeperID, FALSE );
01139 
01140       if( pSoldier == NULL )
01141       {
01142             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01143                   //Create the facial index
01144                   giShopKeeperFaceIndex = InitFace( ubMercID, NOBODY, FACE_BIGFACE );
01145             #else
01146                   return( FALSE );
01147             #endif
01148       }
01149       else
01150       {
01151             //Create the facial index
01152             giShopKeeperFaceIndex = InitFace( ubMercID, pSoldier->ubID, FACE_BIGFACE );
01153       }
01154 
01155 
01156       SetAutoFaceActive( FRAME_BUFFER, FACE_AUTO_RESTORE_BUFFER, giShopKeeperFaceIndex, SKI_FACE_X, SKI_FACE_Y );
01157 
01158       //Set it so the face cannot be set InActive
01159       gFacesData[ giShopKeeperFaceIndex ].uiFlags |= FACE_INACTIVE_HANDLED_ELSEWHERE;
01160 
01161 
01162       RenderAutoFace( giShopKeeperFaceIndex );
01163 
01164       return(TRUE);
01165 }
01166 
01167 
01168 BOOLEAN ExitShopKeeperInterface()
01169 {
01170       UINT8 ubCnt;
01171 
01172       if( gfExitSKIDueToMessageBox )
01173       {
01174             gfSKIScreenExit = FALSE;
01175 
01176 //          gfExitSKIDueToMessageBox = FALSE;
01177       }
01178 
01179       if( InItemDescriptionBox( ) && pShopKeeperItemDescObject != NULL )
01180       {
01181             DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
01182       }
01183 
01184       FreeMouseCursor();
01185 
01186       //Delete the main shopkeep background
01187       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiMainTradeScreenImage );
01188       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiItemCrossOut );
01189       DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( guiCornerWhereTacticalIsStillSeenImage );
01190 
01191       ShutUpShopKeeper();
01192 
01193       //Delete the Atm backgorund
01194 //ATM:
01195 //    DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSkiAtmImage );
01196 
01197       UnloadButtonImage( guiSKI_InvPageUpButtonImage );
01198       UnloadButtonImage( guiSKI_InvPageDownButtonImage );
01199 
01200       UnloadButtonImage( guiSKI_TransactionButtonImage );
01201       //    UnloadButtonImage( guiSKI_EvaluateButtonImage );
01202       UnloadButtonImage( guiSKI_DoneButtonImage );
01203 
01204       //loop through the area and delete small faces
01205       for(ubCnt=0; ubCnt<gubNumberMercsInArray; ubCnt++)
01206       {
01207             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSmallSoldiersFace[ ubCnt ] );
01208       }
01209 
01210       RemoveButton( guiSKI_InvPageUpButton );
01211       RemoveButton( guiSKI_InvPageDownButton );
01212 
01213 //Evaluate:
01214       //    RemoveButton( guiSKI_EvaluateButton );
01215       RemoveButton( guiSKI_TransactionButton );
01216       RemoveButton( guiSKI_DoneButton );
01217 
01218       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSKI_EntireScreenMouseRegions);
01219 
01220       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSkiInventoryMovementAreaMouseRegions );
01221 
01222 //ATM:
01223 //    MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gShopKeeperCoverTacticalButtonMouseRegion );
01224 
01225       //Remove the region for the face
01226       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gArmsDealersFaceMouseRegions );
01227 
01228       //Remove the Atm buttons
01229 //ATM:
01230       //    RemoveSkiAtmButtons();
01231 
01232 
01233       //Region to allow the user to drop items to the ground
01234       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gArmsDealersDropItemToGroundMouseRegions );
01235 
01236       //Destroy the mouse regions for the inventory slots
01237       DestroySkiInventorySlotMouseRegions( );
01238 
01239       //if there is a temp inventory array, destroy it
01240       if( gpTempDealersInventory )
01241       {
01242             MemFree( gpTempDealersInventory );
01243             gpTempDealersInventory = NULL;
01244       }
01245 
01246       //Set the flag indicating that we are NOT in the shop keeper interface
01247       guiTacticalInterfaceFlags &= ~INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE;
01248 
01249       //if there is a subtitles box up, remove it
01250       RemoveShopKeeperSubTitledText();
01251 
01252       //Get rid of the ShopKeeper face
01253       DeleteFace( giShopKeeperFaceIndex );
01254 
01255       //Enable the map region
01256       MSYS_EnableRegion(&gRadarRegion);
01257 
01258       gfSMDisableForItems = FALSE;
01259 
01260       return( TRUE );
01261 }
01262 
01263 
01264 
01265 void HandleShopKeeperInterface()
01266 {
01267       UINT8 ubStatusOfSkiRenderDirtyFlag = gubSkiDirtyLevel;
01268 
01269       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01270 
01271 
01272       //if we are in the item desc panel, disable the buttons
01273       if( InItemDescriptionBox( ) && pShopKeeperItemDescObject != NULL )
01274       {
01275             DisableSMPpanelButtonsWhenInShopKeeperInterface( FALSE );
01276             DisableButton( guiSKI_InvPageUpButton );
01277             DisableButton( guiSKI_InvPageDownButton );
01278             DisableButton( guiSKI_TransactionButton );
01279             DisableButton( guiSKI_DoneButton );
01280 
01281             //make sure the buttons dont render
01282 //          ButtonList[ guiSKI_InvPageUpButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
01283 //          ButtonList[ guiSKI_InvPageDownButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
01284             ButtonList[ guiSKI_TransactionButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
01285             ButtonList[ guiSKI_DoneButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
01286 
01287 
01288             // make sure the shop keeper doesn't start talking ( reset the timing variable )
01289             HandleShopKeeperDialog( 2 );
01290 
01291             return;
01292       }
01293 
01294 
01295       if( gubSkiDirtyLevel == SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2 )
01296       {
01297             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
01298       }
01299 
01300       RenderTacticalInterface( );
01301 
01302       if ( InItemStackPopup( ) )
01303       {
01304             if ( fInterfacePanelDirty == DIRTYLEVEL2 )
01305             {
01306                   RenderItemStackPopup( TRUE );
01307             }
01308             else
01309             {
01310                   RenderItemStackPopup( FALSE );
01311             }
01312       }
01313 
01314       // handle check if enough on the table
01315       HandleCheckIfEnoughOnTheTable( );
01316       
01317       // Render view window
01318       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
01319       RenderRadarScreen( );
01320 
01321       if( fInterfacePanelDirty == DIRTYLEVEL2 )
01322       {
01323             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL0;
01324       }
01325 
01326       RenderClock( CLOCK_X, CLOCK_Y );
01327       RenderTownIDString( );
01328 
01329 //ATM:
01330 //    RenderSkiAtmPanel();
01331 
01332       DisplayTalkingArmsDealer();
01333 
01334 
01335       DisplayArmsDealerCurrentInventoryPage( );
01336 
01337       DisplayArmsDealerOfferArea();
01338 
01339       DisplayPlayersOfferArea();
01340 
01341       EnableDisableEvaluateAndTransactionButtons();
01342 
01343       MarkButtonsDirty( );
01344 
01345       if( gfDoEvaluationAfterOpening )
01346       {
01347             BOOLEAN fFirstOne = TRUE;
01348 
01349             gfDoEvaluationAfterOpening = FALSE;
01350             
01351             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; iCounter++ )
01352             {
01353                   if( PlayersOfferArea[ iCounter ].fActive )
01354                   {
01355                         EvaluateItemAddedToPlayersOfferArea( ( INT8 ) iCounter, fFirstOne );
01356                         fFirstOne = FALSE;
01357                   }
01358             }
01359 
01360             gfAlreadySaidTooMuchToRepair = FALSE;
01361       }
01362 
01363 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01364       if ( gfTestDisplayDealerCash )
01365             DisplayAllDealersCash();
01366 #endif
01367 
01368       //if the Ski dirty flag was changed to a lower value, make sure it is set properly
01369       if( ubStatusOfSkiRenderDirtyFlag > gubSkiDirtyLevel )
01370             gubSkiDirtyLevel = ubStatusOfSkiRenderDirtyFlag;
01371 
01372       //if the merc is talking and there is an item currently being highlighted
01373       // ( this gets rid of the item burning through the dealers text box )
01374       if( gfIsTheShopKeeperTalking )
01375             if( gpHighLightedItemObject != NULL || gubSkiDirtyLevel != SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL0 )
01376                   RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( giPopUpBoxId, gusPositionOfSubTitlesX, SKI_POSITION_SUBTITLES_Y, FRAME_BUFFER);
01377 
01378 
01379       //if we are to display the drop item to ground text
01380       if( gfSkiDisplayDropItemToGroundText )
01381       {
01382             DisplayTheSkiDropItemToGroundString();
01383       }
01384 }
01385 
01386 
01387 BOOLEAN RenderShopKeeperInterface()
01388 {
01389       HVOBJECT    hPixHandle;
01390       CHAR16      zMoney[128];
01391       HVSURFACE hDestVSurface, hSrcVSurface;
01392       SGPRect           SrcRect;
01393 
01394 
01395       if( InItemDescriptionBox( ) && pShopKeeperItemDescObject != NULL )
01396       {
01397             return( TRUE );
01398       }
01399 
01400 
01401 //    RenderSMPanel( &fDirty );
01402 
01403 //    RenderTacticalInterface( );
01404       // Render view window
01405 //    RenderRadarScreen( );
01406 
01407       //Get the main background screen graphic and blt it
01408       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiMainTradeScreenImage );
01409       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,SKI_MAIN_BACKGROUND_X, SKI_MAIN_BACKGROUND_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01410 
01411       //Display the Title 
01412       DrawTextToScreen( SKI_Text[ SKI_TEXT_MERCHADISE_IN_STOCK ], SKI_MAIN_TITLE_X, SKI_MAIN_TITLE_Y, SKI_MAIN_TITLE_WIDTH, SKI_TITLE_FONT, SKI_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );  
01413 
01414       //if the dealer repairs
01415       if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
01416       {
01417             //Display the Repair cost text            
01418             DisplayWrappedString( SKI_TOTAL_COST_X, SKI_TOTAL_COST_Y, SKI_TOTAL_COST_WIDTH, 2, SKI_LABEL_FONT, SKI_TITLE_COLOR, SKI_Text[ SKI_TEXT_REPAIR_COST ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
01419       }
01420       else
01421       {
01422             //Display the Total cost text
01423             DisplayWrappedString( SKI_TOTAL_COST_X, SKI_TOTAL_COST_Y, SKI_TOTAL_COST_WIDTH, 2, SKI_LABEL_FONT, SKI_TITLE_COLOR, SKI_Text[ SKI_TEXT_TOTAL_COST ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
01424       }
01425 
01426       //Display the total value text
01427       DisplayWrappedString( SKI_TOTAL_VALUE_X, SKI_TOTAL_VALUE_Y, SKI_TOTAL_VALUE_WIDTH, 2, SKI_LABEL_FONT, SKI_TITLE_COLOR, SKI_Text[ SKI_TEXT_TOTAL_VALUE ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
01428 
01429 
01430       //Display the players current balance text
01431       DisplayWrappedString( SKI_PLAYERS_CURRENT_BALANCE_X, SKI_PLAYERS_CURRENT_BALANCE_Y, SKI_PLAYERS_CURRENT_BALANCE_WIDTH, 2, SKI_LABEL_FONT, SKI_TITLE_COLOR, SkiMessageBoxText[ SKI_PLAYERS_CURRENT_BALANCE ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
01432 
01433       //Display the players current balance value
01434       swprintf( zMoney, L"%d", LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance );
01435 
01436       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( zMoney );
01437       InsertDollarSignInToString( zMoney );
01438       DrawTextToScreen( zMoney, SKI_PLAYERS_CURRENT_BALANCE_X, SKI_PLAYERS_CURRENT_BALANCE_OFFSET_TO_VALUE, SKI_PLAYERS_CURRENT_BALANCE_WIDTH, FONT10ARIAL, SKI_ITEM_PRICE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, TRUE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
01439 
01440       BlitBufferToBuffer( guiRENDERBUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_X, SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_HEIGHT );
01441 
01442       //At this point the background is pure, copy it to the save buffer
01443       if( gfRenderScreenOnNextLoop )
01444       {
01445       //    BlitBufferToBuffer( guiRENDERBUFFER, guiCornerWhereTacticalIsStillSeenImage, SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_X, SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_Y, SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_WIDTH, SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_HEIGHT );
01446             GetVideoSurface( &hDestVSurface, guiCornerWhereTacticalIsStillSeenImage );
01447             GetVideoSurface( &hSrcVSurface, guiSAVEBUFFER );
01448 
01449             SrcRect.iLeft = SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_X;
01450             SrcRect.iTop = SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_Y;
01451             SrcRect.iRight = SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_X + SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_WIDTH;
01452             SrcRect.iBottom = SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_Y + SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_HEIGHT;
01453 
01454             BltVSurfaceUsingDD( hDestVSurface, hSrcVSurface, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_X, SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_Y, (RECT*)&SrcRect );
01455 
01456             gfRenderScreenOnNextLoop = FALSE;
01457       }
01458 
01459       DisplayArmsDealerCurrentInventoryPage( );
01460 
01461       DisplayArmsDealerOfferArea();
01462 
01463       DisplayPlayersOfferArea();
01464 
01465       //if the merc is talking and the screen has been dirtied
01466       if( gfIsTheShopKeeperTalking )
01467             RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( giPopUpBoxId, gusPositionOfSubTitlesX, SKI_POSITION_SUBTITLES_Y, FRAME_BUFFER);
01468 
01469       CrossOutUnwantedItems( );
01470 
01471       //Render the clock and the town name
01472       RenderClock( CLOCK_X, CLOCK_Y );
01473       RenderTownIDString( );
01474 
01475 //    RenderTacticalInterface( );
01476 //    RenderSMPanel( &fDirty );
01477 
01478       //Restore the tactical background that is visble behind the SKI panel
01479       RestoreTacticalBackGround();
01480 
01481       InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
01482 
01483       return( TRUE );
01484 }
01485 
01486 void RestoreTacticalBackGround()
01487 {
01488       HVSURFACE hDestVSurface, hSrcVSurface;
01489       SGPRect           SrcRect;
01490 
01491       GetVideoSurface( &hDestVSurface, guiRENDERBUFFER );
01492       GetVideoSurface( &hSrcVSurface, guiCornerWhereTacticalIsStillSeenImage );
01493 
01494       
01495       // WANNE 2
01496       // Top
01497       SrcRect.iLeft = SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_X; //0;
01498       SrcRect.iTop = SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_Y; //0;
01499       SrcRect.iRight = SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_WIDTH;       //SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_WIDTH;
01500       SrcRect.iBottom = SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_HEIGHT;     //SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_HEIGHT;
01501 
01502       BltVSurfaceUsingDD( hDestVSurface, hSrcVSurface, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_X, SKI_TACTICAL_BACKGROUND_START_Y, (RECT*)&SrcRect );
01503 
01504       // WANNE 2
01505       //InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
01506 }
01507 
01508 
01509 
01510 void        GetShopKeeperInterfaceUserInput()
01511 {
01512       InputAtom Event;
01513       POINT MousePos;
01514 
01515       GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
01516 
01517       while( DequeueEvent( &Event ) )
01518       {
01519             // HOOK INTO MOUSE HOOKS
01520 /* removed warning condition C4060 (jonathanl)
01521             switch( Event.usEvent)
01522             {
01523             }
01524 */
01525 
01526             if( !HandleTextInput( &Event ) && Event.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
01527             {
01528 
01529 /*
01530 //ATM:
01531 
01532                   //if the number entered was a number
01533                   if( (Event.usParam >= '0' ) && ( Event.usParam <= '9') )
01534                   {
01535                         UINT8 ubValue = 0;
01536                         ubValue = ( INT8 )( Event.usParam - '0' );
01537 
01538                         AddNumberToSkiAtm( ubValue );
01539                   }
01540 */
01541 
01542                   switch( Event.usParam )
01543                   {
01544                         case ESC:
01545                               // clean exits - does quotes, shuts up shopkeeper, etc.
01546                               ExitSKIRequested();
01547 
01548 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01549                               //Instant exit - doesn't clean up much
01550 //                            gfSKIScreenExit = TRUE;
01551 #endif
01552                               break;
01553 
01554                         case 'x':
01555                               if( Event.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
01556                               {
01557                                     HandleShortCutExitState( );
01558                               }
01559                               break;
01560 
01561                         case SPACE:
01562                               {
01563                                     UINT8 ubID;
01564 
01565                                     DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
01566 
01567                                     // skip Robot and EPCs
01568                                     ubID = FindNextActiveAndAliveMerc( gpSMCurrentMerc, FALSE, TRUE );
01569 
01570                                     gubSelectSMPanelToMerc = ubID;
01571 
01572                                     LocateSoldier( ubID, DONTSETLOCATOR );
01573                                     // refresh background for player slots (in case item values change due to Flo's discount)
01574                                     gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
01575                               }
01576                               break;
01577 
01578 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01579 
01580                         case 'r':
01581                               gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
01582                               break;
01583                         case 'i':
01584                               InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
01585                               break;
01586 
01587                         case 'd':
01588                               //Test key to toggle the display of the money each dealer has on hand
01589                               gfTestDisplayDealerCash ^= 1;
01590                               break;
01591 
01592 #endif
01593                   }
01594             }
01595       }
01596 }
01597 
01598 
01599 
01600 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01601 void DisplayAllDealersCash()
01602 {
01603       INT8        bArmsDealer;
01604       UINT16      usPosY=0;
01605       CHAR16      zTemp[512];
01606       UINT8       ubForeColor;
01607 
01608       //loop through all the shopkeeper's and display their money
01609       for( bArmsDealer=0; bArmsDealer<NUM_ARMS_DEALERS; bArmsDealer++ )
01610       {
01611             //Display the shopkeeper's name
01612             DrawTextToScreen( gMercProfiles[ ArmsDealerInfo[ bArmsDealer ].ubShopKeeperID ].zNickname, SCREEN_X_OFFSET + 540, SCREEN_Y_OFFSET + usPosY, 0, FONT10ARIAL, SKI_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
01613 
01614             //Display the arms dealer cash on hand
01615             swprintf( zTemp, L"%d", gArmsDealerStatus[ bArmsDealer ].uiArmsDealersCash );
01616 
01617             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( zTemp );
01618             InsertDollarSignInToString( zTemp );
01619             ubForeColor = ( UINT8 ) ( ( bArmsDealer == gbSelectedArmsDealerID ) ? SKI_BUTTON_COLOR : SKI_TITLE_COLOR );
01620             DrawTextToScreen( zTemp, SCREEN_X_OFFSET + 590, SCREEN_Y_OFFSET + usPosY, 0, FONT10ARIAL, ubForeColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
01621             usPosY += 17;
01622       }
01623 }
01624 #endif
01625 
01626 void BtnSKI_InvPageUpButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01627 {
01628       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01629       {
01630             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01631             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01632       }
01633       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01634       {
01635             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01636 
01637             if( gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage > 1 )
01638             {
01639                   gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage--;
01640                   gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
01641                   EnableDisableDealersInventoryPageButtons();
01642             }
01643 
01644             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01645       }
01646 }
01647 
01648 
01649 void BtnSKI_InvPageDownButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01650 {
01651       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01652       {
01653             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01654             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01655       }
01656       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01657       {
01658             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01659 
01660             if( gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage < gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubNumberOfPages )
01661             {
01662                   gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage++;
01663                   gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
01664                   EnableDisableDealersInventoryPageButtons();
01665             }
01666 
01667             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01668       }
01669 } 
01670 
01671 /*
01672 //Evaluate:
01673 void BtnSKI_EvaluateButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01674 {
01675       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01676       {
01677             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01678             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01679       }
01680       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01681       {
01682             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01683 
01684             ShutUpShopKeeper();
01685             EvaluateAllItemsInPlayersOfferArea( );
01686 
01687             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01688       }
01689 }
01690 */
01691 void BtnSKI_TransactionButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01692 {
01693       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01694       {
01695             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01696             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01697       }
01698       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01699       {
01700             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01701             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01702 
01703             // if not already doing it (multiple clicks can be queued up while shopkeeper is still talking)
01704             if ( !gfPerformTransactionInProgress )
01705             {
01706                   // shut him up
01707                   ShutUpShopKeeper();
01708 
01709                   giShopKeepDialogueEventinProgress = -1;
01710 
01711                   PerformTransaction( 0 );
01712             }
01713       }
01714 }
01715 
01716 void BtnSKI_DoneButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01717 {
01718       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01719       {
01720             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01721       }
01722       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01723       {
01724             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01725             ExitSKIRequested();
01726       }
01727 
01728       InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01729 } 
01730 
01731 void CreateSkiInventorySlotMouseRegions( )
01732 {
01733       UINT8 x,y,ubCnt;
01734       UINT16      usPosX, usPosY;
01735 
01736 
01737       // Create the mouse regions for the shopkeeper's inventory
01738       usPosY = SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_START_Y;
01739       ubCnt=0;
01740       for(y=0; y<SKI_NUM_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_ROWS; y++)
01741       {
01742             usPosX = SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_START_X;
01743 
01744             for(x=0; x<SKI_NUM_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_COLS; x++)
01745             {
01746                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gDealersInventoryMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], usPosX, usPosY, (INT16)(usPosX + SKI_INV_SLOT_WIDTH), (INT16)(usPosY + SKI_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
01747                                                              CURSOR_NORMAL, SelectDealersInventoryMovementRegionCallBack, SelectDealersInventoryRegionCallBack ); 
01748                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gDealersInventoryMouseRegions[ubCnt] );
01749                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gDealersInventoryMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], 0, ubCnt);
01750                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gDealersInventoryMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], 1, ARMS_DEALER_INVENTORY );
01751 
01752                   //if the dealer repairs
01753                   if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
01754                   {
01755                         //Small Faces
01756                         MSYS_DefineRegion( &gRepairmanInventorySmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], (UINT16)(usPosX+SKI_SMALL_FACE_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY), (INT16)(usPosX + SKI_SMALL_FACE_OFFSET_X + SKI_SMALL_FACE_WIDTH), (INT16)(usPosY+ SKI_SMALL_FACE_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+1,
01757                                                                    CURSOR_NORMAL, NULL, NULL );
01758                         MSYS_AddRegion( &gRepairmanInventorySmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt ] );
01759                         MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gRepairmanInventorySmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], 0, ubCnt );
01760                         MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gRepairmanInventorySmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], 1, ARMS_DEALER_INVENTORY );
01761                   }
01762 
01763                   usPosX += SKI_INV_OFFSET_X;
01764                   ubCnt++;
01765             }
01766             usPosY += SKI_INV_OFFSET_Y;
01767       }
01768 
01769       // Create the mouse regions for the shopkeeper's trading slots
01770       usPosY = SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_TRADING_INV_Y;
01771       ubCnt=0;
01772       for(y=0; y<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_ROWS; y++)
01773       {
01774             usPosX = SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_TRADING_INV_X;
01775 
01776             for(x=0; x<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_COLS; x++)
01777             {
01778                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gDealersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], usPosX, usPosY, (INT16)(usPosX + SKI_INV_SLOT_WIDTH), (INT16)(usPosY + SKI_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
01779                                                              CURSOR_NORMAL, SelectDealersOfferSlotsMovementRegionCallBack, SelectDealersOfferSlotsRegionCallBack ); 
01780                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gDealersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ubCnt] );
01781                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gDealersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], 0, ubCnt);
01782 
01783 
01784                   //if the dealer repairs
01785                   if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
01786                   {
01787                         //Small Faces
01788                         MSYS_DefineRegion( &gDealersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], (UINT16)(usPosX+SKI_SMALL_FACE_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY), (INT16)(usPosX + SKI_SMALL_FACE_OFFSET_X + SKI_SMALL_FACE_WIDTH), (INT16)(usPosY+ SKI_SMALL_FACE_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+1,
01789                                                                    CURSOR_NORMAL, SelectDealersOfferSlotsMovementRegionCallBack, SelectDealersOfferSlotsRegionCallBack ); 
01790                         MSYS_AddRegion( &gDealersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ubCnt] );
01791                         MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gDealersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], 0, ubCnt);
01792                         MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gDealersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], 1, ARMS_DEALER_OFFER_AREA );
01793                   }
01794 
01795 
01796                   usPosX += SKI_INV_OFFSET_X;
01797                   ubCnt++;
01798             }
01799             usPosY += SKI_INV_OFFSET_Y;
01800       }
01801 
01802       // Create the mouse regions for the Players trading slots
01803       usPosY = SKI_PLAYERS_TRADING_INV_Y;
01804       ubCnt=0;
01805       for(y=0; y<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_ROWS; y++)
01806       {
01807             usPosX = SKI_PLAYERS_TRADING_INV_X;
01808 
01809             for(x=0; x<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_COLS; x++)
01810             {
01811                   //Trading Slots
01812                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gPlayersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], usPosX, usPosY, (INT16)(usPosX + SKI_INV_SLOT_WIDTH), (INT16)(usPosY + SKI_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
01813                                                              CURSOR_NORMAL, SelectPlayersOfferSlotsMovementRegionCallBack, SelectPlayersOfferSlotsRegionCallBack ); 
01814                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gPlayersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ubCnt] );
01815                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gPlayersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], 0, ubCnt);
01816 /*
01817                   //if the dealer repairs
01818                   if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
01819                   {
01820                         MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gPlayersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], 1, PLAYERS_OFFER_AREA );
01821                   }
01822 */
01823                   //Small Faces
01824                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gPlayersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], (UINT16)(usPosX+SKI_SMALL_FACE_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY), (INT16)(usPosX + SKI_SMALL_FACE_OFFSET_X + SKI_SMALL_FACE_WIDTH), (INT16)(usPosY+ SKI_SMALL_FACE_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+1,
01825                                                              CURSOR_NORMAL, SelectPlayersOfferSlotsMovementRegionCallBack, SelectPlayersOfferSlotsRegionCallBack ); 
01826                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gPlayersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ubCnt] );
01827                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gPlayersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], 0, ubCnt);
01828                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gPlayersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], 1, PLAYERS_OFFER_AREA );
01829 
01830                   usPosX += SKI_INV_OFFSET_X;
01831                   ubCnt++;
01832             }
01833             usPosY += SKI_INV_OFFSET_Y;
01834       }
01835 
01836 
01837 }
01838 
01839 
01840 void DestroySkiInventorySlotMouseRegions( )
01841 {
01842       UINT8 i;
01843 
01844       for(i=0; i<SKI_NUM_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_SLOTS; i++)
01845       {
01846             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gDealersInventoryMouseRegions[ i ] );
01847 
01848             //if the dealer repairs
01849             if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
01850             {
01851                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gRepairmanInventorySmallFaceMouseRegions[ i ] );
01852             }
01853       }
01854 
01855       for(i=0; i<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; i++)
01856       {
01857             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gDealersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ i ] );
01858 
01859             //if the dealer repairs
01860             if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
01861             {
01862                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gDealersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ i ] );
01863             }
01864 
01865             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gPlayersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ i ] );
01866 
01867             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gPlayersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ i ] );
01868       }
01869 }
01870 
01871 
01872 //Mouse Call back for the Arms traders inventory slot
01873 void SelectDealersInventoryRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01874 {
01875       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01876       {
01877       }
01878       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01879       {
01880             UINT8 ubSelectedInvSlot = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
01881             INT8  ubLocation;
01882 
01883             if( gpTempDealersInventory == NULL )
01884                   return;
01885 
01886             ubSelectedInvSlot += gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubFirstItemIndexOnPage;
01887 
01888             //if the selected slot is above any inventory we have, return
01889             if( ubSelectedInvSlot >= gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems )
01890                   return;
01891 
01892             //if there are any items still there
01893             if( gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects > 0 )
01894             {
01895                   //If the item type has not already been placed
01896                   if( !( gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_ITEM_SELECTED ) )
01897                   {
01898                         //if the dealer repairs
01899                         if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
01900                         {
01901                               // ignore left clicks on items under repair.  Fully repaired items are moved out to player's slots automatically
01902                         }
01903                         else  // not a repairman
01904                         {
01905                               ubLocation = AddItemToArmsDealerOfferArea( &gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ], ubSelectedInvSlot );
01906 
01907                               //if the item was added to the Dealer Offer Area correctly
01908                               if( ubLocation != -1 )
01909                               {
01910                                     //Set the flag indicating the item has been selected
01911                                     gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].uiFlags |= ARMS_INV_ITEM_SELECTED;
01912 
01913                                     //Specify the location the items went to
01914                                     gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ubLocationOfObject = ARMS_DEALER_OFFER_AREA;
01915                                     gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation = ubLocation;
01916 
01917                                     //if the shift key is being pressed, remove them all
01918                                     if( gfKeyState[ SHIFT ] )
01919                                     {
01920                                           gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects = 0;
01921                                     }
01922                                     else
01923                                     {
01924                                           gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects --;
01925                                     }
01926 
01927                                     gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
01928                               }
01929                         }
01930                   }
01931                   else  // some of this item are already in dealer's offer area
01932                   {
01933                         UINT8 ubNumToMove;
01934 
01935                         //if the shift key is being pressed, remove them all
01936                         if( gfKeyState[ SHIFT ] )
01937                         {
01938                               ubNumToMove = gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects;
01939                         }
01940                         else
01941                         {
01942                               ubNumToMove = 1;
01943                         }
01944 
01945                         //Reduce the number in dealer's inventory
01946                         gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects -= ubNumToMove;
01947                         //Increase the number in dealer's offer area
01948                         ArmsDealerOfferArea[ gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects += ubNumToMove;
01949 
01950                         gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
01951                   }
01952             }
01953       }
01954 
01955       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
01956       {
01957             UINT8 ubSelectedInvSlot = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
01958 
01959             if( gpTempDealersInventory == NULL )
01960                   return;
01961 
01962             ubSelectedInvSlot += gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubFirstItemIndexOnPage;
01963 
01964             //if the selected slot is above any inventory we have, return
01965             if( ubSelectedInvSlot >= gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems )
01966                   return;
01967 
01968             //DEF:
01969             //bring up the item description box
01970             if ( !InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
01971             {
01972                   InitShopKeeperItemDescBox( &gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject, ubSelectedInvSlot, ARMS_DEALER_INVENTORY );
01973             }
01974             else
01975             {
01976                   DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
01977             }
01978 
01979 
01980 
01981 /*
01982             //if the item has been seleceted
01983             if( gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_ITEM_SELECTED )
01984             {
01985                   //Check to see it there is more then 1 item in the location
01986                   if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects > 0 )
01987                   {
01988                         //Increase the number in the dealer inventory
01989                         gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects ++;
01990 
01991                         //Decrease the number in the dealer offer area
01992                         ArmsDealerOfferArea[ gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects--;
01993 
01994                         //if there is nothing left in the arms dealer offer area
01995                         if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
01996                         {
01997                               RemoveItemFromArmsDealerOfferArea( gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation, FALSE );
01998                         }
01999 
02000                         //redraw the screen
02001                         gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
02002                   }
02003             }
02004 */
02005       } 
02006 }
02007 
02008 
02009 
02010 void SelectDealersInventoryMovementRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02011 {
02012       UINT8 ubSelectedInvSlot = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
02013       ubSelectedInvSlot += gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubFirstItemIndexOnPage;
02014 
02015       if( gpTempDealersInventory == NULL )
02016             return;
02017 
02018       if( ubSelectedInvSlot >= gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems )
02019             return;
02020 
02021       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02022       {
02023       }
02024       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
02025       {
02026             //if there is nothing in the slot, exit
02027             if( gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].fActive == FALSE )
02028                   return;
02029 
02030             gpHighLightedItemObject = &gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject;
02031 
02032             HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, -1, TRUE );
02033       }
02034       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
02035       {
02036             //if there is nothing in the slot, exit
02037             if( gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].fActive == FALSE )
02038                   return;
02039 
02040             gpHighLightedItemObject = NULL;
02041             gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL1;      //ddd
02042             HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, -1, FALSE );
02043       }
02044 }
02045 
02046 void SelectDealersOfferSlotsMovementRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02047 {
02048       UINT8 ubSelectedInvSlot = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
02049 
02050       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02051       {
02052       }
02053       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
02054       {
02055             //if there is nothing in the slot, exit
02056             if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].fActive == FALSE )
02057                   return;
02058 
02059             gpHighLightedItemObject = &ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject;
02060             HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, -1, TRUE );
02061       }
02062       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
02063       {
02064             //if there is nothing in the slot, exit
02065             if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].fActive == FALSE )
02066                   return;
02067 
02068             gpHighLightedItemObject = NULL;
02069             gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL1;//ddd
02070             HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, -1, FALSE );
02071       }
02072 }
02073 
02074 void SelectPlayersOfferSlotsMovementRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02075 {
02076       UINT8 ubSelectedInvSlot = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
02077 
02078       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02079       {
02080       }
02081       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
02082       {
02083             //if there is nothing in the slot, exit
02084             if( PlayersOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].fActive == FALSE )
02085                   return;
02086 
02087             gpHighLightedItemObject = &PlayersOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject;
02088             HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, -1, TRUE );
02089       }
02090       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
02091       {
02092             //if there is nothing in the slot, exit
02093             if( PlayersOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].fActive == FALSE )
02094                   return;
02095 
02096             gpHighLightedItemObject = NULL;
02097             gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL1;//ddd
02098             HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, -1, FALSE );
02099       }
02100 }
02101 
02102 
02103 
02104 //Mouse Call back for the dealer's OFFER slot
02105 void SelectDealersOfferSlotsRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02106 {
02107       UINT8 ubSelectedInvSlot = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
02108 
02109       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02110       {
02111       }
02112       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
02113       {
02114             //if there is something here
02115             if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].fActive )
02116             {
02117                   //if the dealer repairs
02118                   if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
02119                   {
02120                         // return item to player
02121                         RemoveRepairItemFromDealersOfferArea( ubSelectedInvSlot );
02122                   }
02123                   else
02124                   {
02125                         //bring up the item description box
02126                         if ( !InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
02127                         {
02128                               InitShopKeeperItemDescBox( &ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject, ubSelectedInvSlot, ARMS_DEALER_OFFER_AREA );
02129                         }
02130                         else
02131                         {
02132                               DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
02133                         }
02134                   }
02135             }
02136       }
02137       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP ) //MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
02138       {
02139 /*
02140             //if the current merc is disabled for whatever reason
02141             if( gfSMDisableForItems )
02142                   // the
02143                   return;
02144 */
02145             //if there is something here
02146             if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].fActive )
02147             {
02148                   //if this is a repair dealer
02149                   if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
02150                   {
02151                         //if we don't have an item, pick one up
02152                         if( gMoveingItem.sItemIndex == 0 )
02153                         {
02154                               //if the dealer is a repair dealer, allow the player to pick up the item
02155                               if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
02156                               {
02157                                     BeginSkiItemPointer( ARMS_DEALER_OFFER_AREA, ubSelectedInvSlot, FALSE );
02158                               }
02159                         }
02160                         else
02161                         {
02162                               //swap what is in the cursor with what is in the player offer slot
02163                               INVENTORY_IN_SLOT TempSlot;
02164 
02165                               // if the slot is overloaded (holds more objects than we have room for valid statuses of)
02166                               if ( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects > MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT )
02167                               {
02168                                     // then ignore the click - we can't do the swap, or anything very useful, because we can't allow overloaded
02169                                     // items into the player's cursor - if he put them into a merc's inventory, the extra statuses are missing!
02170                                     // At best, we could do some sort of message here.
02171                                     return;
02172                               }
02173 
02174                               IfMercOwnedCopyItemToMercInv( &gMoveingItem );
02175 
02176                               memcpy( &TempSlot, &ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ], sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
02177                               memcpy( &ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ], &gMoveingItem, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
02178                               memcpy( &gMoveingItem, &TempSlot, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
02179 
02180                               IfMercOwnedRemoveItemFromMercInv( &gMoveingItem );
02181 
02182                               // Change mouse cursor
02183                               gpItemPointer = &gMoveingItem.ItemObject;
02184                               SetSkiCursor( EXTERN_CURSOR );
02185 
02186                               gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
02187                         }
02188                   }
02189                   else  //non-repairman
02190                   {
02191                         //if the shift key is being pressed, remove them all
02192                         if( gfKeyState[ SHIFT ] || ( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects == 1 ) )
02193                         {
02194                               RemoveItemFromArmsDealerOfferArea( ubSelectedInvSlot, TRUE );//ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation
02195                         }
02196                         else  // multiple items there, SHIFT isn't being pressed
02197                         {
02198                               // remove only one at a time
02199                               ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects--;
02200                               gpTempDealersInventory[ ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects++;
02201                         }
02202 
02203                         gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
02204                   }
02205             }
02206             else  // empty slot
02207             {
02208                   //if the cursor has something in it
02209                   if( gMoveingItem.sItemIndex > 0 )
02210                   {
02211                         // we'd better talking to a repairman, cursor is locked out of this area while full for non-repairmen!
02212                         Assert( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS );
02213 
02214                         //Drop the item into the current slot
02215                         AddInventoryToSkiLocation( &gMoveingItem, ubSelectedInvSlot, ARMS_DEALER_OFFER_AREA );
02216 
02217                         //Reset the cursor
02218                         SetSkiCursor( CURSOR_NORMAL );
02219 
02220                         //refresh the screen
02221                         gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
02222                   }
02223             }
02224       }
02225 }
02226 
02227 
02228 //Mouse Call back for the Players OFFER slot
02229 void SelectPlayersOfferSlotsRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02230 {
02231       UINT8 ubSelectedInvSlot = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
02232       INT8 bAddedToSlotID = -1;
02233 
02234 
02235       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02236       {
02237       }
02238       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02239       {
02240             //if the cursor has no item in it
02241             if( gMoveingItem.sItemIndex == 0 )
02242             {
02243                   //if there is nothing here, return
02244                   if( PlayersOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].fActive == FALSE )
02245                         return;
02246 
02247                   // pick it up into the cursor
02248                   BeginSkiItemPointer( PLAYERS_OFFER_AREA, ubSelectedInvSlot, FALSE );
02249             }
02250             else  // we have something in the cursor
02251             {
02252                   //Drop the item into the current slot
02253 //                AddObjectToSkiLocation( &gpSkiItemPointer, ubSelectedInvSlot, PLAYERS_OFFER_AREA );
02254 
02255                   //if there is something already there
02256                   if( PlayersOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].fActive )
02257                   {
02258                         //swap what is in the cursor with what is in the player offer slot
02259                         INVENTORY_IN_SLOT TempSlot;
02260 
02261                         // if the slot is overloaded (holds more objects than we have room for valid statuses of)
02262                         if ( PlayersOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects > MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT )
02263                         {
02264                               // then ignore the click - we can't do the swap, or anything very useful, because we can't allow overloaded
02265                               // items into the player's cursor - if he put them into a merc's inventory, the extra statuses are missing!
02266                               // At best, we could do some sort of message here.
02267                               return;
02268                         }
02269 
02270                         IfMercOwnedCopyItemToMercInv( &gMoveingItem );
02271 
02272                         memcpy( &TempSlot, &PlayersOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ], sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
02273                         memcpy( &PlayersOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ], &gMoveingItem, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
02274                         memcpy( &gMoveingItem, &TempSlot, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
02275 
02276                         IfMercOwnedRemoveItemFromMercInv( &gMoveingItem );
02277 
02278                         // Change mouse cursor
02279                         gpItemPointer = &gMoveingItem.ItemObject;
02280                         SetSkiCursor( EXTERN_CURSOR );
02281 
02282                         //if the item we are adding is money
02283                         if( Item[ PlayersOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].sItemIndex ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
02284                         {
02285                               //Since money is always evaluated
02286                               PlayersOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].uiFlags |= ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_VALUE;
02287                               PlayersOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].uiItemPrice = PlayersOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].ItemObject.bMoneyStatus;
02288                         }                 
02289                   }
02290                   else  // slot is empty
02291                   {
02292                         // if the item has already been evaluated, or has just been purchased
02293                         if ( ( gMoveingItem.uiFlags & ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_BEEN_EVALUATED ) ||
02294                                  ( gMoveingItem.uiFlags & ARMS_INV_JUST_PURCHASED ) )
02295                         {
02296                               //place the item that is in the player's hand into this player offer area slot
02297                               bAddedToSlotID = AddInventoryToSkiLocation( &gMoveingItem, ubSelectedInvSlot, PLAYERS_OFFER_AREA );
02298                               Assert ( bAddedToSlotID != -1 );
02299                         }
02300                         else
02301                         {
02302                               // this splits complex items for repairs.  Also puts things into the first free POA slot
02303                               OfferObjectToDealer( &gMoveingItem.ItemObject, gMoveingItem.ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem, gMoveingItem.bSlotIdInOtherLocation );
02304                         }
02305 
02306                         //Reset the cursor
02307                         SetSkiCursor( CURSOR_NORMAL );
02308                   }
02309 
02310                   //Dirty the interface
02311                   gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
02312             }
02313       }
02314       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP ) //MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
02315       {
02316             //if the box is active
02317             if( PlayersOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].fActive )
02318             {
02319                   RemoveItemFromPlayersOfferArea( ubSelectedInvSlot );
02320 /*
02321 item description
02322                   else
02323                   {
02324                         if ( !InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
02325                         {
02326                               InitItemDescriptionBox( gpSMCurrentMerc, (UINT8)PlayersOfferArea[ ubSelectedInvSlot ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation, 214, 1 + INV_INTERFACE_START_Y, 0 );
02327                         }
02328                         else
02329                         {
02330                               DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
02331                         }
02332                   }
02333 */
02334             }
02335             gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
02336       }
02337 }
02338 
02339 
02340 void SelectSkiInventoryMovementAreaRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02341 {
02342       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02343       {
02344       }
02345       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
02346       {
02347 
02348       } 
02349 }
02350 
02351
