02352 
02353 
02354 void EnterShopKeeperInterfaceScreen( UINT8      ubArmsDealer )
02355 {
02356       //Get Dealer ID from from merc Id
02357       gbSelectedArmsDealerID = GetArmsDealerIDFromMercID( ubArmsDealer );
02358 
02359       if( gbSelectedArmsDealerID == -1 )
02360       {
02361             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02362                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Failed to find Arms Dealer ID From Merc ID #%d", ubArmsDealer );
02363             #endif
02364             gfSKIScreenExit = TRUE;
02365       }
02366 
02367       LeaveTacticalScreen( SHOPKEEPER_SCREEN );
02368 }
02369 
02370 
02371 void InitializeShopKeeper( BOOLEAN fResetPage )
02372 {     
02373       // update time player last dealt with him
02374       gArmsDealerStatus[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].uiTimePlayerLastInSKI = GetWorldTotalMin();
02375 
02376 
02377       //Get the number of distinct items in the inventory
02378       gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems = CountDistinctItemsInArmsDealersInventory( gbSelectedArmsDealerID );
02379 
02380       // If there are any items in the dealer's inventory
02381       if( gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems > 0 )
02382       {
02383             //Create the shopkeeper's temp inventory 
02384             DetermineArmsDealersSellingInventory( );
02385 
02386 /* No longer necessary. ARM
02387             //Some of the number might have changed in DetermineArmsDealersSellingInventory(), recalc the values
02388             gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems = CountDistinctItemsInArmsDealersInventory( gbSelectedArmsDealerID );
02389 */
02390       }
02391 
02392       gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubNumberOfPages = (UINT8)( gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems / SKI_NUM_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_SLOTS );
02393       if( gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems % 15 != 0 )
02394             gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubNumberOfPages += 1;
02395 
02396 
02397       //Should we reset the current inventory page being displayed
02398       if( gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems == 0 )
02399             gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage = 0;
02400       else
02401       {
02402             if( fResetPage )
02403             {
02404                   if( gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems == 0 )
02405                         gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage = 0;
02406                   else
02407                         gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage = 1;
02408             }
02409 
02410             //or if the current page will be an invalid page ( before the first, and after the last )
02411             else if( gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage < 0 || gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage > gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubNumberOfPages )
02412             {
02413                   gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage = 1;
02414             }
02415 
02416             else if( gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems != 0 )
02417                   gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage = 1;
02418       }
02419 
02420 
02421       //if there is no inventory
02422       if( gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems == 0 )
02423       {
02424             gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage = 0;
02425             gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubNumberOfPages = 0;
02426 
02427             //disable the page up/down buttons
02428             DisableButton( guiSKI_InvPageUpButton );
02429             DisableButton( guiSKI_InvPageDownButton );
02430 
02431             return;
02432       }
02433       else
02434       {
02435             //enable the page up/down buttons
02436             EnableButton( guiSKI_InvPageUpButton );
02437             EnableButton( guiSKI_InvPageDownButton );
02438       }
02439 
02440 
02441       EnableDisableDealersInventoryPageButtons();
02442 }
02443 
02444 
02445 void CalculateFirstItemIndexOnPage( )
02446 {
02447       gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubFirstItemIndexOnPage = ( gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage -1 ) * SKI_NUM_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_SLOTS;
02448 }
02449 
02450 
02451 
02452 void DisplayArmsDealerCurrentInventoryPage( )
02453 {
02454       CHAR16                  zTemp[32];
02455       UINT16                  uiFontHeight;
02456       UINT16                  usCnt=0;
02457       UINT16                  usPosX, usPosY;
02458       UINT8                   sItemCount=0;
02459       BOOLEAN                 fDisplayHatchOnItem=FALSE;
02460 
02461 
02462       usPosX = SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_START_X;
02463       usPosY = SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_START_Y;
02464 
02465       //if there is any inventory
02466       if( gpTempDealersInventory != NULL )
02467       {
02468             if( gubSkiDirtyLevel != SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL0 )
02469             {
02470                   //Calculate the item that is at the top of the list
02471                   CalculateFirstItemIndexOnPage( );
02472 
02473                   //Restore the background before blitting the text back on
02474                   RestoreExternBackgroundRect( SKI_PAGE_X, SKI_PAGE_Y, SKI_PAGE_WIDTH, SKI_PAGE_HEIGHT );
02475 
02476                   //Restore the pristine region
02477                   RestoreExternBackgroundRect( SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_START_X, SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_START_Y, 370, 107 );
02478 
02479                   //Display the current inventory page
02480                   DrawTextToScreen( SKI_Text[ SKI_TEXT_PAGE ], SKI_PAGE_X, (UINT16)(SKI_PAGE_Y+3), SKI_PAGE_WIDTH, SKI_LABEL_FONT, SKI_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );     
02481 
02482                   //Display the Current Page number
02483                   uiFontHeight = GetFontHeight( SKI_LABEL_FONT );
02484                   swprintf( zTemp, L"%d/%d", gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage, gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubNumberOfPages );
02485                   DrawTextToScreen( zTemp, SKI_PAGE_X, (UINT16)(SKI_PAGE_Y+uiFontHeight+6), SKI_PAGE_WIDTH, SKI_LABEL_FONT, SKI_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );      
02486             }
02487 
02488             //Display all the items for the current page
02489             for( usCnt=gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubFirstItemIndexOnPage; ( ( usCnt<gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems ) && ( sItemCount < SKI_NUM_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_SLOTS ) ); usCnt++ )
02490             {
02491                   //if the item is still in the inventory
02492                   if( gpTempDealersInventory[ usCnt ].sItemIndex != 0 )
02493                   {
02494                         // hatch it out if region is disabled
02495                         if ( !( gDealersInventoryMouseRegions[ sItemCount ].uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_ENABLED ) )
02496                         {
02497                               fDisplayHatchOnItem = TRUE;
02498                         }
02499                         //if the dealer repairs
02500                         else if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
02501                         {
02502                               //if the item is damaged
02503                               if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_ITEM_NOT_REPAIRED_YET )
02504                                     fDisplayHatchOnItem = TRUE;
02505                               else
02506                                     fDisplayHatchOnItem = FALSE;
02507                         }
02508                         else // non-repairman
02509                         {
02510                               // check if none left
02511                               if ( gpTempDealersInventory[ usCnt ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
02512                               {
02513                                     fDisplayHatchOnItem = TRUE;
02514                               }
02515                               else
02516                               {
02517                                     fDisplayHatchOnItem = FALSE;
02518                               }
02519                         }
02520 
02521 
02522                         // Display the inventory slot
02523                         DisplayInvSlot( (UINT8)usCnt, gpTempDealersInventory[ usCnt ].sItemIndex, usPosX, usPosY, 
02524                                                                         &gpTempDealersInventory[ usCnt ].ItemObject,
02525                                                                         fDisplayHatchOnItem,
02526                                                                         ARMS_DEALER_INVENTORY );
02527 
02528 
02529                         if( gubSkiDirtyLevel == SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2 )
02530                         {
02531                               SetSkiRegionHelpText( &gpTempDealersInventory[ usCnt ], &gDealersInventoryMouseRegions[sItemCount], ARMS_DEALER_INVENTORY );
02532 
02533                               //if the dealer repairs
02534                               if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
02535                               {
02536                                     SetSkiFaceRegionHelpText( &gpTempDealersInventory[ usCnt ], &gRepairmanInventorySmallFaceMouseRegions[sItemCount], ARMS_DEALER_INVENTORY );
02537                               }
02538                         }
02539 
02540                         sItemCount++;
02541 
02542                         usPosX += SKI_INV_OFFSET_X;
02543 
02544                         //if we are on to the next row
02545                         if( !( sItemCount % SKI_NUM_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_COLS ) )
02546                         {
02547                               usPosX = SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_START_X;
02548                               usPosY += SKI_INV_OFFSET_Y;
02549                         }
02550                   }
02551             }
02552       }
02553 
02554       if( gubSkiDirtyLevel == SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2 )
02555       {
02556             //This handles the remaining (empty) slots, resetting Fast Help text, and hatching out disabled ones
02557             while ( sItemCount < SKI_NUM_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_SLOTS )
02558             {
02559                   SetSkiRegionHelpText( NULL, &gDealersInventoryMouseRegions[ sItemCount ], ARMS_DEALER_INVENTORY );
02560 
02561                   //if the dealer repairs
02562                   if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
02563                   {
02564                         SetSkiFaceRegionHelpText( NULL, &gRepairmanInventorySmallFaceMouseRegions[ sItemCount ], ARMS_DEALER_INVENTORY );
02565                   }
02566 
02567                   // hatch it out if region is disabled
02568                   if ( !( gDealersInventoryMouseRegions[ sItemCount ].uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_ENABLED ) )
02569                   {
02570                         HatchOutInvSlot( usPosX, usPosY );
02571                   }
02572 
02573                   sItemCount++;
02574 
02575                   usPosX += SKI_INV_OFFSET_X;
02576 
02577                   //if we are on to the next row
02578                   if( !( sItemCount % SKI_NUM_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_COLS ) )
02579                   {
02580                         usPosX = SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_START_X;
02581                         usPosY += SKI_INV_OFFSET_Y;
02582                   }
02583             }
02584       }
02585 }
02586 
02587 
02588 UINT32 DisplayInvSlot( UINT8 ubSlotNum, UINT16 usItemIndex, UINT16 usPosX, UINT16 usPosY, OBJECTTYPE  *pItemObject, BOOLEAN fHatchedOut, UINT8 ubItemArea )
02589 {
02590       CHAR16                  zTemp[64];
02591       HVOBJECT          hVObject;
02592       HVOBJECT          hPixHandle;
02593       INVTYPE                 *pItem;
02594       ETRLEObject *pTrav;
02595       UINT32                  usHeight, usWidth;
02596       INT16                   sCenX, sCenY;
02597       UINT8                   sItemCount=0;
02598       BOOLEAN                 fHighlighted = IsGunOrAmmoOfSameTypeSelected( pItemObject );
02599       BOOLEAN                 fDisplayMercFace=FALSE;
02600       UINT8                   ubMercID=0;
02601       UINT32                  uiItemCost=0;
02602       BOOLEAN                 fPrintRepaired = FALSE;
02603 
02604       //if the item is not highlighted, and we are not rerendering the screen
02605       if( !( fHighlighted || gubSkiDirtyLevel != SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL0 ) )
02606             return( 0 );
02607 
02608       //
02609 //    if( fHighlighted ) 
02610 //          gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL1;
02611 
02612 
02613       //Display the item graphic, and price
02614       pItem = &Item[ usItemIndex ];
02615       GetVideoObject( &hVObject, GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( pItem ) );
02616       pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ pItem->ubGraphicNum ] );
02617 
02618       usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
02619       usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
02620 
02621       sCenX = usPosX + 7 + (INT16)( abs( SKI_INV_WIDTH - 3.0 - usWidth ) / 2 ) - pTrav->sOffsetX;
02622       sCenY = usPosY + (INT16)( abs( SKI_INV_HEIGHT - (double)usHeight ) / 2 ) - pTrav->sOffsetY;
02623 
02624 
02625       //Restore the background region
02626       RestoreExternBackgroundRect( usPosX, usPosY, SKI_INV_SLOT_WIDTH, SKI_INV_HEIGHT );
02627 
02628 
02629       //blt the shadow of the item
02630       if(gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_ITEM_SHADOW ]) BltVideoObjectOutlineShadowFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( pItem ), pItem->ubGraphicNum, sCenX-2, sCenY+2);
02631 
02632       //blt the item
02633       BltVideoObjectOutlineFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( pItem ), pItem->ubGraphicNum, sCenX, sCenY, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 255, 255 ) ), fHighlighted );
02634 
02635       //Display the status of the item
02636       DrawItemUIBarEx( pItemObject, 0, (INT16)(usPosX+2), (INT16)(usPosY+2+20), 2, 20,    Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 140, 136, 119 ) ), Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 140, 136, 119 ) ), TRUE, guiRENDERBUFFER );//guiSAVEBUFFER
02637 
02638 
02639       //Display the Items Cost
02640       if( ubItemArea == PLAYERS_OFFER_AREA )
02641       {
02642             //if the item has value
02643             if( PlayersOfferArea[ ubSlotNum ].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_VALUE )
02644             {
02645                   uiItemCost = PlayersOfferArea[ ubSlotNum ].uiItemPrice;
02646             }
02647 
02648             //if the item belongs to a merc
02649             if( PlayersOfferArea[ ubSlotNum ].ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem != NO_PROFILE )
02650             {
02651                   //Display the face of the merc 
02652                   fDisplayMercFace = TRUE;
02653                   ubMercID = PlayersOfferArea[ ubSlotNum ].ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem;
02654             }
02655 
02656             // if the item has just been repaired
02657             if ( PlayersOfferArea[ ubSlotNum ].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_ITEM_REPAIRED )
02658             {
02659                   fPrintRepaired = TRUE;
02660             }
02661       }
02662       else if( ubItemArea == ARMS_DEALER_INVENTORY )
02663       {
02664             if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer != ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
02665             {
02666                   if( fHatchedOut && pItemObject->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
02667                   {
02668                         uiItemCost = 0;
02669                   }
02670                   else
02671                   {
02672                         // show the UNIT price, not the total value of all if stacked
02673                         uiItemCost = CalcShopKeeperItemPrice( DEALER_SELLING, TRUE, usItemIndex, ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].dSellModifier, pItemObject );
02674                   }
02675             }
02676             else // UNDER REPAIR
02677             {
02678                   UINT8       ubElement;
02679                   UINT32      uiTimeInMinutesToFixItem=0;
02680 
02681                   //display the length of time needed to repair the item
02682                   uiItemCost = 0;
02683 
02684                   //Get the length of time needed to fix the item
02685                   Assert( gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSlotNum ].sSpecialItemElement != -1);
02686                   ubElement = (UINT8) gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSlotNum ].sSpecialItemElement;
02687 
02688                   BuildDoneWhenTimeString( zTemp, gbSelectedArmsDealerID, usItemIndex, ubElement );
02689                   DrawTextToScreen( zTemp, (UINT16)(usPosX+SKI_INV_PRICE_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY+SKI_INV_PRICE_OFFSET_Y), SKI_INV_SLOT_WIDTH, SKI_ITEM_DESC_FONT, SKI_ITEM_PRICE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
02690 
02691                   //if the item belongs to a merc
02692                   if( gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSlotNum ].ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem != NO_PROFILE )
02693                   {
02694                         //Display the face of the merc 
02695                         fDisplayMercFace = TRUE;
02696                         ubMercID = gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSlotNum ].ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem;
02697                   }
02698             }
02699       }
02700       else        // DEALER'S OFFER AREA
02701       {
02702             if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
02703             {
02704                   //if the dealer repairs, there is an item here, therefore display the items owner's face
02705                   fDisplayMercFace = TRUE;
02706                   ubMercID = ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSlotNum ].ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem;
02707 
02708                   uiItemCost = CalculateObjectItemRepairCost( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, pItemObject );
02709             }
02710             else
02711                   uiItemCost = CalcShopKeeperItemPrice( DEALER_SELLING, FALSE, usItemIndex, ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].dSellModifier, pItemObject );
02712 
02713       }
02714 
02715       //if the item has a price, display it
02716       if( uiItemCost != 0 )
02717       {
02718             swprintf( zTemp, L"%d", uiItemCost );
02719             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( zTemp );
02720             InsertDollarSignInToString( zTemp );
02721             DrawTextToScreen( zTemp, (UINT16)(usPosX+SKI_INV_PRICE_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY+SKI_INV_PRICE_OFFSET_Y), SKI_INV_SLOT_WIDTH, SKI_ITEM_DESC_FONT, SKI_ITEM_PRICE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );  
02722       }
02723 
02724 
02725       //if the there is more then 1 or if the item is stackable and some of it has been bought and only 1 remains
02726 //    if( pItemObject->ubNumberOfObjects > 1 || Item[ usItemIndex ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO )
02727 //    if( pItemObject->ubNumberOfObjects > 1 || Item[ usItemIndex ].ubPerPocket > 1 )
02728       if( ( pItemObject->ubNumberOfObjects > 1 ) ||
02729                   ( ( pItemObject->ubNumberOfObjects == 1 ) && DealerItemIsSafeToStack( usItemIndex ) &&
02730                         ( ubItemArea == ARMS_DEALER_INVENTORY ) && ( gpTempDealersInventory[ ubSlotNum ].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_ITEM_SELECTED ) ) )
02731       {
02732             swprintf( zTemp, L"x%d", pItemObject->ubNumberOfObjects );
02733             DrawTextToScreen( zTemp, (UINT16)(usPosX+SKI_ITEM_NUMBER_TEXT_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY+SKI_ITEM_NUMBER_TEXT_OFFSET_Y), SKI_ITEM_NUMBER_TEXT_WIDTH, SKIT_NUMBER_FONT, SKI_ITEM_PRICE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED ); 
02734       }
02735 
02736       //if we are to display the face
02737       if( fDisplayMercFace )
02738       {
02739             INT8 iFaceSlot = GetSlotNumberForMerc( ubMercID );
02740 
02741             // if still in player's employ
02742             if ( iFaceSlot != -1 )
02743             {
02744                   //Get and blit the face
02745                   GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiSmallSoldiersFace[ iFaceSlot ] );
02746                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,(UINT16)(usPosX+SKI_SMALL_FACE_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);//SKI_SMALL_FACE_OFFSET_Y
02747             }
02748       }
02749 
02750       //if the item has attachments
02751       if( ItemHasAttachments( pItemObject ) )
02752       {
02753             //Display the '*' in the bottom right corner of the square
02754             swprintf( zTemp, L"*" );
02755             DrawTextToScreen( zTemp, (UINT16)(usPosX+SKI_ATTACHMENT_SYMBOL_X_OFFSET), (UINT16)(usPosY+SKI_ATTACHMENT_SYMBOL_Y_OFFSET), 0, TINYFONT1, FONT_GREEN, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );      
02756       }
02757 
02758       // Display 'JAMMED' if it's jammed
02759       if ( pItemObject->bGunAmmoStatus < 0 )
02760       {
02761             swprintf( zTemp, TacticalStr[ JAMMED_ITEM_STR ] );
02762             VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( usPosX, usPosY, SKI_INV_SLOT_WIDTH, SKI_INV_HEIGHT, TINYFONT1, &sCenX, &sCenY, zTemp );
02763             DrawTextToScreen( zTemp, sCenX, sCenY, SKI_INV_SLOT_WIDTH, TINYFONT1, FONT_RED, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );   
02764       }
02765       else if ( fPrintRepaired )
02766       {
02767             swprintf( zTemp, SKI_Text[ SKI_TEXT_REPAIRED ] );
02768             VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( usPosX, usPosY, SKI_INV_SLOT_WIDTH, SKI_INV_HEIGHT, TINYFONT1, &sCenX, &sCenY, zTemp );
02769             DrawTextToScreen( zTemp, sCenX, sCenY, SKI_INV_SLOT_WIDTH, TINYFONT1, FONT_RED, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );   
02770       }
02771 
02772       if( fHatchedOut )
02773       {
02774             HatchOutInvSlot( usPosX, usPosY );
02775       }
02776 
02777       InvalidateRegion( usPosX, usPosY, usPosX+SKI_INV_SLOT_WIDTH, usPosY+SKI_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT );
02778 
02779       return( uiItemCost );
02780 }
02781 
02782 
02783 
02784 BOOLEAN DetermineArmsDealersSellingInventory( )
02785 {
02786       UINT16      usItemIndex;
02787       UINT8       ubElement;
02788       DEALER_SPECIAL_ITEM *pSpecialItem;
02789       BOOLEAN fAddSpecialItem;
02790       SPECIAL_ITEM_INFO SpclItemInfo;
02791 
02792 
02793       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("DEF: DetermineArmsDealer") );
02794 
02795       //if there is an old inventory, delete it
02796       if( gpTempDealersInventory )
02797       {
02798             MemFree( gpTempDealersInventory );
02799             gpTempDealersInventory = NULL;
02800       }
02801 
02802       //allocate memory to hold the inventory in memory
02803       gpTempDealersInventory = (INVENTORY_IN_SLOT *) MemAlloc( sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) * gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems );
02804       if( gpTempDealersInventory == NULL )
02805       {
02806             Assert( 0 );
02807             return(FALSE);
02808       }
02809       memset( gpTempDealersInventory, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) * gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems );
02810 
02811 
02812       guiNextFreeInvSlot = 0;
02813 
02814       //loop through the dealer's permanent inventory items, adding them all to the temp inventory list
02815       for( usItemIndex=1; usItemIndex<MAXITEMS; usItemIndex++)
02816       {
02817             if ( Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass  == 0 )
02818                   break;
02819 
02820             //if the arms dealer has some of the inventory
02821             if( gArmsDealersInventory[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ][ usItemIndex ].ubTotalItems > 0)
02822             {
02823                   // if there are any items in perfect condition
02824                   if( gArmsDealersInventory[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ][ usItemIndex ].ubPerfectItems > 0 )
02825                   {
02826                         // create just ONE dealer inventory box for them all.
02827                         // create item info describing a perfect item
02828                         SetSpecialItemInfoToDefaults( &SpclItemInfo );
02829                         // no special element index - it's "perfect"
02830                         AddItemsToTempDealerInventory(usItemIndex, &SpclItemInfo, -1, gArmsDealersInventory[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ][ usItemIndex ].ubPerfectItems, NO_PROFILE );
02831                   }
02832 
02833                   // add all active special items
02834                   for( ubElement=0; ubElement< gArmsDealersInventory[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ][ usItemIndex ].ubElementsAlloced; ubElement++ )
02835                   {
02836                         pSpecialItem = &(gArmsDealersInventory[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ][ usItemIndex ].SpecialItem[ ubElement ]);
02837 
02838                         if ( pSpecialItem->fActive )
02839                         {
02840                               fAddSpecialItem = TRUE;
02841 
02842                               //if the item is in for repairs
02843                               if( pSpecialItem->Info.bItemCondition < 0 )
02844                               {
02845                                     //if the repairs are done
02846                                     if( pSpecialItem->uiRepairDoneTime <= GetWorldTotalMin() )
02847                                     {
02848                                           if (RepairIsDone( usItemIndex, ubElement ))
02849                                           {
02850                                                 // don't add it here, it was put in the player's area
02851                                                 fAddSpecialItem = FALSE;
02852                                           }
02853                                           else
02854                                           {
02855                                                 gpTempDealersInventory[ guiNextFreeInvSlot ].uiFlags |= ARMS_INV_ITEM_REPAIRED;
02856                                           }
02857                                     }
02858                                     else
02859                                     {
02860                                           gpTempDealersInventory[ guiNextFreeInvSlot ].uiFlags |= ARMS_INV_ITEM_NOT_REPAIRED_YET;
02861                                     }
02862                               }
02863 
02864                               if ( fAddSpecialItem )
02865                               {
02866                                     UINT8 ubOwner;
02867 
02868                                     if ( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer != ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
02869                                     {
02870                                           // no merc is the owner
02871                                           ubOwner = NO_PROFILE;
02872                                     }
02873                                     else
02874                                     {
02875                                           // retain owner so we can display this
02876                                           ubOwner = pSpecialItem->ubOwnerProfileId;
02877                                     }
02878 
02879                                     AddItemsToTempDealerInventory( usItemIndex, &(pSpecialItem->Info), ubElement, 1, ubOwner );
02880                               }
02881                         }
02882                   }
02883             }
02884       }
02885 
02886       // if more than one item is in inventory
02887       if ( guiNextFreeInvSlot > 1 )
02888       {
02889             // repairmen sort differently from merchants
02890             if ( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
02891             {
02892                   // sort this list by object category, and by ascending price within each category
02893                   qsort( gpTempDealersInventory, guiNextFreeInvSlot, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ), RepairmanItemQsortCompare );
02894             }
02895             else
02896             {
02897                   // sort this list by object category, and by ascending price within each category
02898                   qsort( gpTempDealersInventory, guiNextFreeInvSlot, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ), ArmsDealerItemQsortCompare );
02899             }
02900       }
02901 
02902       return( TRUE );
02903 }
02904 
02905 
02906 
02907 void AddItemsToTempDealerInventory(UINT16 usItemIndex, SPECIAL_ITEM_INFO *pSpclItemInfo, INT16 sSpecialItemElement, UINT8 ubHowMany, UINT8 ubOwner )
02908 {
02909       UINT8 ubCnt;
02910 
02911 
02912       Assert( ubHowMany > 0 );
02913       Assert( pSpclItemInfo != NULL );
02914 
02915 
02916       // if there's just one of them
02917       if ( ubHowMany == 1 )
02918       {
02919             // it gets its own box, obviously
02920             StoreObjectsInNextFreeDealerInvSlot( usItemIndex, pSpclItemInfo, sSpecialItemElement, 1, ubOwner );
02921       }
02922       else  // more than one
02923       {
02924             // if the items can be stacked
02925             // NOTE: This test must match the one inside CountDistinctItemsInArmsDealersInventory() exactly!
02926             if ( DealerItemIsSafeToStack( usItemIndex ) )
02927             {
02928                   // then we can store them all together in the same box safely, even if there's more than MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT
02929                   StoreObjectsInNextFreeDealerInvSlot( usItemIndex, pSpclItemInfo, sSpecialItemElement, ubHowMany, ubOwner );
02930             }
02931             else
02932             {
02933                   // non-stacking items must be stored in one / box , because each may have unique fields besides bStatus[]
02934                   // Example: guns all have ammo, ammo type, etc.  We need these uniquely represented for pricing & manipulation
02935                   for ( ubCnt = 0; ubCnt < ubHowMany; ubCnt++ )
02936                   {
02937                         StoreObjectsInNextFreeDealerInvSlot( usItemIndex, pSpclItemInfo, sSpecialItemElement, 1, ubOwner );
02938                   }
02939             }
02940       }
02941 }
02942 
02943 
02944 
02945 void StoreObjectsInNextFreeDealerInvSlot( UINT16 usItemIndex, SPECIAL_ITEM_INFO *pSpclItemInfo, INT16 sSpecialItemElement, UINT8 ubHowMany, UINT8 ubOwner )
02946 {
02947       INVENTORY_IN_SLOT *pDealerInvSlot;
02948 
02949 
02950       // make sure we have the room (memory allocated for it)
02951       Assert( guiNextFreeInvSlot < gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems );
02952 
02953       pDealerInvSlot = &(gpTempDealersInventory[ guiNextFreeInvSlot ]);
02954       guiNextFreeInvSlot++;
02955 
02956       pDealerInvSlot->fActive = TRUE;
02957       pDealerInvSlot->sItemIndex = usItemIndex;
02958       pDealerInvSlot->sSpecialItemElement = sSpecialItemElement;
02959       pDealerInvSlot->ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem = ubOwner;
02960       pDealerInvSlot->bSlotIdInOtherLocation = -1;
02961 
02962       // Create the item object ( with no more than MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT )
02963       // can't use the real #, because CreateItems() will blindly set the bStatus for however many we tell it, beyond 8
02964       MakeObjectOutOfDealerItems( usItemIndex, pSpclItemInfo, &(pDealerInvSlot->ItemObject), ( UINT8 ) min( ubHowMany, MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT ) );
02965 
02966       if ( ubHowMany > MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT )
02967       {
02968             // HACK:  Override ItemObject->ubNumberOfObjects (1-8) with the REAL # of items in this box.
02969             // Note that this makes it an illegal OBJECTTYPE, since there ubHowMany can easily be more than MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT,
02970             // so there's no room to store the status of all of them one.  But we only so this for perfect items, so 
02971             // we don't care, it works & saves us a lot hassles here.  Just be careful using the damn things!!!  You can't just
02972             // pass them off the most functions in Items.C(), use ShopkeeperAutoPlaceObject() and ShopkeeperAddItemToPool() instead.
02973             pDealerInvSlot->ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects = ubHowMany;
02974       }
02975 }
02976 
02977 
02978 
02979 BOOLEAN RepairIsDone(UINT16 usItemIndex, UINT8 ubElement)
02980 {
02981       INVENTORY_IN_SLOT RepairItem;
02982       INT8        bSlotNum;
02983       UINT8       ubCnt;
02984 
02985 
02986       // make a new shopkeeper invslot item out of it
02987       memset( &RepairItem, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
02988 
02989       RepairItem.fActive = TRUE;
02990       RepairItem.sItemIndex = usItemIndex;
02991 
02992       // set the owner of the item.  Slot is always -1 of course.
02993       RepairItem.ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem = gArmsDealersInventory[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ][ usItemIndex ].SpecialItem[ ubElement ].ubOwnerProfileId;
02994       RepairItem.bSlotIdInOtherLocation = -1;
02995 
02996       // Create the item object
02997       MakeObjectOutOfDealerItems( usItemIndex, &( gArmsDealersInventory[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ][ usItemIndex ].SpecialItem[ ubElement ].Info ), &RepairItem.ItemObject, 1 );
02998 
02999       if ( CanDealerRepairItem( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, RepairItem.ItemObject.usItem ) )
03000       {
03001             // make its condition 100%
03002             RepairItem.ItemObject.bStatus[ 0 ] = 100;
03003       }
03004 
03005       // max condition of all permanent attachments on it
03006       for ( ubCnt = 0; ubCnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; ubCnt++ )
03007       {
03008             if ( RepairItem.ItemObject.usAttachItem[ ubCnt ] != NONE )
03009             {
03010 /* ARM: Can now repair with removeable attachments still attached...
03011                   // If the attachment is a permanent one
03012                   if ( Item[ RepairItem.ItemObject.usAttachItem[ ubCnt ] ].fFlags & ITEM_INSEPARABLE )
03013 */
03014                   if ( CanDealerRepairItem( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, RepairItem.ItemObject.usAttachItem[ ubCnt ] ) )
03015                   {
03016                         // fix it up
03017                         RepairItem.ItemObject.bAttachStatus[ ubCnt ] = 100;
03018                   }
03019             }
03020       }
03021 
03022       // if the item is imprinted (by anyone, even player's mercs), and it's Fredo repairing it
03023       if ( /*( gArmsDealersInventory[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ][ usItemIndex ].SpecialItem[ ubElement ].Info.ubImprintID == (NO_PROFILE + 1) ) && */
03024              ( gbSelectedArmsDealerID == ARMS_DEALER_FREDO ) )
03025       {
03026             // then reset the imprinting!
03027             RepairItem.ItemObject.ubImprintID = NO_PROFILE;
03028       }
03029 
03030       //try to add the item to the players offer area
03031       bSlotNum = AddItemToPlayersOfferArea( RepairItem.ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem, &RepairItem, -1 );
03032       // if there wasn't room for it
03033       if( bSlotNum == -1 )
03034       {
03035             // then we have to treat it like it's not done yet!
03036             return(FALSE);
03037       }
03038 
03039       PlayersOfferArea[ bSlotNum ].uiFlags |= ARMS_INV_ITEM_REPAIRED;
03040 
03041       // Remove the repaired item from the dealer's permanent inventory list
03042       RemoveSpecialItemFromArmsDealerInventoryAtElement( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, usItemIndex, ubElement );
03043 
03044       // one less slot is needed.  Don't bother ReMemAllocating, though
03045       gSelectArmsDealerInfo.uiNumDistinctInventoryItems--;
03046 
03047       // there was room to add it to player's area
03048       return(TRUE);
03049 }
03050 
03051 
03052 void DrawHatchOnInventory( UINT32 uiSurface, UINT16 usPosX, UINT16 usPosY, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight )
03053 {
03054       UINT8  *pDestBuf;
03055       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
03056       SGPRect ClipRect;
03057       static UINT8 Pattern[8][8] =
03058       {
03059             1,0,1,0,1,0,1,0,
03060             0,1,0,1,0,1,0,1,
03061             1,0,1,0,1,0,1,0,
03062             0,1,0,1,0,1,0,1,
03063             1,0,1,0,1,0,1,0,
03064             0,1,0,1,0,1,0,1,
03065             1,0,1,0,1,0,1,0,
03066             0,1,0,1,0,1,0,1
03067       };
03068       ClipRect.iLeft = usPosX;
03069       ClipRect.iRight = usPosX + usWidth;
03070       ClipRect.iTop = usPosY;
03071       ClipRect.iBottom = usPosY + usHeight;
03072 
03073       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( uiSurface, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
03074       Blt16BPPBufferPixelateRect( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, &ClipRect, Pattern );
03075       UnLockVideoSurface( uiSurface );
03076 }
03077 
03078 
03079 UINT32 CalcShopKeeperItemPrice( BOOLEAN fDealerSelling, BOOLEAN fUnitPriceOnly, UINT16 usItemID, FLOAT dModifier, OBJECTTYPE *pItemObject )
03080 {
03081       UINT8       ubCnt;
03082       UINT32      uiUnitPrice = 0;
03083       UINT32      uiTotalPrice = 0;
03084       UINT8       ubItemsToCount = 0;
03085       UINT8       ubItemsNotCounted = 0;
03086       UINT32      uiDiscountValue;
03087 //    UINT32      uiDifFrom10 = 0;
03088 
03089 
03090       // add up value of the main item(s), exact procedure depends on its item class
03091       switch ( Item [ usItemID ].usItemClass )
03092       {
03093             case IC_GUN:
03094                   // add value of the gun
03095                   uiUnitPrice += (UINT32)( CalcValueOfItemToDealer( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, usItemID, fDealerSelling ) *
03096                                                              ItemConditionModifier(usItemID, pItemObject->bGunStatus) *
03097                                                              dModifier );
03098 
03099                   // if any ammo is loaded
03100                   if( pItemObject->usGunAmmoItem != NONE)
03101                   {
03102                         // if it's regular ammo
03103                         if( Item[ pItemObject->usGunAmmoItem ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO )
03104                         {
03105                               // add value of its remaining ammo
03106                               uiUnitPrice += (UINT32)( CalcValueOfItemToDealer( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, pItemObject->usGunAmmoItem, fDealerSelling ) *
03107                                                                                                              ItemConditionModifier(pItemObject->usGunAmmoItem, pItemObject->ubGunShotsLeft) *
03108                                                                                                              dModifier );
03109                         }
03110                         else  // assume it's attached ammo (mortar shells, grenades)
03111                         {
03112                               // add its value (uses normal status 0-100)
03113                               uiUnitPrice += (UINT32)( CalcValueOfItemToDealer( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, pItemObject->usGunAmmoItem, fDealerSelling ) *
03114                                                                                                              ItemConditionModifier(pItemObject->usGunAmmoItem, pItemObject->bGunAmmoStatus) *
03115                                                                                                              dModifier );
03116                         }
03117                   }
03118 
03119                   // if multiple guns are stacked, we've only counted the first one
03120                   ubItemsNotCounted = pItemObject->ubNumberOfObjects - 1;
03121                   break;
03122 
03123             case IC_AMMO:
03124                   //Madd: quick fix for negative prices at Tony's
03125                   // this must handle overloaded objects from dealer boxes!
03126                   if ( pItemObject->ubNumberOfObjects <= MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT )
03127                   {
03128                         // legal amount, count them all normally (statuses could be different)
03129                         ubItemsToCount = pItemObject->ubNumberOfObjects;
03130                         ubItemsNotCounted = 0;
03131                         // in this situation, uiUnitPrice will actually be the sum of the values of ALL the multiple objects
03132                   }
03133                   else
03134                   {
03135                         // overloaded amount, count just the first, the others must all be identical
03136                         ubItemsToCount = 1;
03137                         ubItemsNotCounted = pItemObject->ubNumberOfObjects - 1;
03138                   }
03139 
03140                   // add the value of each magazine (multiple mags may have vastly different #bullets left)
03141                   for (ubCnt = 0; ubCnt < ubItemsToCount; ubCnt++ )
03142                   {
03143                         // for bullets, ItemConditionModifier will convert the #ShotsLeft into a percentage
03144                         uiUnitPrice += (UINT32)( CalcValueOfItemToDealer( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, usItemID, fDealerSelling ) *
03145                                                                                                        ItemConditionModifier(usItemID, pItemObject->ubShotsLeft[ubCnt]) *
03146                                                                                                        dModifier );
03147 
03148                         if ( fUnitPriceOnly )
03149                         {
03150                               // want price for only one of them.  All statuses must be the same in order to use this flag!
03151                               break;
03152                         }
03153                   }
03154                   break;
03155             default:
03156                   // this must handle overloaded objects from dealer boxes!
03157                   if ( pItemObject->ubNumberOfObjects <= MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT )
03158                   {
03159                         // legal amount, count them all normally (statuses could be different)
03160                         ubItemsToCount = pItemObject->ubNumberOfObjects;
03161                         ubItemsNotCounted = 0;
03162                         // in this situation, uiUnitPrice will actually be the sum of the values of ALL the multiple objects
03163                   }
03164                   else
03165                   {
03166                         // overloaded amount, count just the first, the others must all be identical
03167                         ubItemsToCount = 1;
03168                         ubItemsNotCounted = pItemObject->ubNumberOfObjects - 1;
03169                   }
03170 
03171                   // add the value of each magazine (multiple mags may have vastly different #bullets left)
03172                   for (ubCnt = 0; ubCnt < ubItemsToCount; ubCnt++ )
03173                   {
03174                         // for bullets, ItemConditionModifier will convert the #ShotsLeft into a percentage
03175                         uiUnitPrice += (UINT32)( CalcValueOfItemToDealer( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, usItemID, fDealerSelling ) *
03176                                                                                                        ItemConditionModifier(usItemID, pItemObject->bStatus[ ubCnt ]) *
03177                                                                                                        dModifier );
03178 
03179                         if ( fUnitPriceOnly )
03180                         {
03181                               // want price for only one of them.  All statuses must be the same in order to use this flag!
03182                               break;
03183                         }
03184                   }
03185                   break;
03186       }
03187 
03188 
03189       // loop through any attachments and add in their price
03190       for( ubCnt = 0; ubCnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; ubCnt++)
03191       {
03192             if( pItemObject->usAttachItem[ ubCnt ] != NONE )
03193             {
03194                   // add value of this particular attachment
03195                   uiUnitPrice += (UINT32)( CalcValueOfItemToDealer( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, pItemObject->usAttachItem[ ubCnt ], fDealerSelling ) *
03196                                                                                                 ItemConditionModifier(pItemObject->usAttachItem[ ubCnt ], pItemObject->bAttachStatus[ ubCnt ]) *
03197                                                                                                 dModifier );
03198             }
03199       }
03200 
03201 
03202       // if Flo is doing the dealin' and wheelin'
03203       if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->ubProfile == FLO )
03204       {
03205             // if it's a GUN or AMMO (but not Launchers, and all attachments and payload is included)
03206             switch ( Item [ usItemID ].usItemClass )
03207             {
03208                   case IC_GUN:
03209                   case IC_AMMO:
03210                         uiDiscountValue = ( uiUnitPrice * FLO_DISCOUNT_PERCENTAGE ) / 100;
03211 
03212                         // she gets a discount!  Read her M.E.R.C. profile to understand why
03213                         if ( fDealerSelling )
03214                         {
03215                               // she buys for less...
03216                               uiUnitPrice -= uiDiscountValue;
03217                         }
03218                         else
03219                         {
03220                               // and sells for more!
03221                               uiUnitPrice += uiDiscountValue;
03222                         }
03223                         break;
03224             }
03225       }
03226 
03227 
03228       // if it's the dealer selling this, make sure the item is worth at least $1
03229       // if he is buying this from a player, then we allow a value of 0, since that has a special "worthless" quote #18
03230       if( fDealerSelling && ( uiUnitPrice == 0 ) )
03231       {
03232             uiUnitPrice = 1;
03233       }
03234 
03235 /*
03236       //if the price is not diviseble by 10, make it so
03237       uiDifFrom10 = 10 - uiUnitPrice % 10;
03238       if( uiDifFrom10 != 0 && uiDifFrom10 != 10 )
03239       {
03240             uiUnitPrice += uiDifFrom10;
03241       }
03242 */
03243 
03244       // we're always count the first one
03245       uiTotalPrice = uiUnitPrice;
03246 
03247       // if NOT pricing just one
03248       if ( !fUnitPriceOnly )
03249       {
03250             // add value of all that weren't already counted
03251             uiTotalPrice += ( ubItemsNotCounted * uiUnitPrice );
03252       }
03253 
03254       return( uiTotalPrice );
03255 }
03256 
03257 
03258 FLOAT ItemConditionModifier(UINT16 usItemIndex, INT16 bStatus)
03259 {
03260       FLOAT dConditionModifier = 1.0f;
03261 
03262       //if the item is ammo, the condition modifier is based on how many shots are left 
03263       if( Item[ usItemIndex ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO )
03264       {
03265             // # bullets left / max magazine capacity
03266             dConditionModifier = ( bStatus / (FLOAT) Magazine[ Item[ usItemIndex ].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize );
03267       }
03268       else  // non-ammo
03269       {
03270             // handle non-ammo payloads in jammed guns as if they weren't
03271             if ( bStatus < 0 )
03272             {
03273                   bStatus *= -1;
03274             }
03275 
03276             // an item at 100% is worth full price...
03277 
03278 //          if ( Item[ usItemIndex ].fFlags & ITEM_REPAIRABLE )
03279             if ( Item[ usItemIndex ].repairable  )
03280             {
03281                   // a REPAIRABLE item at 0% is still worth 50% of its full price, not 0%
03282                   dConditionModifier = 0.5f + ( bStatus / (FLOAT)200 );
03283             }
03284             else
03285             {
03286                   // an UNREPAIRABLE item is worth precisely its condition percentage 
03287                   dConditionModifier = bStatus / (FLOAT)100;
03288             }
03289       }
03290 
03291       return( dConditionModifier );
03292 }
03293 
03294 
03295 void DisplayArmsDealerOfferArea()
03296 {
03297       INT16       sCnt, sCount;
03298       CHAR16      zTemp[32];
03299       UINT32      uiTotalCost;
03300       UINT16      usPosX, usPosY;
03301       BOOLEAN fDisplayHatchOnItem;
03302 
03303 
03304       usPosX = SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_TRADING_INV_X;
03305       usPosY = SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_TRADING_INV_Y;
03306 
03307       if( gubSkiDirtyLevel != SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL0 )
03308       {
03309             //Restore the area before blitting the new data on
03310             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( usPosX, usPosY, SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_TRADING_INV_WIDTH, SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_TRADING_INV_HEIGHT );
03311       }
03312 
03313       sCount = 0;
03314 
03315       //Display all the items that are in the Arms traders offered area
03316       uiTotalCost = 0;
03317       for( sCnt=0; sCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; sCnt++)
03318       {
03319             if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ sCnt ].fActive )
03320             {
03321                   // hatch it out if region is disabled
03322                   if ( !( gDealersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ sCnt ].uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_ENABLED ) )
03323                   {
03324                         fDisplayHatchOnItem = TRUE;
03325                   }
03326                   else if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ sCnt ].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_ITEM_SELECTED )
03327                   {
03328                         fDisplayHatchOnItem = TRUE;
03329                   }
03330                   else
03331                         fDisplayHatchOnItem = FALSE;
03332 
03333                   // Display the inventory slot
03334                   uiTotalCost += DisplayInvSlot( (UINT8)sCnt, ArmsDealerOfferArea[ sCnt ].sItemIndex, usPosX, usPosY, 
03335                                                                   &ArmsDealerOfferArea[ sCnt ].ItemObject,
03336                                                                   fDisplayHatchOnItem,
03337                                                                   ARMS_DEALER_OFFER_AREA );
03338             }
03339             else  // empty
03340             {
03341                   // hatch it out if region is disabled
03342                   if ( !( gDealersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ sCnt ].uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_ENABLED ) )
03343                   {
03344                         HatchOutInvSlot( usPosX, usPosY );
03345                   }
03346             }
03347 
03348             usPosX += SKI_INV_OFFSET_X;
03349 
03350             sCount++;
03351 
03352             //if we are on to the next row
03353             if( !( sCount % SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_COLS ) )
03354             {
03355                   usPosX = SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_TRADING_INV_X;
03356                   usPosY += SKI_INV_OFFSET_Y;
03357             }
03358       }
03359 
03360       if( gubSkiDirtyLevel == SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2 )
03361       {
03362             //
03363             //Display the Total cost text and number
03364             //
03365 
03366             //Restore the previous area
03367             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( SKI_ARMS_DEALER_TOTAL_COST_X, SKI_ARMS_DEALER_TOTAL_COST_Y, SKI_ARMS_DEALER_TOTAL_COST_WIDTH, SKI_ARMS_DEALER_TOTAL_COST_HEIGHT );
03368 
03369             //Display the total cost text
03370             swprintf( zTemp, L"%d", uiTotalCost );
03371             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( zTemp );
03372             InsertDollarSignInToString( zTemp );
03373             DrawTextToScreen( zTemp, SKI_ARMS_DEALER_TOTAL_COST_X, (UINT16)(SKI_ARMS_DEALER_TOTAL_COST_Y+5), SKI_INV_SLOT_WIDTH, SKI_LABEL_FONT, SKI_ITEM_PRICE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );    
03374       }
03375 }
03376 
03377 
03378 INT8 AddItemToArmsDealerOfferArea( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT* pInvSlot, INT8 bSlotIdInOtherLocation )
03379 {
03380       INT8  bCnt;
03381 
03382       for( bCnt=0; bCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; bCnt++)
03383       {
03384             //if there are no items here, copy the data in
03385             if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[bCnt].fActive == FALSE )
03386             {
03387                   //Copy the inventory items
03388                   memcpy( &ArmsDealerOfferArea[bCnt], pInvSlot, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
03389 
03390                   //if the shift key is being pressed, add them all
03391                   if( gfKeyState[ SHIFT ] )
03392                         ArmsDealerOfferArea[bCnt].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects = pInvSlot->ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects;
03393                   //If there was more then 1 item, reduce it to only 1 item moved
03394                   else if( pInvSlot->ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects > 1 )
03395                         ArmsDealerOfferArea[bCnt].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects = 1;
03396 
03397                   //Remember where the item came from
03398                   ArmsDealerOfferArea[bCnt].bSlotIdInOtherLocation = bSlotIdInOtherLocation;
03399                   ArmsDealerOfferArea[bCnt].ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem = pInvSlot->ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem;
03400                   ArmsDealerOfferArea[bCnt].fActive = TRUE;
03401 
03402                   SetSkiRegionHelpText( &ArmsDealerOfferArea[bCnt], &gDealersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ bCnt ], ARMS_DEALER_OFFER_AREA );
03403                   SetSkiFaceRegionHelpText( &ArmsDealerOfferArea[bCnt], &gDealersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ bCnt ], ARMS_DEALER_OFFER_AREA );
03404 
03405                   gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
03406                   return( bCnt );
03407             }
03408       }
03409 
03410       return( -1 );
03411 }
03412 
03413 BOOLEAN RemoveItemFromArmsDealerOfferArea( INT8 bSlotId, BOOLEAN fKeepItem )
03414 {
03415 //    UINT16      usCnt;
03416 
03417       //Loop through all the slot to see if the requested one is here
03418 //    for( usCnt=0; usCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; usCnt++)
03419       {
03420             //if this is the requested slot
03421             if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[bSlotId].fActive )//bSlotIdInOtherLocation == bSlotIdInOtherLocation )
03422             {
03423                   //if there are more then 1 item
03424 //                if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ usCnt ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects > 1 )
03425                   if( fKeepItem )
03426                   {
03427                         gpTempDealersInventory[ ArmsDealerOfferArea[bSlotId].bSlotIdInOtherLocation ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects += ArmsDealerOfferArea[ bSlotId ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects;
03428                   }
03429 
03430                   //Clear the flag that hatches out the item
03431                   gpTempDealersInventory[ ArmsDealerOfferArea[bSlotId].bSlotIdInOtherLocation ].uiFlags &= ~ARMS_INV_ITEM_SELECTED;
03432 
03433                   ClearArmsDealerOfferSlot( bSlotId );
03434 
03435                   return( TRUE );
03436             }
03437       }
03438 
03439       return( FALSE );
03440 }
03441 
03442 
03443 void SetSkiRegionHelpText( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT *pInv, MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, UINT8 ubScreenArea )
03444 {
03445       CHAR16 zHelpText[ 512 ];
03446 
03447       Assert( pRegion );
03448 
03449       BuildItemHelpTextString( zHelpText, pInv, ubScreenArea );
03450 
03451       SetRegionFastHelpText( pRegion, zHelpText );
03452       SetRegionHelpEndCallback( pRegion, SkiHelpTextDoneCallBack );
03453 }
03454 
03455 
03456 void SetSkiFaceRegionHelpText( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT *pInv, MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, UINT8 ubScreenArea )
03457 {
03458       CHAR16 zTempText[ 512 ];
03459       CHAR16 zHelpText[ 512 ];
03460 
03461       Assert( pRegion );
03462 
03463       //if the item isn't NULL, and is owned by a merc
03464       if( ( pInv != NULL ) && ( pInv->ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem != NO_PROFILE ) )
03465       {
03466             BuildItemHelpTextString( zTempText, pInv, ubScreenArea );
03467             // add who owns it
03468             swprintf( zHelpText, L"%s%s %s", gMercProfiles[ pInv->ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem ].zNickname, pMessageStrings[ MSG_DASH_S ], zTempText );
03469       }
03470       else
03471       {
03472             zHelpText[ 0 ] = '\0';
03473       }
03474 
03475       SetRegionFastHelpText( pRegion, zHelpText );
03476       SetRegionHelpEndCallback( pRegion, SkiHelpTextDoneCallBack );
03477 }
03478 
03479 
03480 void SkiHelpTextDoneCallBack( void )
03481 {
03482       gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
03483 }
03484 
03485 
03486 
03487 INT8 AddItemToPlayersOfferArea( UINT8 ubProfileID, INVENTORY_IN_SLOT* pInvSlot, INT8 bSlotIdInOtherLocation )
03488 {
03489       INT8  bCnt;
03490 
03491       //if we are to check for a previous slot
03492       if( bSlotIdInOtherLocation != -1 )
03493       {
03494             //if the item has already been added somewhere. don't add it again
03495             if( GetPtrToOfferSlotWhereThisItemIs( ubProfileID, bSlotIdInOtherLocation ) != NULL )
03496                   return( -1 );
03497       }
03498 
03499 
03500       //look for the first free slot
03501       for( bCnt=0; bCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; bCnt++)
03502       {
03503             //if there are no items here, copy the data in
03504             if( PlayersOfferArea[bCnt].fActive == FALSE )
03505             {
03506                   memcpy( &PlayersOfferArea[bCnt], pInvSlot, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
03507 
03508                   PlayersOfferArea[bCnt].fActive = TRUE;
03509 
03510                   //Specify the owner of the merc
03511                   PlayersOfferArea[bCnt].ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem = ubProfileID;
03512                   PlayersOfferArea[bCnt].bSlotIdInOtherLocation = bSlotIdInOtherLocation;
03513 
03514                   IfMercOwnedCopyItemToMercInv( &(PlayersOfferArea[bCnt]) );
03515 
03516                   SetSkiRegionHelpText( &PlayersOfferArea[bCnt], &gPlayersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ bCnt ], PLAYERS_OFFER_AREA );
03517                   SetSkiFaceRegionHelpText( &PlayersOfferArea[bCnt], &gPlayersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ bCnt ], PLAYERS_OFFER_AREA );
03518 
03519 
03520                   //if the item we are adding is money
03521                   if( Item[ PlayersOfferArea[ bCnt ].sItemIndex ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
03522                   {
03523                         //Since money is always evaluated
03524                         PlayersOfferArea[ bCnt ].uiFlags |= ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_VALUE;
03525                         PlayersOfferArea[ bCnt ].uiItemPrice = PlayersOfferArea[ bCnt ].ItemObject.uiMoneyAmount;
03526                   }
03527                   gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
03528 
03529                   return( bCnt );
03530             }
03531       }
03532 
03533       return( -1 );
03534 }
03535 
03536 BOOLEAN RemoveItemFromPlayersOfferArea( INT8 bSlot )
03537 {
03538       //if the item doesn't have a duplicate copy in its owner merc's inventory slot
03539       if( PlayersOfferArea[ bSlot ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation == -1 )
03540       {
03541             if ( !SKITryToReturnInvToOwnerOrCurrentMerc( &( PlayersOfferArea[ bSlot ] ) ) )
03542             {
03543                   //failed to add item, inventory probably filled up or item is unowned and current merc ineligible
03544                   return( FALSE );
03545             }
03546       }
03547 
03548       // Clear the contents
03549       ClearPlayersOfferSlot( bSlot );
03550 
03551       // Dirty 
03552       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
03553       gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL1;
03554       return( TRUE );
03555 }
03556 
03557 
03558 void DisplayPlayersOfferArea()
03559 {
03560       INT16       sCnt, sCount;
03561       CHAR16      zTemp[32];
03562       UINT32      uiTotalCost;
03563       UINT16      usPosX, usPosY;
03564       BOOLEAN     fDisplayHatchOnItem=FALSE;
03565 
03566 
03567       usPosX = SKI_PLAYERS_TRADING_INV_X;
03568       usPosY = SKI_PLAYERS_TRADING_INV_Y;
03569 
03570       if( gubSkiDirtyLevel == SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2 )
03571       {
03572             //Restore the area before blitting the new data on
03573             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( SKI_PLAYERS_TRADING_INV_X, SKI_PLAYERS_TRADING_INV_Y, SKI_PLAYERS_TRADING_INV_WIDTH, SKI_PLAYERS_TRADING_INV_HEIGHT );
03574       }
03575 
03576       sCount = 0;
03577 
03578 
03579       //Display all the items that are in the Players offered area
03580       uiTotalCost = 0;
03581       for( sCnt=0; sCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; sCnt++)
03582       {
03583             if( PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].fActive )
03584             {
03585                   //if the item is money
03586                   if( Item[ PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].sItemIndex ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
03587                   {
03588                         //get an updated status from the amount in the pocket
03589                         if( PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation != -1 && PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem != NO_PROFILE )
03590                         {
03591                               INT16 sSoldierID;
03592 
03593                               sSoldierID = GetSoldierIDFromMercID( PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem );
03594                               Assert(sSoldierID != -1);
03595 
03596                               PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].ItemObject.uiMoneyAmount = Menptr[ sSoldierID ].inv[ PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation ].uiMoneyAmount;
03597                               PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].uiItemPrice = PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].ItemObject.uiMoneyAmount;
03598                         }
03599                   }
03600                   else  // not money
03601                   {
03602                         //if non-repairman
03603                         if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer != ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
03604                         {
03605                               // don't evaluate anything he wouldn't buy!
03606                               if( WillShopKeeperRejectObjectsFromPlayer( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, ( INT8 ) sCnt ) == FALSE )
03607                               {
03608                                     // skip purchased items!
03609                                     if ( !( PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_JUST_PURCHASED ) )
03610                                     {
03611                                           // re-evaluate the value of the item (needed for Flo's discount handling)
03612                                           EvaluateInvSlot( &( PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ] ) );
03613                                     }
03614                               }
03615                         }
03616                   }
03617 
03618                   // hatch it out if it hasn't been evaluated or just purchased
03619 //                fDisplayHatchOnItem = ( PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].uiFlags & ( ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_BEEN_EVALUATED | ARMS_INV_JUST_PURCHASED ) ) == 0;
03620 
03621                   // Display the inventory slot
03622                   DisplayInvSlot( (UINT8)sCnt, PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].sItemIndex, usPosX, usPosY, 
03623                                                                   &PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].ItemObject,
03624                                                                   fDisplayHatchOnItem,
03625                                                                   PLAYERS_OFFER_AREA );
03626 
03627                   if( PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_VALUE )
03628                         uiTotalCost += PlayersOfferArea[ sCnt ].uiItemPrice;
03629             }
03630                   usPosX += SKI_INV_OFFSET_X;
03631 
03632                   sCount++;
03633 
03634                   //if we are on to the next row
03635                   if( !( sCount % SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_COLS ) )
03636                   {
03637                         usPosX = SKI_ARMS_DEALERS_TRADING_INV_X;
03638                         usPosY += SKI_INV_OFFSET_Y;
03639                   }
03640       }
03641 
03642       if( gubSkiDirtyLevel == SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2 )
03643       {
03644             //
03645             //Display the Total value text and number
03646             //
03647 
03648             //Restore the previous area
03649             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( SKI_PLAYERS_TOTAL_VALUE_X, SKI_PLAYERS_TOTAL_VALUE_Y, SKI_PLAYERS_TOTAL_VALUE_WIDTH, SKI_PLAYERS_TOTAL_VALUE_HEIGHT );
03650 
03651             //Display the total cost text
03652             swprintf( zTemp, L"%d", uiTotalCost );
03653             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( zTemp );
03654             InsertDollarSignInToString( zTemp );
03655             DrawTextToScreen( zTemp, SKI_PLAYERS_TOTAL_VALUE_X, (UINT16)(SKI_PLAYERS_TOTAL_VALUE_Y+5), SKI_INV_SLOT_WIDTH, SKI_LABEL_FONT, SKI_ITEM_PRICE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );    
03656       }
03657 
03658       CrossOutUnwantedItems( );
03659 }
03660 
03661 
03662 INVENTORY_IN_SLOT *GetPtrToOfferSlotWhereThisItemIs( UINT8 ubProfileID, INT8 bInvPocket )
03663 {
03664       UINT8 ubCnt = 0;
03665 
03666       for( ubCnt = 0; ubCnt < SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; ubCnt++ )
03667       {
03668             if( ( PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation == bInvPocket ) &&
03669                         ( PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem == ubProfileID ) &&
03670                         ( PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects != 0 ) )
03671             {
03672                   return( &( PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ] ) );
03673             }
03674 
03675             if( ( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubCnt ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation == bInvPocket ) &&
03676                         ( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubCnt ].ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem == ubProfileID ) &&
03677                         ( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubCnt ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects != 0 ) )
03678             {
03679                   return( &( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubCnt ] ) );
03680             }
03681       }
03682 
03683       // not found (perfectly valid result)
03684       return( NULL );
03685 }
03686 
03687 
03688 BOOLEAN ShouldSoldierDisplayHatchOnItem( UINT8 ubProfileID, INT16 sSlotNum )
03689 {
03690       INVENTORY_IN_SLOT *pInvSlot = NULL;
03691 
03692       pInvSlot = GetPtrToOfferSlotWhereThisItemIs( ubProfileID, ( INT8 ) sSlotNum );
03693 
03694       if( pInvSlot == NULL )
03695             // not found in either offer area
03696             return( FALSE );
03697       else
03698             // found it, display it hatched out
03699             return( TRUE );
03700 }
03701 
03702 
03703 UINT32 CalculateTotalArmsDealerCost()
03704 {
03705       UINT32      uiCnt;
03706       UINT32      uiTotal=0;
03707 
03708       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; uiCnt++)
03709       {
03710             if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ uiCnt ].fActive )
03711             {
03712                   //if the dealer repairs
03713                   if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
03714                         uiTotal += CalculateObjectItemRepairCost( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, &( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ uiCnt ].ItemObject ) );
03715                   else
03716                         uiTotal += CalcShopKeeperItemPrice( DEALER_SELLING, FALSE, ArmsDealerOfferArea[ uiCnt ].sItemIndex, ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].dSellModifier, &ArmsDealerOfferArea[uiCnt].ItemObject );
03717             }
03718       }
03719       return( uiTotal );
03720 }
03721 
03722 
03723 UINT32 CalculateTotalPlayersValue()
03724 {
03725       UINT8 ubCnt;
03726       UINT32 uiTotal = 0;
03727 
03728       for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; ubCnt++)
03729       {
03730             if( ( PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].fActive ) && ( PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_VALUE ) )
03731             {
03732                   //Calculate a price for the item
03733                   if( Item[ PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].sItemIndex ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
03734                         uiTotal += PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].ItemObject.uiMoneyAmount;
03735                   else
03736                         uiTotal += PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].uiItemPrice;
03737             }
03738       }
03739 
03740       return( uiTotal );
03741 }
03742 
03743 
03744 void PerformTransaction( UINT32 uiMoneyFromPlayersAccount )
03745 {
03746       UINT32      uiPlayersTotalMoneyValue = CalculateTotalPlayersValue() + uiMoneyFromPlayersAccount;
03747       UINT32      uiArmsDealersItemsCost = CalculateTotalArmsDealerCost();
03748       UINT32      uiMoneyInPlayersOfferArea = CalculateHowMuchMoneyIsInPlayersOfferArea( );
03749       INT32       iChangeToGiveToPlayer = 0;
03750       UINT32      uiAvailablePlayerOfferSlots;
03751 
03752 
03753       //if the player has already requested to leave, get out
03754       if( gfUserHasRequestedToLeave )
03755             return;
03756 
03757 
03758       // handle bribing... if the player is giving the dealer money, without buying anything
03759       if( IsMoneyTheOnlyItemInThePlayersOfferArea( ) && CountNumberOfItemsInTheArmsDealersOfferArea( ) == 0 )
03760       {
03761             // accept/refuse money (varies by dealer according to ACCEPTS_GIFTS flag)
03762             StartShopKeeperTalking( SK_QUOTES_DEALER_OFFERED_MONEY_AS_A_GIFT );
03763 
03764             // if the arms dealer is the kind of person who accepts gifts
03765             if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].uiFlags & ARMS_DEALER_ACCEPTS_GIFTS )
03766             {
03767                   //Move all the players evaluated items to the dealer (also adds it to dealer's cash)
03768                   MovePlayerOfferedItemsOfValueToArmsDealersInventory();
03769 
03770                   DealerGetsBribed( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubShopKeeperID, uiMoneyInPlayersOfferArea );
03771             }
03772       }
03773       else  // not a bribe
03774       {
03775             //if the dealer is not a repairman
03776             if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer != ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
03777             {
03778                   uiAvailablePlayerOfferSlots = ( SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS - CountNumberOfValuelessItemsInThePlayersOfferArea( ) );
03779 
03780                   // always reserve an empty slot for change.  We can't tell for sure whether player is getting change because that
03781                   // could depend on how many items he's trying to buy won't fit - he could only be getting change because of that!
03782                   if ( uiAvailablePlayerOfferSlots > 0 )
03783                   {
03784                         uiAvailablePlayerOfferSlots--;
03785                   }
03786 
03787                   //if there is NOT enough room in the players offer area
03788                   if( CountNumberOfItemsInTheArmsDealersOfferArea( ) > uiAvailablePlayerOfferSlots )
03789                   {
03790                         // tell player there's not enough room in the player's offer area
03791                         DoSkiMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (STR16)SKI_Text[ SKI_TEXT_NO_MORE_ROOM_IN_PLAYER_OFFER_AREA ], SHOPKEEPER_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
03792 
03793                         return;
03794                   }
03795             }
03796 
03797             //if the player doesn't have enough money to pay for what he's buying
03798             if( uiArmsDealersItemsCost > uiPlayersTotalMoneyValue )
03799             {
03800                   //if the player doesn't have enough money in his account to pay the rest
03801                   if( uiArmsDealersItemsCost > uiPlayersTotalMoneyValue + LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance )
03802                   {
03803                         // tell player he can't possibly afford this
03804                         SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SHOPKEEPER, 6,0, 0, giShopKeeperFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_SHOPKEEPER_UI );
03805                         SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SKIP_A_FRAME, 0,0, 0, giShopKeeperFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_SHOPKEEPER_UI );
03806                         SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SHOPKEEPER, 0, ( uiArmsDealersItemsCost - ( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance + uiPlayersTotalMoneyValue ) ), 0, giShopKeeperFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_SHOPKEEPER_UI );
03807                   }
03808                   else
03809                   {
03810                         // player doesn't have enough on the table, but can pay for it from his balance
03811                         /// ask player if wants to subtract the shortfall directly from his balance
03812                         SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SKIP_A_FRAME, 0,0, 0, giShopKeeperFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_SHOPKEEPER_UI );
03813                         SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SHOPKEEPER, 6,0, 0, giShopKeeperFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_SHOPKEEPER_UI );
03814 
03815                         if( uiPlayersTotalMoneyValue )
03816                               SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SHOPKEEPER, 1, ( uiArmsDealersItemsCost - uiPlayersTotalMoneyValue ), 0, giShopKeeperFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_SHOPKEEPER_UI );
03817                         else
03818                               SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SHOPKEEPER, 2, ( uiArmsDealersItemsCost - uiPlayersTotalMoneyValue ), 0, giShopKeeperFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_SHOPKEEPER_UI );
03819                   }
03820 
03821                   SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SHOPKEEPER, 7,0, 0, giShopKeeperFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_SHOPKEEPER_UI );
03822 
03823                   gfResetShopKeepIdleQuote = TRUE;
03824 
03825                   // disable further calls to PerformTransaction() until callback calls us again to free this flag
03826                   gfPerformTransactionInProgress = TRUE;
03827 
03828                   return;
03829             }
03830 
03831 
03832             // to get this far, player should have the money needed!
03833             Assert( uiPlayersTotalMoneyValue >= uiArmsDealersItemsCost );
03834 
03835 
03836             //if the dealer repairs
03837             if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
03838             {
03839                   //Make sure there is enough money in the Player's offer area to cover the repair charge
03840                   if( ( uiMoneyFromPlayersAccount + uiMoneyInPlayersOfferArea ) >= uiArmsDealersItemsCost )
03841                   {
03842                         //Move all the players evaluated items to the dealer ( For a repairman, this means just: get rid of the money )
03843                         MovePlayerOfferedItemsOfValueToArmsDealersInventory();
03844 
03845                         //if the arms dealer is the type of person to give change
03846                         if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].uiFlags & ARMS_DEALER_GIVES_CHANGE )
03847                         {
03848                               //determine the amount of change to give
03849                               iChangeToGiveToPlayer = ( uiMoneyFromPlayersAccount + uiMoneyInPlayersOfferArea ) - uiArmsDealersItemsCost;
03850 
03851                               //if there is change
03852                               if( iChangeToGiveToPlayer > 0 )
03853                               {
03854                                     GivePlayerSomeChange( iChangeToGiveToPlayer );
03855 
03856                                     if( uiArmsDealersItemsCost > 0 )
03857                                     {
03858                                           StartShopKeeperTalking( SK_QUOTES_PLAYER_HAS_TOO_MUCH_MONEY_FOR_TRANSACTION );
03859                                     }
03860                               }
03861                               else
03862                                     StartShopKeeperTalking( SK_QUOTES_PLAYER_HAS_EXACTLY_ENOUGH_MONEY_FOR_TRANSACTION );
03863                         }
03864 
03865 
03866                         // move the offered items to the repairman's inventory
03867                         MovePlayersItemsToBeRepairedToArmsDealersInventory();
03868                   }
03869                   else
03870                   {
03871                         //the player doesn't have enough money
03872                         return;
03873                   }
03874             }
03875             else  // non-repairman
03876             {
03877                   // DON'T include uiMoneyFromPlayersAccount in change given to player.  The only way this can happen is if he agrees
03878                   // to subtract from his balance, but there isn't enough room.  In that case, the cost of items not transfered is
03879                   // used to reduce his balance deduction instead (not here, in the calling function).
03880                   iChangeToGiveToPlayer = CalculateTotalPlayersValue() - uiArmsDealersItemsCost;
03881 
03882 
03883                   //if the arms dealer buys stuff
03884                   if( ( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_BUYS_ONLY ) ||
03885                               ( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_BUYS_SELLS ) )
03886                   {
03887                         // but the dealer can't afford this transaction
03888                         if( iChangeToGiveToPlayer > ( INT32 ) gArmsDealerStatus[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].uiArmsDealersCash )
03889                         {
03890                               // HACK HACK HACK: We forgot to write/record quote 27 for Jake, so he ALWAYS must have enough money!
03891                               if ( gbSelectedArmsDealerID != ARMS_DEALER_JAKE )
03892                               {
03893                                     // no deal - dealer can't afford it
03894                                     StartShopKeeperTalking( SK_QUOTES_CANT_AFFORD_TO_BUY_OR_TOO_MUCH_TO_REPAIR );
03895                                     gfResetShopKeepIdleQuote = TRUE;
03896 
03897                                     return;
03898                               }
03899                         }
03900                   }
03901 
03902 
03903                   //Move all the player's evaluated items to the dealer
03904                   MovePlayerOfferedItemsOfValueToArmsDealersInventory();
03905 
03906                   //Move all dealers offered items to the player
03907                   MoveAllArmsDealersItemsInOfferAreaToPlayersOfferArea( );
03908 
03909 
03910                   //if the arms dealer is the type of person to give change
03911                   if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].uiFlags & ARMS_DEALER_GIVES_CHANGE )
03912                   {
03913                         if( iChangeToGiveToPlayer > 0 )
03914                         {
03915                               GivePlayerSomeChange( iChangeToGiveToPlayer );
03916 
03917 /*
03918                               //Remove the change the arms dealer is returning to the player
03919                               if( ( gArmsDealerStatus[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].uiArmsDealersCash - uiChangeToGiveToPlayer ) >= 0 )
03920                                     gArmsDealerStatus[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].uiArmsDealersCash -= uiChangeToGiveToPlayer;
03921                               else
03922                                     gArmsDealerStatus[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].uiArmsDealersCash = 0;
03923 */
03924 
03925                               if( uiArmsDealersItemsCost == 0 )
03926                               {
03927                                     StartShopKeeperTalking( SK_QUOTES_PLAYER_HAS_EXACTLY_ENOUGH_MONEY_FOR_TRANSACTION );
03928                               }
03929                               else
03930                               {
03931                                     StartShopKeeperTalking( SK_QUOTES_PLAYER_HAS_TOO_MUCH_MONEY_FOR_TRANSACTION );
03932                               }
03933                         }
