03934                         else if( iChangeToGiveToPlayer == 0 )
03935                               StartShopKeeperTalking( SK_QUOTES_PLAYER_HAS_EXACTLY_ENOUGH_MONEY_FOR_TRANSACTION );
03936                   }
03937 
03938 
03939                   //if the arms dealer is tony
03940                   if( gbSelectedArmsDealerID == ARMS_DEALER_TONY )
03941                         gfHavePurchasedItemsFromTony = TRUE;
03942 
03943                   //if the arms dealer is Howard( 125), set fact 222
03944                   if( gbSelectedArmsDealerID == ARMS_DEALER_HOWARD )
03945                         SetFactTrue( 222 );
03946             }
03947 
03948 
03949             // add cash transfered from player's account directly to dealer's cash balance
03950             if( uiMoneyFromPlayersAccount > 0 )
03951             {
03952                   gArmsDealerStatus[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].uiArmsDealersCash += uiMoneyFromPlayersAccount;
03953             }
03954 
03955             //Redraw the screen
03956             gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
03957 
03958             gfDoneBusinessThisSession = TRUE;
03959 
03960             //The shopkeeper's inventory has changed, reinitialize
03961             InitializeShopKeeper( FALSE );
03962       }
03963 
03964 
03965       gfResetShopKeepIdleQuote = TRUE;
03966 
03967       return;
03968 }
03969 
03970 
03971 void MoveAllArmsDealersItemsInOfferAreaToPlayersOfferArea( )
03972 {
03973       //for all items in the dealers items offer area
03974       UINT32      uiCnt;
03975       UINT32      uiTotal=0;
03976       INT8        bSlotID=0;
03977 
03978       //loop through all the slots in the shopkeeper's offer area
03979       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; uiCnt++)
03980       {
03981             //if there is an item here
03982             if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ uiCnt ].fActive )
03983             {
03984                   bSlotID = AddItemToPlayersOfferArea( NO_PROFILE, &ArmsDealerOfferArea[ uiCnt ], -1 );
03985 
03986                   if( bSlotID != -1 )
03987                   {
03988                         PlayersOfferArea[ bSlotID ].uiFlags |= ARMS_INV_JUST_PURCHASED;
03989 
03990                         //if the player has just purchased a VIDEO_CAMERA from Franz Hinkle
03991                         if( ( gbSelectedArmsDealerID == ARMS_DEALER_FRANZ ) && ( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ uiCnt ].sItemIndex == VIDEO_CAMERA ) )
03992                         {
03993                               // set a special flag
03994                               gArmsDealerStatus[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubSpecificDealerFlags |= ARMS_DEALER_FLAG__FRANZ_HAS_SOLD_VIDEO_CAMERA_TO_PLAYER;
03995                         }
03996                   }
03997 
03998                   
03999                   //Remove the items out of the dealers inventory
04000                   RemoveItemFromDealersInventory( &ArmsDealerOfferArea[ uiCnt ], (UINT8)ArmsDealerOfferArea[ uiCnt ].bSlotIdInOtherLocation );
04001 
04002                   //Remove the items from the Shopkeepers Offer area
04003                   if( !RemoveItemFromArmsDealerOfferArea( (UINT8)uiCnt, FALSE ) )//ArmsDealerOfferArea[uiCnt].bSlotIdInOtherLocation
04004                         Assert( 0 );
04005 
04006                   if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[uiCnt].fActive )
04007                         Assert(0);
04008             }
04009       }
04010 
04011       //loop through all the slots in the shopkeeper's offer area
04012       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; uiCnt++)
04013       {
04014             if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[uiCnt].fActive )
04015                   Assert(0);
04016       }
04017 
04018 }
04019 
04020 BOOLEAN RemoveItemFromDealersInventory( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT* pInvSlot, UINT8 ubSlot )
04021 {
04022       INT16       sInvSlot;
04023       INT16       sItemID; 
04024       SPECIAL_ITEM_INFO SpclItemInfo;
04025 
04026       sInvSlot = ubSlot;
04027 //    sInvSlot = ( gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage - 1 ) * SKI_NUM_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_SLOTS + ubSlot;
04028 
04029       //Remove all of this item out of the specified inventory slot
04030       sItemID = gpTempDealersInventory[ sInvSlot ].sItemIndex;
04031       SetSpecialItemInfoFromObject( &SpclItemInfo, &(pInvSlot->ItemObject) );
04032       RemoveItemFromArmsDealerInventory( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, sItemID, &SpclItemInfo, pInvSlot->ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects );
04033 
04034       gfResetShopKeepIdleQuote = TRUE;
04035       return( TRUE );
04036 }
04037 
04038 void MovePlayerOfferedItemsOfValueToArmsDealersInventory()
04039 {
04040       UINT32      uiCnt;
04041 
04042       //loop through all the slots in the players offer area
04043       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; uiCnt++)
04044       {
04045             //if there is an item here
04046             if( PlayersOfferArea[ uiCnt ].fActive )
04047             {
04048                   // and it has value
04049                   if( PlayersOfferArea[ uiCnt ].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_VALUE )
04050                   {
04051                         //Remove the item from the owner merc's inventory
04052                         IfMercOwnedRemoveItemFromMercInv( &(PlayersOfferArea[ uiCnt ]) );
04053 
04054                         //if the item is money
04055                         if( Item[ PlayersOfferArea[ uiCnt ].sItemIndex ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
04056                         {
04057                               //add the money to the dealers 'cash'
04058                               gArmsDealerStatus[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].uiArmsDealersCash += PlayersOfferArea[ uiCnt ].ItemObject.uiMoneyAmount;
04059                         }
04060                         else
04061                         {
04062                               //if the dealer doesn't strictly buy items from the player, give the item to the dealer
04063                               if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer != ARMS_DEALER_BUYS_ONLY )
04064                               {
04065                                     // item cease to be merc-owned during this operation
04066                                     AddObjectToArmsDealerInventory( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, &( PlayersOfferArea[ uiCnt ].ItemObject ) );
04067                               }
04068                         }
04069 
04070                         //erase the item from the player's offer area
04071                         ClearPlayersOfferSlot( uiCnt );
04072                   }
04073             }
04074       }
04075 
04076       gfResetShopKeepIdleQuote = TRUE;
04077 }
04078 
04079 
04080 
04081 void BeginSkiItemPointer( UINT8 ubSource, INT8 bSlotNum, BOOLEAN fOfferToDealerFirst )
04082 {
04083       SGPRect                 Rect;
04084       OBJECTTYPE  TempObject;
04085 
04086 /*
04087       // If we are already moving an item
04088       if ( gMoveingItem.sItemIndex != 0 )
04089       {
04090             return;
04091       }
04092 */
04093 
04094       switch( ubSource )
04095       {
04096             case ARMS_DEALER_INVENTORY:
04097                   //Should never get in here
04098                   Assert( 0 );
04099                   return;
04100                   break;
04101 
04102             case ARMS_DEALER_OFFER_AREA:
04103                   //Get the item from the slot.
04104                   memcpy( &gMoveingItem, &ArmsDealerOfferArea[ bSlotNum ], sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
04105                   IfMercOwnedRemoveItemFromMercInv( &gMoveingItem );
04106 
04107                   //remove the item from the slot
04108                   ClearArmsDealerOfferSlot( bSlotNum );
04109 
04110 
04111                   //Restrict the cursor to the arms dealer offer area, players offer area and the players inventory
04112                   Rect.iLeft = 0;//SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_X;
04113                   Rect.iTop = SKI_DEALER_OFFER_AREA_Y;
04114                   Rect.iRight = SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_X + SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_WIDTH;
04115                   Rect.iBottom = SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_Y + SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_HEIGHT;
04116 
04117                   gpItemPointer = &gMoveingItem.ItemObject;
04118 
04119                   //if there is an owner of the item
04120                   if( gMoveingItem.ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem != -1 )
04121                   {
04122                         gpItemPointerSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( gMoveingItem.ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem, TRUE );
04123                         //make sure the soldier is not null
04124                         if( gpItemPointerSoldier == NULL )
04125                         {
04126                               gpItemPointerSoldier = gpSMCurrentMerc;
04127                         }
04128                   }
04129                   else
04130                         gpItemPointerSoldier = gpSMCurrentMerc;
04131 
04132                   break;
04133 
04134 
04135             case PLAYERS_OFFER_AREA:
04136                   //Get the item from the slot.
04137                   memcpy( &gMoveingItem, &PlayersOfferArea[ bSlotNum ], sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
04138 
04139                   // if the slot is overloaded (holds more objects than we have room for valid statuses of)
04140                   if ( PlayersOfferArea[ bSlotNum ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects > MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT )
04141                   {
04142                         // allow only MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT of those objects to be picked up at a time
04143                         // (sure it kind of sucks, but it's a lot easier than handling overloaded cursor objects in Interface Items!
04144                         gMoveingItem.ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects = MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT;
04145 
04146                         // decrease the number objects left in the slot by that much instead of deleting it
04147                         PlayersOfferArea[ bSlotNum ].ItemObject.ubNumberOfObjects -= MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT;
04148                   }
04149                   else  // completely legal object
04150                   {
04151                         // NOTE: a merc-owned object can never be "overloaded", so no problem here
04152                         IfMercOwnedRemoveItemFromMercInv( &gMoveingItem );
04153 
04154                         //remove the item from the slot
04155                         ClearPlayersOfferSlot( bSlotNum );
04156                   }
04157 
04158                   //Restrict the cursor to the players offer area and the players inventory
04159                   Rect.iLeft = 0;//SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_X;
04160                   Rect.iTop = SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_Y;
04161                   Rect.iRight = SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_X + SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_WIDTH;
04162                   Rect.iBottom = SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_Y + SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_HEIGHT;
04163 
04164                   gpItemPointer = &gMoveingItem.ItemObject;
04165 
04166                   //if there is an owner of the item
04167                   if( gMoveingItem.ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem != -1 )
04168                   {
04169                         gpItemPointerSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( gMoveingItem.ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem, TRUE );
04170                         //make sure the soldier is not null
04171                         if( gpItemPointerSoldier == NULL )
04172                         {
04173                               gpItemPointerSoldier = gpSMCurrentMerc;
04174                         }
04175                   }
04176                   else
04177                         gpItemPointerSoldier = gpSMCurrentMerc;
04178 
04179 
04180                   break;
04181 
04182 
04183             case PLAYERS_INVENTORY:
04184                   // better be a valid merc pocket index, or -1
04185                   Assert( ( bSlotNum >= -1 ) && ( bSlotNum < NUM_INV_SLOTS ) );
04186 
04187                   // if we're supposed to store the original pocket #, but that pocket still holds more of these
04188                   if ( ( bSlotNum != -1 ) && ( gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ bSlotNum ].ubNumberOfObjects > 0 ) )
04189                   {
04190                         // then we can't store the pocket #, because our system can't return stacked objects
04191                         bSlotNum = -1;
04192                   }
04193 
04194                   // First try to evaluate the item immediately like any other left-click on a merc's inventory slot would be.  Only
04195                   // if that doesn't work (because there isn't enough room in the player's offer area), the item is picked up into
04196                   // the cursor, and may then get placed into the player's offer area directly, but it will NOT get evaluated that
04197                   // way, and so has no possibility of entering the dealer's inventory (where complex items aren't permitted).
04198                   if ( fOfferToDealerFirst && OfferObjectToDealer( gpItemPointer, gpSMCurrentMerc->ubProfile, bSlotNum ) )
04199                   {
04200                         //Reset the cursor
04201                         SetSkiCursor( CURSOR_NORMAL );
04202                   }
04203                   else  // not supposed to offer it, or dealer has no more room
04204                   {
04205                         // store the current contents of the cursor in a temporary object structure.
04206                         // We have to do this before memsetting gMoveingItem, 'cause during swaps, gpItemPointer == &gMoveingItem.ItemObject!
04207                         CopyObj( gpItemPointer, &TempObject );
04208 
04209                         //ARM: The memset was previously commented out, in order to preserve the owning merc's inv slot # during a swap of
04210                         // items in an inventory slot.  However, that leads to other bugs: if you picked the thing you're swapping in from
04211                         // a restricted inv slot (headgear, vest, etc.), the item swapped out will end up belonging to an illegal slot, and
04212                         // return there with a right click on it in the player's offer area.  So now ALL items picked up here are unowned.
04213                         memset( &gMoveingItem, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
04214 
04215                         //Get the item from the pointer
04216                         memcpy( &gMoveingItem.ItemObject, &TempObject, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04217 
04218                         gMoveingItem.fActive = TRUE;
04219                         gMoveingItem.sItemIndex = TempObject.usItem;
04220                         gMoveingItem.ubLocationOfObject = ubSource;
04221 
04222                         // By necessity, these items don't belong to a slot (so you can't return them via a right click),
04223                         // because it would be too much work to handle attachments, members of a stack, or even items swapped out of slots.
04224                         gMoveingItem.ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem = gpSMCurrentMerc->ubProfile;
04225                         gMoveingItem.bSlotIdInOtherLocation = bSlotNum;
04226 
04227                         //Restrict the cursor to the players offer area and the players inventory
04228                         Rect.iLeft = 0;//SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_X;
04229                         Rect.iTop = SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_Y;
04230                         Rect.iRight = SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_X + SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_WIDTH;
04231                         Rect.iBottom = SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_Y + SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_HEIGHT;
04232 
04233                         gpItemPointer = &gMoveingItem.ItemObject;
04234                         gpItemPointerSoldier = gpSMCurrentMerc;
04235                   }
04236 
04237                   break;
04238       }
04239 
04240       // if we have something in hand
04241       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
04242       {
04243             //make sure the soldier is not null
04244             Assert( gpItemPointerSoldier != NULL );
04245 
04246             // Set mouse
04247             SetSkiCursor( EXTERN_CURSOR );
04248 
04249             //Enable the region that limits the movement of the cursor with the item
04250             MSYS_EnableRegion( &gSkiInventoryMovementAreaMouseRegions );
04251 
04252             RestrictMouseCursor( &Rect );
04253 
04254             DisableAllDealersInventorySlots();
04255 
04256             if ( ubSource != ARMS_DEALER_OFFER_AREA )
04257             {
04258                   DisableAllDealersOfferSlots();
04259             }
04260 
04261             gfResetShopKeepIdleQuote = TRUE;
04262       }
04263 
04264       gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
04265 }
04266 
04267 
04268 void RestrictSkiMouseCursor()
04269 {
04270       SGPRect                 Rect;
04271 
04272       Rect.iLeft = 0;//SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_X;
04273       Rect.iTop = SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_Y;
04274       Rect.iRight = SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_X + SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_WIDTH;
04275       Rect.iBottom = SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_Y + SKI_ITEM_MOVEMENT_AREA_HEIGHT;
04276 
04277       RestrictMouseCursor( &Rect );
04278 }
04279 
04280 
04281 void SetSkiCursor( UINT16     usCursor )
04282 {
04283       UINT8 ubCnt;
04284 
04285       //if we are setting up an item as a cursor
04286       if( usCursor == EXTERN_CURSOR )
04287       {
04288 //          EnableSMPanelButtons( FALSE, FALSE );
04289 
04290             // if the current merc is in range
04291             if( !gfSMDisableForItems )
04292             {
04293                   // hatch out unavailable merc inventory slots
04294                   ReevaluateItemHatches( gpSMCurrentMerc, FALSE );
04295             }
04296 
04297             // Set mouse
04298             guiExternVo = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( &(Item[ gMoveingItem.sItemIndex ]) );
04299             gusExternVoSubIndex = Item[ gMoveingItem.sItemIndex ].ubGraphicNum;
04300             SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( EXTERN_CURSOR );
04301 
04302             MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gSMPanelRegion, usCursor ); 
04303 
04304             MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gSKI_EntireScreenMouseRegions, usCursor );    
04305 
04306             MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gArmsDealersDropItemToGroundMouseRegions, usCursor );     
04307 
04308             MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( usCursor );
04309 
04310             //if the item desc window is up
04311             if( gInvDesc.uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_EXISTS )
04312                   MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gInvDesc, usCursor ); 
04313 
04314             for( ubCnt = 0; ubCnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; ubCnt++)
04315             {
04316                   if( gItemDescAttachmentRegions[ubCnt].uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_EXISTS )
04317                         MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gItemDescAttachmentRegions[ubCnt], usCursor );      
04318             }
04319 
04320             for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; ubCnt++)
04321             {
04322                   MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gPlayersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ ubCnt], usCursor ); 
04323                   MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gPlayersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt], usCursor );    
04324 
04325                   MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gDealersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ ubCnt], usCursor );
04326 
04327                   //if the dealer repairs
04328                   if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
04329                   {
04330                         MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gDealersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt], usCursor );
04331                   }
04332             }
04333 
04334             MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gSkiInventoryMovementAreaMouseRegions, usCursor );
04335       }
04336 
04337       //else we are restoring the old cursor
04338       else
04339       {
04340             memset( &gMoveingItem, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
04341 
04342 //          gpSkiItemPointer = NULL;
04343             gpItemPointer = NULL;
04344 
04345             DisableTacticalTeamPanelButtons( FALSE );
04346 
04347 //          EnableSMPanelButtons( TRUE, FALSE );
04348 //          CheckForDisabledForGiveItem( );
04349 
04350             // if the current merc is in range
04351             if( !gfSMDisableForItems )
04352             {
04353                   // make all merc inventory slots available again
04354                   ReevaluateItemHatches( gpSMCurrentMerc, TRUE );
04355             }
04356 
04357             MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gSMPanelRegion, usCursor ); 
04358 
04359             MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gSKI_EntireScreenMouseRegions, usCursor );    
04360 
04361             MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gArmsDealersDropItemToGroundMouseRegions, usCursor );     
04362 
04363             for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; ubCnt++)
04364             {
04365                   MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gPlayersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], usCursor );      
04366                   MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gPlayersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], usCursor );   
04367 
04368                   MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gDealersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], usCursor );
04369 
04370                   //if the dealer repairs
04371                   if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
04372                   {
04373                         MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gDealersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubCnt ], usCursor );
04374                   }
04375             }
04376 
04377             //if the item desc window is up
04378             if( gInvDesc.uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_EXISTS )
04379                   MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gInvDesc, usCursor ); 
04380 
04381             for( ubCnt = 0; ubCnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; ubCnt++)
04382             {
04383                   if( gItemDescAttachmentRegions[ubCnt].uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_EXISTS )
04384                         MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gItemDescAttachmentRegions[ubCnt], usCursor );      
04385             }
04386 
04387 
04388             MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gSkiInventoryMovementAreaMouseRegions, usCursor );
04389 
04390             MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( usCursor );
04391 
04392             SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( usCursor );
04393 
04394             FreeMouseCursor();
04395 
04396             EnableAllDealersInventorySlots();
04397             EnableAllDealersOfferSlots();
04398 
04399             //Disable the region that limits the movement of the cursor with the item
04400             MSYS_DisableRegion( &gSkiInventoryMovementAreaMouseRegions );
04401       }
04402 
04403       SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( usCursor );
04404 
04405       // make sure disabled slot hatching gets updated when items picked up / dropped
04406       gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
04407 }
04408 
04409 
04410 INT8 AddInventoryToSkiLocation( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT *pInv, UINT8 ubSpotLocation, UINT8 ubWhere )
04411 {
04412       INT8 bSlotAddedTo = -1;
04413 
04414 
04415       switch( ubWhere )
04416       {
04417             case ARMS_DEALER_INVENTORY:
04418             case PLAYERS_INVENTORY:
04419                   // not used this way
04420                   Assert( 0 );
04421                   return( bSlotAddedTo );
04422                   break;
04423 
04424             case ARMS_DEALER_OFFER_AREA:
04425 
04426                   //If we can add the item into the slot that was clicked on
04427                   if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSpotLocation ].fActive == FALSE )
04428                   {
04429                         memcpy( &ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSpotLocation ], pInv, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
04430                         IfMercOwnedCopyItemToMercInv( pInv );
04431 
04432                         SetSkiRegionHelpText( &ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSpotLocation ], &gDealersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ ubSpotLocation ], ARMS_DEALER_OFFER_AREA );
04433                         SetSkiFaceRegionHelpText( &ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubSpotLocation ], &gDealersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubSpotLocation ], ARMS_DEALER_OFFER_AREA );
04434 
04435                         bSlotAddedTo = ubSpotLocation;
04436                   }
04437                   else
04438                   {
04439                         bSlotAddedTo = AddItemToArmsDealerOfferArea( pInv, -1 );
04440                   }
04441                   break;
04442 
04443             case PLAYERS_OFFER_AREA:
04444 
04445                   //If we can add the item into the slot that was clicked on
04446                   if( PlayersOfferArea[ ubSpotLocation ].fActive == FALSE )
04447                   {
04448                         // put it down in that player offer area slot
04449                         memcpy( &PlayersOfferArea[ ubSpotLocation ], pInv, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
04450                         IfMercOwnedCopyItemToMercInv( pInv );
04451 
04452                         //if the item is money
04453                         if( Item[ PlayersOfferArea[ ubSpotLocation ].sItemIndex ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
04454                         {
04455                               //Since money is always evaluated
04456                               PlayersOfferArea[ ubSpotLocation ].uiFlags |= ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_VALUE;
04457                               PlayersOfferArea[ ubSpotLocation ].uiItemPrice = PlayersOfferArea[ ubSpotLocation ].ItemObject.uiMoneyAmount;
04458                         }
04459 
04460                         SetSkiRegionHelpText( &PlayersOfferArea[ ubSpotLocation ], &gPlayersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ ubSpotLocation ], PLAYERS_OFFER_AREA );
04461                         SetSkiFaceRegionHelpText( &PlayersOfferArea[ ubSpotLocation ], &gPlayersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ ubSpotLocation ], PLAYERS_OFFER_AREA );
04462 
04463                         bSlotAddedTo = ubSpotLocation;
04464                   }
04465 //                else if( )
04466 //                {
04467                         //check to see the type we are adding is the same as the type that is already there
04468 //                }
04469                   else  // that slot is full
04470                   {
04471                         // add it elsewhere
04472                         bSlotAddedTo = AddItemToPlayersOfferArea( pInv->ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem, pInv, pInv->bSlotIdInOtherLocation );
04473                   }
04474 
04475             break;
04476       }
04477 
04478       //Redraw the screen
04479       gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL1;
04480       gfResetShopKeepIdleQuote = TRUE;
04481       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
04482 
04483       return( bSlotAddedTo );
04484 }
04485 
04486 
04487 void DisplayTalkingArmsDealer()
04488 {
04489       static BOOLEAN    fWasTheMercTalking= FALSE;
04490 //    static UINT32           uiLastTime=0;
04491 //    UINT32                              uiCurTime = GetJA2Clock();
04492 //    static      UINT32      uiMinimumLengthForTalkingText;
04493 
04494 
04495       //Make sure the Dealers doesn't get disabled
04496       gFacesData[ giShopKeeperFaceIndex ].fDisabled = FALSE;
04497 
04498       HandleDialogue();
04499 
04500       //Gets handled when we render the tactical interface
04501       HandleAutoFaces( );
04502 
04503       HandleTalkingAutoFaces( );
04504       HandleShopKeeperDialog( 0 );
04505 
04506 
04507       gfIsTheShopKeeperTalking = gFacesData[ giShopKeeperFaceIndex ].fTalking;
04508 
04509       //if the merc just started talking
04510 //    if( gfIsTheShopKeeperTalking && !fWasTheMercTalking )
04511       {
04512 
04513       }
04514 
04515       //if the merc is talking
04516       if( gfIsTheShopKeeperTalking )
04517             fWasTheMercTalking = TRUE;
04518 
04519       //if the merc just finished talking
04520       if( !gfIsTheShopKeeperTalking && fWasTheMercTalking )
04521       {
04522             RemoveShopKeeperSubTitledText();
04523             fWasTheMercTalking = FALSE;
04524       }
04525 }
04526 
04527 
04528 void HandleShopKeeperDialog( UINT8 ubInit )
04529 {
04530       UINT32      uiCurTime = GetJA2Clock();
04531 
04532       static      UINT32      uiLastTime = 0;
04533       static      UINT32      uiLastTimeSpoke = 0;
04534       static      INT8        bSpeech = -1;
04535 
04536 
04537       if( ubInit >= 1 )
04538       {
04539             uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
04540       }
04541 
04542       if( ubInit == 1 )
04543       {
04544             // special: if it's Arnie, and we have stuff in for repairs, but it's not fixed yet, use a different opening quote!
04545             if ( ( gbSelectedArmsDealerID == ARMS_DEALER_ARNIE ) && RepairmanIsFixingItemsButNoneAreDoneYet( ARNIE ) )
04546             {
04547                   bSpeech = ARNIE_QUOTE_NOT_REPAIRED_YET;
04548             }
04549             // if repairs were delayed
04550             if ( gfStartWithRepairsDelayedQuote )
04551             {
04552                   bSpeech = FREDO_PERKO_SORRY_REPAIR_DELAYED;
04553                   gfStartWithRepairsDelayedQuote = FALSE;
04554 
04555                   // treat this as having done business - the player WAS here for a good reason, and it's the dealers fault...
04556                   gfDoneBusinessThisSession = TRUE;
04557             }
04558             else
04559             {
04560                   bSpeech = SK_QUOTES_PLAYER_FIRST_ENTERS_SKI;
04561             }
04562             return;
04563       }
04564 
04565 
04566       //if its the first time in
04567       if( bSpeech != -1 )
04568       {
04569             if( ( uiCurTime - uiLastTime ) > 800 )
04570             {
04571                   uiLastTimeSpoke = GetJA2Clock();
04572                   StartShopKeeperTalking( bSpeech );
04573                   bSpeech = -1;
04574                   uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
04575             }
04576       }
04577 
04578 
04579       //Handle Idle converstions
04580       if( gfIsTheShopKeeperTalking )
04581       {
04582             uiLastTime = uiCurTime;
04583       }
04584       //if the player has requested to leave
04585       else if( gfUserHasRequestedToLeave && ( giShopKeepDialogueEventinProgress == -1 ) )
04586       {
04587             // to see if the player has finished talking
04588             if( !gFacesData[ giShopKeeperFaceIndex ].fTalking )
04589             {
04590                   SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SHOPKEEPER, 5, 0, 0, giShopKeeperFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_SHOPKEEPER_UI );
04591             }
04592 
04593             DealWithItemsStillOnTheTable();
04594       }
04595       else
04596       {
04597             // Determine if the shopkeeper should say a quote
04598             if( ( uiCurTime - uiLastTime ) > ( guiRandomQuoteDelayTime + Random( guiRandomQuoteDelayTime ) ) )
04599             {
04600                   //Only say it occasionally
04601                   if( Chance ( 35 ) )
04602                   {
04603                         INT16 sRandomQuoteToUse = -1;
04604 
04605                         // first check if one of the situation warrants one of the more precise quotes
04606 
04607                         //if the dealer repairs
04608                         if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
04609                         {
04610                               // if there are items in the arms dealer's offer area (must be awaiting repairs)
04611                               if ( CountNumberOfItemsInTheArmsDealersOfferArea() > 0)
04612                               {
04613                                     sRandomQuoteToUse = SK_QUOTES_RANDOM_QUOTE_WHILE_ITEMS_CHOSEN_TO_SELL_OR_REPAIR;
04614                               }
04615                         }
04616                         else  // non-repairman
04617                         {
04618                               // if there is any items in the player's area with value to this dealer other than just money
04619                               if ( ( CalculateTotalPlayersValue() - CalculateHowMuchMoneyIsInPlayersOfferArea( ) ) > 0 )
04620                               {
04621                                     // if the player has also selected some items for purchase
04622                                     if ( CountNumberOfItemsInTheArmsDealersOfferArea() > 0 )
04623                                     {
04624                                           sRandomQuoteToUse = SK_QUOTES_RANDOM_QUOTE_WHILE_ITEMS_CHOSEN_TO_TRADE;
04625                                     }
04626                                     else
04627                                     {
04628                                           sRandomQuoteToUse = SK_QUOTES_RANDOM_QUOTE_WHILE_ITEMS_CHOSEN_TO_SELL_OR_REPAIR;
04629                                     }
04630                               }
04631                         }
04632 
04633                         // if neither of the more precise quotes fit, or 33 percent of the time anyways
04634                         if ( ( sRandomQuoteToUse == -1 ) || Chance( 33 ) )
04635                         {
04636                               if( Chance ( 50 ) )
04637                                     sRandomQuoteToUse = SK_QUOTES_RANDOM_QUOTE_WHILE_PLAYER_DECIDING_1;
04638                               else
04639                                     sRandomQuoteToUse = SK_QUOTES_RANDOM_QUOTE_WHILE_PLAYER_DECIDING_2;
04640                         }
04641 
04642                         Assert( sRandomQuoteToUse != -1 );
04643                         Assert( sRandomQuoteToUse < NUM_COMMON_SK_QUOTES );
04644 
04645                         if ( !gfCommonQuoteUsedThisSession[ sRandomQuoteToUse ] )
04646                         {
04647                               StartShopKeeperTalking( (UINT16) sRandomQuoteToUse );
04648 
04649                               gfCommonQuoteUsedThisSession[ sRandomQuoteToUse ] = TRUE;
04650 
04651                               //increase the random quote delay
04652                               guiRandomQuoteDelayTime += SKI_DEALERS_RANDOM_QUOTE_DELAY_INCREASE_RATE; 
04653                         }
04654                   }
04655 
04656                   uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
04657             }
04658       }
04659 }
04660 
04661 
04662 
04663 BOOLEAN StartShopKeeperTalking( UINT16 usQuoteNum )
04664 {
04665       BOOLEAN fSuccess;
04666 
04667       // if already in the process of leaving, don't start any additional quotes
04668       if ( gfSKIScreenExit || gfRemindedPlayerToPickUpHisStuff || gfUserHasRequestedToLeave )
04669       {
04670             return( FALSE );
04671       }
04672 
04673       // post event to mark shopkeeper dialogue in progress
04674       SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SHOPKEEPER, 3, usQuoteNum, 0, giShopKeeperFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_SHOPKEEPER_UI );
04675 
04676       // post quote dialogue
04677       fSuccess = CharacterDialogue( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubShopKeeperID, usQuoteNum, giShopKeeperFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_SHOPKEEPER_UI, FALSE, FALSE );
04678 
04679       // post event to mark shopkeeper dialogue as ended
04680       SpecialCharacterDialogueEvent( DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SHOPKEEPER, 4, usQuoteNum, 0, giShopKeeperFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_SHOPKEEPER_UI );
04681 
04682       if ( !fSuccess )
04683       {
04684             return( FALSE );
04685       }
04686 
04687       gfResetShopKeepIdleQuote = TRUE;
04688       return( TRUE );
04689 }
04690 
04691 
04692 
04693 BOOLEAN IsGunOrAmmoOfSameTypeSelected( OBJECTTYPE     *pItemObject )
04694 {
04695       //if there is no item selected, return
04696       if( gpHighLightedItemObject == NULL )
04697             return( FALSE );
04698 
04699       //if the item is ammo
04700       if( Item[ gpHighLightedItemObject->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO )
04701       {
04702             //if there is a gun
04703             if( Item[ pItemObject->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN )
04704             {
04705                   //of the same caliber 
04706                   if( Weapon[ pItemObject->usItem ].ubCalibre == Magazine[ Item[ gpHighLightedItemObject->usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubCalibre )
04707                   {
04708                         return( TRUE );
04709                   }
04710             }
04711       }
04712 
04713       //else if the item is a gun
04714       else if( Item[ gpHighLightedItemObject->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN )
04715       {
04716             //if there is a gun
04717             if( Item[ pItemObject->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO )
04718             {
04719                   //of the same caliber 
04720                   if( Weapon[ gpHighLightedItemObject->usItem ].ubCalibre == Magazine[ Item[ pItemObject->usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubCalibre )
04721                   {
04722                         return( TRUE );
04723                   }
04724             }
04725       }
04726 
04727 
04728       //if the highlighted object is an attachment
04729 //    if( Item[ pItemObject->usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_ATTACHMENT )
04730       if( Item[ pItemObject->usItem ].attachment  )
04731       {
04732             if( ValidAttachment( pItemObject->usItem, gpHighLightedItemObject->usItem ) )
04733                   return( TRUE );
04734       }
04735       else
04736       {
04737             if( ValidAttachment( gpHighLightedItemObject->usItem, pItemObject->usItem ) )
04738                   return( TRUE );
04739       }
04740 
04741 
04742       return( FALSE );
04743 }
04744 
04745 void              InitShopKeeperSubTitledText( STR16 pString )
04746 {
04747       //Clear the contents of the subtitle text
04748       memset( gsShopKeeperTalkingText, 0, SKI_SUBTITLE_TEXT_SIZE );
04749 
04750 #ifdef TAIWANESE
04751       swprintf( gsShopKeeperTalkingText, L"%s", pString );
04752 #else
04753       swprintf( gsShopKeeperTalkingText, L"\"%s\"", pString );
04754 #endif
04755 
04756 
04757       //Now setup the popup box
04758       if( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SUBTITLES ] )
04759       {
04760             UINT16 usActualWidth=0;
04761             UINT16 usActualHeight=0;
04762 
04763     SET_USE_WINFONTS( TRUE );
04764     SET_WINFONT( giSubTitleWinFont ); 
04765 
04766       
04767             giPopUpBoxId = PrepareMercPopupBox( giPopUpBoxId, BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BACKGROUND, BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BORDER, gsShopKeeperTalkingText, 300, 0, 0, 0, &usActualWidth, &usActualHeight);
04768    
04769             SET_USE_WINFONTS( FALSE );
04770 
04771 //          gusPositionOfSubTitlesX = ( 640 - usActualWidth ) / 2 ;
04772             //position it to start under the guys face
04773             
04774             gusPositionOfSubTitlesX = 13 + SCREEN_X_OFFSET;
04775 
04776             RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( giPopUpBoxId, gusPositionOfSubTitlesX, SKI_POSITION_SUBTITLES_Y, FRAME_BUFFER);
04777 
04778             //check to make sure the region is not already initialized
04779             if( !( gShopKeeperSubTitleMouseRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_EXISTS ) )
04780             {
04781                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gShopKeeperSubTitleMouseRegion, gusPositionOfSubTitlesX, SKI_POSITION_SUBTITLES_Y, (INT16)(gusPositionOfSubTitlesX + usActualWidth), (INT16)(SKI_POSITION_SUBTITLES_Y + usActualHeight), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
04782                                                              CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, ShopKeeperSubTitleRegionCallBack ); 
04783                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gShopKeeperSubTitleMouseRegion );
04784             }
04785 
04786             //redraw the screen
04787             gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
04788 
04789       }
04790 }
04791 
04792 void RemoveShopKeeperSubTitledText()
04793 {
04794       if( giPopUpBoxId == -1 )
04795             return;
04796 
04797       if( RemoveMercPopupBoxFromIndex( giPopUpBoxId ) )
04798       {
04799             giPopUpBoxId = -1;
04800             gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
04801 
04802             //Get rid of the subtitles region
04803             if( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SUBTITLES ] )
04804                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gShopKeeperSubTitleMouseRegion );
04805       }
04806 }
04807 
04808 BOOLEAN AreThereItemsInTheArmsDealersOfferArea( )
04809 {
04810       UINT8 ubCnt;
04811 
04812       //loop through the players offer area and see if there are any items there
04813       for( ubCnt = 0; ubCnt < SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; ubCnt++)
04814       {
04815             //if is an item here
04816             if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubCnt ].fActive )
04817             {
04818                   return( TRUE );
04819             }
04820       }
04821       return( FALSE );
04822 }
04823 
04824 BOOLEAN AreThereItemsInThePlayersOfferArea( )
04825 {
04826       UINT8 ubCnt;
04827 
04828       //loop through the players offer area and see if there are any items there
04829       for( ubCnt = 0; ubCnt < SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; ubCnt++)
04830       {
04831             //if is an item here
04832             if( PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].fActive )
04833             {
04834                   return( TRUE );
04835             }
04836       }
04837       return( FALSE );
04838 }
04839 
04840 //Mouse Call back for the Arms traders inventory slot
04841 void ShopKeeperSubTitleRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04842 {
04843       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
04844       {
04845       }
04846       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP || iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
04847       {
04848             ShutUpShopKeeper();
04849       }
04850 }
04851 
04852 //Mouse Call back for the Arms delaers face
04853 void SelectArmsDealersFaceRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04854 {
04855       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
04856       {
04857       }
04858       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP || iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
04859       {
04860             ShutUpShopKeeper();
04861       }
04862 }
04863 
04864 void ShutUpShopKeeper()
04865 {
04866 //    RemoveShopKeeperSubTitledText();
04867 
04868       ShutupaYoFace( giShopKeeperFaceIndex );
04869       gfIsTheShopKeeperTalking = FALSE;
04870 
04871       gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
04872 }
04873 
04874 
04875 
04876 UINT8 CountNumberOfValuelessItemsInThePlayersOfferArea( )
04877 {
04878       UINT8 ubCnt;
04879       UINT8 ubCount=0;
04880 
04881       //loop through the players offer area and see if there are any items there
04882       for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; ubCnt++)
04883       {
04884             //if is an item here
04885             if( PlayersOfferArea[ubCnt].fActive )
04886             {
04887                   //and if it has no value
04888                   if( !( PlayersOfferArea[ubCnt].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_VALUE ) )
04889                   {
04890                         ubCount++;
04891                   }
04892             }
04893       }
04894       return( ubCount );
04895 }
04896 
04897 UINT8 CountNumberOfItemsOfValueInThePlayersOfferArea( )
04898 {
04899       UINT8 ubCnt;
04900       UINT8 ubCount=0;
04901 
04902       //loop through the players offer area and see if there are any items there
04903       for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; ubCnt++)
04904       {
04905             //if is an item here
04906             if( PlayersOfferArea[ubCnt].fActive )
04907             {
04908                   //and if it has not been evaluated
04909                   if( PlayersOfferArea[ubCnt].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_VALUE )
04910                   {
04911                         ubCount++;
04912                   }
04913             }
04914       }
04915       return( ubCount );
04916 }
04917 
04918 
04919 UINT8 CountNumberOfItemsInThePlayersOfferArea( )
04920 {
04921       UINT8 ubCnt;
04922       UINT8 ubItemCount=0;
04923 
04924       //loop through the player's offer area and see if there are any items there
04925       for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; ubCnt++)
04926       {
04927             //if is an item here
04928             if( PlayersOfferArea[ubCnt].fActive )
04929             {
04930                   ubItemCount++;
04931             }
04932       }
04933       return( ubItemCount );
04934 }
04935 
04936 
04937 UINT8 CountNumberOfItemsInTheArmsDealersOfferArea( )
04938 {
04939       UINT8 ubCnt;
04940       UINT8 ubItemCount=0;
04941 
04942       //loop through the dealer's offer area and see if there are any items there
04943       for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; ubCnt++)
04944       {
04945             //if is an item here
04946             if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ubCnt].fActive )
04947             {
04948                   ubItemCount++;
04949             }
04950       }
04951       return( ubItemCount );
04952 }
04953 
04954 
04955 INT8 GetSlotNumberForMerc( UINT8 ubProfile )
04956 {
04957       INT8  bCnt;
04958 
04959       for( bCnt = 0; bCnt < gubNumberMercsInArray; bCnt++ )
04960       {
04961             if( gubArrayOfEmployedMercs[ bCnt ] == ubProfile )
04962                   return( bCnt );
04963       }
04964 
04965       // not found - not currently working for the player
04966       return( -1 );
04967 }
04968 
04969 
04970 void RenderSkiAtmPanel()
04971 {
04972 //    HVOBJECT    hPixHandle;
04973 
04974       //Get the Atm background panel graphic and blt it
04975 //    GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiSkiAtmImage );
04976 //    BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,SKI_ATM_PANEL_X, SKI_ATM_PANEL_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04977 }
04978 
04979 void CreateSkiAtmButtons()
04980 {
04981       UINT16      usPosX, usPosY;
04982       UINT8       ubCount=0;
04983       UINT8       ubCnt;
04984 
04985       guiSKI_AtmNumButtonImage                  = LoadButtonImage("INTERFACE\\TradeScreenAtm.sti", 1,2,-1,3,-1 );
04986       guiSKI_AtmOkButtonImage                   = UseLoadedButtonImage( guiSKI_AtmNumButtonImage, 4,5,-1,6,-1 );
04987       guiSKI_AtmSideMenuButtonImage = UseLoadedButtonImage( guiSKI_AtmNumButtonImage, 7,8,-1,9,-1 );
04988 
04989 
04990       //Create the number buttons
04991       usPosX = SKI_ATM_BUTTON_X;
04992       usPosY = SKI_ATM_BUTTON_Y;
04993       ubCount=0;
04994       for( ubCnt=SKI_ATM_1; ubCnt<=SKI_ATM_9;ubCnt++)
04995       {
04996             guiSKI_AtmButton[ubCnt] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiSKI_AtmNumButtonImage, SkiAtmText[ubCnt], SKI_ATM_BUTTON_FONT, 
04997                                                                                      SKI_ATM_BUTTON_COLOR, NO_SHADOW, 
04998                                                                                      SKI_ATM_BUTTON_COLOR, NO_SHADOW, 
04999                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
05000                                                                                      usPosX, usPosY, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+2,
05001                                                                                      DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnSKI_AtmButtonCallback );
05002             
05003             SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiSKI_AtmButton[ubCnt], DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED );
05004 
05005             MSYS_SetBtnUserData(guiSKI_AtmButton[ubCnt], 0, ubCnt );
05006             ubCount++;
05007 
05008             usPosX += SKI_ATM_NUM_BUTTON_WIDTH;
05009 
05010             if( ( ubCount % 3 ) == 0 )
05011             {
05012                   usPosX = SKI_ATM_BUTTON_X;
05013                   usPosY += SKI_ATM_BUTTON_HEIGHT;
05014             }
05015       }
05016 
05017       //Create the zero button
05018       usPosX = SKI_ATM_BUTTON_X;
05019       guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_0] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiSKI_AtmOkButtonImage, SkiAtmText[SKI_ATM_0], SKI_ATM_BUTTON_FONT, 
05020                                                                                SKI_ATM_BUTTON_COLOR, NO_SHADOW, 
05021                                                                                SKI_ATM_BUTTON_COLOR, NO_SHADOW, 
05022                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
05023                                                                                usPosX, usPosY, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+2,
05024                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnSKI_AtmButtonCallback );
05025       MSYS_SetBtnUserData(guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_0], 0, SKI_ATM_0 );
05026 
05027 
05028 
05029       //Create the ok button
05030       usPosX = SKI_ATM_BUTTON_X + SKI_ATM_NUM_BUTTON_WIDTH + 8;
05031       guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_OK] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiSKI_AtmOkButtonImage, SkiAtmText[SKI_ATM_OK], SKI_ATM_BUTTON_FONT, 
05032                                                                                SKI_ATM_BUTTON_COLOR, NO_SHADOW, 
05033                                                                                SKI_ATM_BUTTON_COLOR, NO_SHADOW, 
05034                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
05035                                                                                usPosX, usPosY, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+2,
05036                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnSKI_AtmButtonCallback );
05037       MSYS_SetBtnUserData(guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_OK], 0, SKI_ATM_OK );
05038 
05039 
05040       //Create the side menu text buttons
05041       usPosX = SKI_ATM_BUTTON_X + SKI_ATM_SIDE_MENU_PANEL_START_X;
05042       usPosY = SKI_ATM_BUTTON_Y;
05043       for( ubCnt=SKI_ATM_TAKE; ubCnt<=SKI_ATM_CLEAR;ubCnt++ )
05044       {
05045             guiSKI_AtmButton[ubCnt] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiSKI_AtmSideMenuButtonImage, SkiAtmText[ubCnt], SKI_ATM_BUTTON_FONT, 
05046                                                                                      SKI_ATM_BUTTON_COLOR, NO_SHADOW, 
05047                                                                                      SKI_ATM_BUTTON_COLOR, NO_SHADOW, 
05048                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
05049                                                                                      usPosX, usPosY, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+2,
05050                                                                                      DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnSKI_AtmButtonCallback );
05051 
05052             MSYS_SetBtnUserData(guiSKI_AtmButton[ubCnt], 0, ubCnt );
05053 
05054             usPosY += SKI_ATM_BUTTON_HEIGHT;
05055       }
05056 
05057       //Enable/disable the appropriate buttons
05058 //ATM:
05059 //    EnableDisableSkiAtmButtons();
05060 }
05061 
05062 
05063 void RemoveSkiAtmButtons()
05064 {
05065       UINT8       ubCnt;
05066 
05067       //Remove atm images
05068       UnloadButtonImage( guiSKI_AtmNumButtonImage );
05069       UnloadButtonImage( guiSKI_AtmOkButtonImage );
05070       UnloadButtonImage( guiSKI_AtmSideMenuButtonImage );
05071 
05072 
05073       //Remove the atm buttons
05074       for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<NUM_SKI_ATM_BUTTONS;ubCnt++)
05075       {
05076             RemoveButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[ubCnt] );
05077       }
05078 }
05079 
05080 
05081 void BtnSKI_AtmButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
05082 {
05083       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
05084       {
05085             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
05086             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
05087       }
05088       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
05089       {
05090             UINT8 ubButton = (UINT8) MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
05091             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
05092 
05093 //ATM:
05094 
05095 //          HandleSkiAtmPanelInput( ubButton );
05096 
05097             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
05098       }
05099 } 
05100 
05101 
05102 
05103 void HandleSkiAtmPanel( )
05104 {
05105       //Dispaly the appropriate text for the the curret atm mode
05106       HandleCurrentModeText( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode );
05107 
05108       //Display Atm transfer string
05109       DisplaySkiAtmTransferString();
05110 
05111       ToggleSkiAtmButtons();
05112 }
05113 
05114 void HandleSkiAtmPanelInput( UINT8  ubButtonPress )
05115 {
05116       //switch on the current mode
05117       switch( ubButtonPress )
05118       {
05119             case SKI_ATM_1:
05120             case SKI_ATM_2:
05121             case SKI_ATM_3:
05122             case SKI_ATM_4:
05123             case SKI_ATM_5:
05124             case SKI_ATM_6:
05125             case SKI_ATM_7:
05126             case SKI_ATM_8:
05127             case SKI_ATM_9:
05128             case SKI_ATM_0:
05129 
05130                   AddNumberToSkiAtm( ubButtonPress );
05131                   break;
05132 
05133 
05134             case SKI_ATM_OK:
05135             {
05136                   HandleAtmOK();
05137                   break;
05138             }
05139 
05140 
05141             case SKI_ATM_TAKE:
05142                   gubCurrentSkiAtmMode = SKI_ATM_TAKE_MODE;
05143                   EnableDisableSkiAtmButtons();
05144                   break;
05145 
05146 
05147             case SKI_ATM_GIVE:
05148                   gubCurrentSkiAtmMode = SKI_ATM_GIVE_MODE;
05149                   EnableDisableSkiAtmButtons();
05150                   break;
05151 
05152 
05153             case SKI_ATM_CANCEL:
05154                   memset( gzSkiAtmTransferString, 0, 32 );
05155                   gubCurrentSkiAtmMode = SKI_ATM_DISABLED_MODE;
05156                   EnableDisableSkiAtmButtons();
05157                   break;
05158 
05159 
05160             case SKI_ATM_CLEAR:
05161                   memset( gzSkiAtmTransferString, 0, 32 );
05162                   break;
05163 
05164             default:
05165                   Assert( 0 );
05166       }
05167 }
05168 
05169 
05170 void HandleAtmOK()
05171 {
05172       INT32 iAmountToTransfer;
05173       BOOLEAN fOkToClear=FALSE;
05174 
05175       //Get the amount to transfer
05176       swscanf( gzSkiAtmTransferString, L"%d", &iAmountToTransfer );
05177 
05178       if( iAmountToTransfer == 0 )
05179             return;
05180 
05181       //if we are in an error mode
05182       if( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode == SKI_ATM_ERR_TAKE_MODE )
05183             gubCurrentSkiAtmMode = SKI_ATM_TAKE_MODE;
05184       else if( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode == SKI_ATM_ERR_GIVE_MODE )
05185             gubCurrentSkiAtmMode = SKI_ATM_GIVE_MODE;
05186 
05187       //if we are in either the give or take mode, exit
05188       if( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode != SKI_ATM_TAKE_MODE && gubCurrentSkiAtmMode != SKI_ATM_GIVE_MODE )
05189             return;
05190 
05191 
05192       //if we are taking money
05193       if( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode == SKI_ATM_TAKE_MODE )
05194       {
05195             //are we trying to take more then the merc has
05196             if( iAmountToTransfer > GetFundsOnMerc( gpSMCurrentMerc ) )
05197             {
05198                   UINT32      uiFundsOnCurrentMerc = GetFundsOnMerc( gpSMCurrentMerc );
05199 
05200                   if( uiFundsOnCurrentMerc == 0 )
05201                         memset( gzSkiAtmTransferString, 0, 32 );
05202                   else
05203                   {
05204                         //Set the amount to transfer
05205                         swprintf( gzSkiAtmTransferString, L"%d", uiFundsOnCurrentMerc );
05206                   }
05207 
05208                   gubCurrentSkiAtmMode = SKI_ATM_ERR_TAKE_MODE;
05209                   HandleCurrentModeText( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode );
05210             }
05211             else
05212             {
05213                   TransferFundsFromMercToBank( gpSMCurrentMerc, iAmountToTransfer );
05214 
05215                   fOkToClear=TRUE;
05216             }
05217 
05218       }
05219       else if( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode == SKI_ATM_GIVE_MODE )
05220       {
05221             //are we tring to take more then we have?
05222             if( iAmountToTransfer > LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance )
05223             {
05224                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance == 0 )
05225                         memset( gzSkiAtmTransferString, 0, 32 );
05226                   else
05227                   {
05228                         //Set the amount to transfer
05229                         swprintf( gzSkiAtmTransferString, L"%d", LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance );
05230                   }
05231 
05232                   gubCurrentSkiAtmMode = SKI_ATM_ERR_GIVE_MODE;
05233                   HandleCurrentModeText( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode );
05234             }
05235             else
05236             {
05237                   TransferFundsFromBankToMerc( gpSMCurrentMerc, iAmountToTransfer );
05238 
05239                   fOkToClear=TRUE;
05240             }
05241       }
05242 
05243       if( fOkToClear )
05244       { 
05245             gubCurrentSkiAtmMode = SKI_ATM_DISABLED_MODE;
05246             EnableDisableSkiAtmButtons();
05247             memset( gzSkiAtmTransferString, 0, 32 );
05248       }
05249 
05250       //Redraw the screen
05251       gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
05252 }
05253 
05254 
05255 void AddNumberToSkiAtm( UINT8 ubNumber )
05256 {
05257       CHAR16      zTemp[16];
05258 
05259 
05260       //make sure to durt the panel
05261       gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
05262 
05263       //if the mode is an error mode
05264       if( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode == SKI_ATM_ERR_TAKE_MODE )
05265       {
05266             gubCurrentSkiAtmMode = SKI_ATM_TAKE_MODE;
05267             HandleCurrentModeText( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode );
05268       }
05269       //else if the mode was 
05270       else if( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode == SKI_ATM_ERR_GIVE_MODE )
05271       {
05272             gubCurrentSkiAtmMode = SKI_ATM_GIVE_MODE;
05273             HandleCurrentModeText( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode );
05274       }
05275 
05276 
05277       //if we are not in the correct mode, return
05278       if( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode != SKI_ATM_TAKE_MODE && gubCurrentSkiAtmMode != SKI_ATM_GIVE_MODE )
05279             return;
05280 
05281       //make sure we arent going over the numbers max size
05282       if( wcslen( gzSkiAtmTransferString ) >= 9 )
05283             return;
05284 
05285       //if its the first number being added and the number is a zero
05286       if( gzSkiAtmTransferString[0] == L'\0' && ubNumber == SKI_ATM_0 )
05287             return;
05288 
05289       swprintf( zTemp, L"%d", ubNumber );
05290 
05291       //add the number to the current amount
05292       wcscat( gzSkiAtmTransferString, zTemp );
05293 }
05294 
05295 
05296 void DisplaySkiAtmTransferString()
05297 {
05298       CHAR16 zSkiAtmTransferString[ 32 ];
05299       UINT32      uiMoney;
05300 
05301       //Erase the background behind the string
05302       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, SKI_TRANSFER_STRING_X, SKI_TRANSFER_STRING_Y, SKI_TRANSFER_STRING_X+SKI_TRANSFER_STRING_WIDTH,   SKI_TRANSFER_STRING_Y+SKI_TRANSFER_STRING_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
05303 
05304       wcscpy( zSkiAtmTransferString, gzSkiAtmTransferString );
05305       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( zSkiAtmTransferString );
05306       InsertDollarSignInToString( zSkiAtmTransferString );
05307       
05308 
05309       //Display the transfer string
05310       DrawTextToScreen( zSkiAtmTransferString, SKI_TRANSFER_STRING_X, SKI_TRANSFER_STRING_Y, SKI_TRANSFER_STRING_WIDTH, SKI_ATM_BUTTON_FONT, FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );      
05311 
05312 
05313       //
05314       //Get and Display the money on the merc
05315       //
05316       uiMoney = GetFundsOnMerc( gpSMCurrentMerc );
05317 
05318       swprintf( zSkiAtmTransferString, L"%d", uiMoney );
05319 
05320       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( zSkiAtmTransferString );
05321       InsertDollarSignInToString( zSkiAtmTransferString );
05322             
05323       DrawTextToScreen( zSkiAtmTransferString, SKI_TRANSFER_STRING_X, SKI_MERCS_MONEY_Y, SKI_TRANSFER_STRING_WIDTH, SKI_ATM_BUTTON_FONT, FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );    
05324 }
05325 
05326 
05327 
05328 void EnableDisableSkiAtmButtons()
05329 {
05330       UINT8 ubCnt;
05331 
05332       switch( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode )
05333       {
05334             case SKI_ATM_DISABLED_MODE:
05335 
05336                   //Disable number positions
05337                   for( ubCnt=SKI_ATM_0; ubCnt<=SKI_ATM_9; ubCnt++)
05338                         DisableButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[ubCnt] );
05339 
05340                   DisableButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_OK] );
05341                   DisableButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_CANCEL] );
05342                   DisableButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_CLEAR] );
05343 
05344                   EnableButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[ SKI_ATM_TAKE ] );
05345                   EnableButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[ SKI_ATM_GIVE ] );
05346 
05347 
05348                   break;
05349 
05350             case SKI_ATM_TAKE_MODE:
05351 
05352                   //Make sure the numbers are not disbaled
05353                   for( ubCnt=SKI_ATM_0; ubCnt<=SKI_ATM_9; ubCnt++)
05354                         EnableButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[ubCnt] );
05355 
05356 
05357                   //enable other
05358                   EnableButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_OK] );
05359                   EnableButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_CANCEL] );
05360                   EnableButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_CLEAR] );
05361 
05362 
05363                   break;
05364 
05365 
05366             case SKI_ATM_GIVE_MODE:
05367 
05368                   //Make sure the numbers are not disbaled
05369                   for( ubCnt=SKI_ATM_0; ubCnt<=SKI_ATM_9; ubCnt++)
05370                         EnableButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[ubCnt] );
05371 
05372                   EnableButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_OK] );
05373                   EnableButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_CANCEL] );
05374                   EnableButton( guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_CLEAR] );
05375 
05376 
05377 
05378                   break;
05379 
05380             default:
05381                   Assert( 0 );
05382                   break;
05383       }
05384 }
05385 
05386 
05387 
05388 void HandleCurrentModeText( UINT8 ubMode )
05389 {
05390       CHAR16                              zTemp[128];
05391       CHAR16                              zMoney[128];
05392       static UINT32           uiLastTime=0;
05393       UINT32                              uiCurTime=GetJA2Clock();
05394       static UINT8            ubLastMode=0;
05395       static UINT8            ubDisplayMode=0;
05396 
05397       if( ubMode != ubLastMode )
05398       {
05399             uiLastTime = uiCurTime;
05400             ubLastMode = ubMode;
05401             ubDisplayMode = ubMode;
05402       }
05403       else
05404       {
05405             //if the current mode is an error mode
05406             if( ubLastMode != SKI_ATM_ERR_TAKE_MODE && ubLastMode != SKI_ATM_ERR_GIVE_MODE )
05407             {
05408                   //has the timer gone off?
05409                   if( ( uiCurTime - uiLastTime ) > DELAY_PER_MODE_CHANGE_IN_ATM )
05410                   {
05411                         //display the players current balance
05412 
05413                         //if the modes are the same, change to display the players balance
05414                         if( ubLastMode == ubMode )
05415                               if( ubMode == ubDisplayMode )
05416                                     ubMode = SKI_ATM_DISPLAY_PLAYERS_BALANCE;
05417 
05418                         ubDisplayMode = ubMode;
05419 
05420                         uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
05421                   }
05422                   else
05423                         ubMode = ubDisplayMode;
05424             }
05425       }
05426 
05427       //if the current mode is an error mode
05428       if( ubLastMode == SKI_ATM_ERR_TAKE_MODE || ubLastMode == SKI_ATM_ERR_GIVE_MODE )
05429       {
05430             //if it is time to get rid of the error message
05431             if( ( uiCurTime - uiLastTime ) > DELAY_PER_MODE_CHANGE_IN_ATM )
05432             {
05433                   if( ubLastMode == SKI_ATM_ERR_TAKE_MODE )
05434                   {
05435                         ubLastMode = SKI_ATM_TAKE_MODE;
05436                         gubCurrentSkiAtmMode = ubLastMode;
05437                   }
05438                   else
05439                   {
05440                         ubLastMode = SKI_ATM_GIVE_MODE;
05441                         gubCurrentSkiAtmMode = ubLastMode;
05442                   }
05443             }
05444       }
05445       
05446       switch( ubMode )
05447       {
05448             case SKI_ATM_DISABLED_MODE:
05449                   wcscpy( zTemp, gzSkiAtmText[ SKI_ATM_MODE_TEXT_SELECT_MODE ] );
05450                   break;
05451 
05452             case SKI_ATM_TAKE_MODE:
05453                   //if the player has selected any money yet
05454                   if( gzSkiAtmTransferString[0] == L'\0' )
05455                         wcscpy( zTemp, gzSkiAtmText[ SKI_ATM_MODE_TEXT_ENTER_AMOUNT ] );
05456                   else
05457                         wcscpy( zTemp, gzSkiAtmText[ SKI_ATM_MODE_TEXT_SELECT_FROM_MERC ] );
05458                   break;
05459 
05460             
05461             case SKI_ATM_GIVE_MODE:
05462                   //if the player has selected any money yet
05463                   if( gzSkiAtmTransferString[0] == L'\0' )
05464                         wcscpy( zTemp, gzSkiAtmText[ SKI_ATM_MODE_TEXT_ENTER_AMOUNT ] );
05465                   else
05466                         wcscpy( zTemp, gzSkiAtmText[ SKI_ATM_MODE_TEXT_SELECT_TO_MERC ] );
05467                   break;
05468 
05469             case SKI_ATM_ERR_TAKE_MODE:
05470             case SKI_ATM_ERR_GIVE_MODE:
05471                   wcscpy( zTemp, gzSkiAtmText[ SKI_ATM_MODE_TEXT_SELECT_INUSUFFICIENT_FUNDS ] );
05472                   break;
05473 
05474             case SKI_ATM_DISPLAY_PLAYERS_BALANCE:
05475                   swprintf( zMoney, L"%d", LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance );
05476                   InsertCommasForDollarFigure( zMoney );
05477                   InsertDollarSignInToString( zMoney );
05478 
05479                   swprintf( zTemp, L"%s: %s", gzSkiAtmText[ SKI_ATM_MODE_TEXT_BALANCE ], zMoney );
05480                   break;
05481       }
05482 
05483       DisplayWrappedString( SKI_MODE_TEXT_X, SKI_MODE_TEXT_Y, SKI_MODE_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, SKI_ATM_BUTTON_FONT, FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, zTemp, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
05484 
05485       //invalidate the atm panel area
05486       InvalidateRegion( SKI_ATM_PANEL_X, SKI_ATM_PANEL_Y, SKI_ATM_PANEL_X+SKI_ATM_PANEL_WIDTH, SKI_ATM_PANEL_Y+SKI_ATM_PANEL_HEIGHT );
05487 }
05488 
05489 
05490 void  ToggleSkiAtmButtons()
05491 {
05492       switch( gubCurrentSkiAtmMode )
05493       {
05494             case SKI_ATM_DISABLED_MODE:
05495                   ButtonList[ guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_TAKE] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
05496                   ButtonList[ guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_GIVE] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
05497                   ButtonList[ guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_CANCEL] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
05498                   break;
05499             case SKI_ATM_TAKE_MODE:
05500             case SKI_ATM_ERR_TAKE_MODE:
05501                   ButtonList[ guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_GIVE] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
05502                   ButtonList[ guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_CANCEL] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
05503 
05504                   ButtonList[ guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_TAKE] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
05505                   break;
05506 
05507             case SKI_ATM_GIVE_MODE:
05508             case SKI_ATM_ERR_GIVE_MODE:
05509                   ButtonList[ guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_TAKE] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
05510                   ButtonList[ guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_CANCEL] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
05511 
05512                   ButtonList[ guiSKI_AtmButton[SKI_ATM_GIVE] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
05513                   break;
05514       }
05515 }
05516 
05517 void EnableDisableDealersInventoryPageButtons()
05518 {
05519       //if we are on the first page, disable the page up arrow
05520       if( gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage <= 1 )
05521       {
05522             DisableButton( guiSKI_InvPageUpButton );
05523       }
05524       else
05525       {
05526             EnableButton( guiSKI_InvPageUpButton );
05527       }
05528 
05529 
05530       //if we are on the last page, disable the page down button
05531       if( gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubCurrentPage == gSelectArmsDealerInfo.ubNumberOfPages )
05532       {
05533             DisableButton( guiSKI_InvPageDownButton );
05534       }
05535       else
05536       {
05537             EnableButton( guiSKI_InvPageDownButton );
05538       }
05539 }
05540 
05541 void EnableDisableEvaluateAndTransactionButtons()
05542 {
05543       UINT8 ubCnt;
05544       BOOLEAN     fItemsHere=FALSE;
05545       BOOLEAN     fItemEvaluated=FALSE;
05546       UINT32      uiArmsDealerTotalCost = CalculateTotalArmsDealerCost();
05547       UINT32      uiPlayersOfferAreaTotalCost = CalculateTotalPlayersValue();
05548       UINT32      uiPlayersOfferAreaTotalMoney = CalculateHowMuchMoneyIsInPlayersOfferArea( );
05549 
05550       
05551       //loop through the players offer area
05552       //loop through all the items in the players offer area and determine if they can be sold here.
05553       for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; ubCnt++)
05554       {
05555             //if there is an item here
05556             if( PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].fActive )
05557             {
05558                   fItemsHere = TRUE;
05559 
05560                   //if the item has value
05561                   if( PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_VALUE )
05562                   {
05563                         //if the item isnt money ( which is always evaluated )
05564                         if( Item[ PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].sItemIndex ].usItemClass != IC_MONEY )
05565                               fItemEvaluated = TRUE;
05566 
05567                         //else if it is not a repair dealer, and the item is money
05568                         else if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer != ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS && Item[ PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].sItemIndex ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
05569                               fItemEvaluated = TRUE;
05570                   }
05571             }
05572 
05573             //if the dealer is a repair dealer
05574             if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
05575             {
05576                   //if there is an item here, the item has to have been evaluated
05577                   if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ ubCnt ].fActive )
05578                   {
05579                         fItemEvaluated = TRUE;
05580                   }
05581             }
05582       }
05583 
05584 /*
05585 //Evaluate:
05586       //if there is an item present
05587       if( fItemsHere )
05588       {
05589             EnableButton( guiSKI_EvaluateButton );
05590       }
05591       else
05592       {
05593             DisableButton( guiSKI_EvaluateButton );
05594       }
05595 */
05596 
05597 
05598       //if there are evaluated items here
05599       if( fItemEvaluated )
05600       {
05601 //          //and if the players offer area value exceeds the shopkeeper's area
05602 //          if( uiPlayersOfferAreaTotalCost >= uiArmsDealerTotalCost )
05603                   EnableButton( guiSKI_TransactionButton );
05604 //          else
05605 //                DisableButton( guiSKI_TransactionButton );
05606 
05607 /*
05608             //if the only item in the players offer area is money, and there is nothing in the dealers offer area
05609             if( IsMoneyTheOnlyItemInThePlayersOfferArea( ) && uiArmsDealerTotalCost == 0 )
05610                   DisableButton( guiSKI_TransactionButton );
05611 */
05612 
05613             //If its a repair dealer, and there is no items in the Dealer Offer area, 
05614             if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS && 
05615                         CountNumberOfItemsInTheArmsDealersOfferArea( ) == 0 &&
05616                         uiPlayersOfferAreaTotalMoney < uiArmsDealerTotalCost
05617                   )
05618                   DisableButton( guiSKI_TransactionButton );
05619       }
05620       //else if there is 
05621       else if( uiArmsDealerTotalCost != 0 )
05622       {
05623             EnableButton( guiSKI_TransactionButton );
05624       }
05625       else
05626       {
05627             DisableButton( guiSKI_TransactionButton );
05628       }
05629 
05630 
05631       if( uiArmsDealerTotalCost > uiPlayersOfferAreaTotalCost + LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance )
05632       {
05633             DisableButton( guiSKI_TransactionButton );
05634       }
05635 /* Allow transaction attempt when dealer can't afford to buy that much - he'll reject it with a special quote!
05636       else if( ( gArmsDealerStatus[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].uiArmsDealersCash + uiArmsDealerTotalCost ) < ( uiPlayersOfferAreaTotalCost - uiPlayersOfferAreaTotalMoney ) )
05637       {
05638             DisableButton( guiSKI_TransactionButton );
05639       }
05640 */
05641       else if( ( uiPlayersOfferAreaTotalCost == uiPlayersOfferAreaTotalMoney ) && ( uiPlayersOfferAreaTotalMoney > 0 ) && ( uiArmsDealerTotalCost == 0 ) )
05642       {
05643             DisableButton( guiSKI_TransactionButton );
05644       }
05645 
05646 
05647       //if the player is currently moving an item, disable the transaction button
05648       if( gMoveingItem.sItemIndex != 0 )
05649       {
05650 //Evaluate:
05651 //          DisableButton( guiSKI_EvaluateButton );
05652             DisableButton( guiSKI_TransactionButton );
05653             DisableButton( guiSKI_DoneButton );
05654       }
05655       else
05656       {
05657             EnableButton( guiSKI_DoneButton );
05658       }
05659 
05660 
05661 //ARM: Always permit trying bribes, even if they don't work on a given dealer!
05662       // if the arms dealer is the kind of person who accepts gifts, and there is stuff to take
05663 //    if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].uiFlags & ARMS_DEALER_ACCEPTS_GIFTS )
05664       {
05665             //if the player is giving the dealer money, without buying anything
05666             if( IsMoneyTheOnlyItemInThePlayersOfferArea( ) && CountNumberOfItemsInTheArmsDealersOfferArea( ) == 0 )
05667             {
05668                   EnableButton( guiSKI_TransactionButton );
05669             }
05670       }
05671 
05672       if( gfUserHasRequestedToLeave )
05673             DisableButton( guiSKI_TransactionButton );
05674 
05675 
05676       //if the player is in the item desc for the arms dealer items
05677       if( InItemDescriptionBox( ) && pShopKeeperItemDescObject != NULL )
05678       {
05679             ButtonList[ guiSKI_TransactionButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
05680             ButtonList[ guiSKI_DoneButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
05681       }
05682       else
05683       {
05684             ButtonList[ guiSKI_TransactionButton ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
05685             ButtonList[ guiSKI_DoneButton ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
05686       }
05687 
05688 
05689 }
05690 
05691 
05692 void AddItemToPlayersOfferAreaAfterShopKeeperOpen( OBJECTTYPE     *pItemObject, INT8 bPreviousInvPos )
05693 {
05694       gItemToAdd.fActive                                    = TRUE;
05695       memcpy( &gItemToAdd.ItemObject, pItemObject, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
05696       gItemToAdd.bPreviousInvPos    = bPreviousInvPos;
05697 }
05698 
05699 
05700 BOOLEAN IsMoneyTheOnlyItemInThePlayersOfferArea( )
05701 {
05702       UINT8 ubCnt;
05703       BOOLEAN fFoundMoney = FALSE;
05704 
05705       for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; ubCnt++)
05706       {
05707             //if there is an item here
05708             if( PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].fActive )
05709             {
05710                   if( Item[ PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].sItemIndex ].usItemClass != IC_MONEY )
05711                         return( FALSE );
05712                   else
05713                         fFoundMoney = TRUE;
05714             }
05715       }
05716 
05717       if ( fFoundMoney )
05718             Assert(     CalculateHowMuchMoneyIsInPlayersOfferArea() > 0 );
05719 
05720       // only return TRUE if there IS money in the POA
05721       return( fFoundMoney );
05722 }
05723 
05724 
05725 /*
05726 
05727 void MoveRepairEvaluatedPlayerOfferedItemsToArmsDealersOfferArea()
05728 {
05729       UINT32      uiCnt;
05730 
05731       //loop through all the slots in the players offer area
05732       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; uiCnt++)
05733       {
05734             //if there is an item here
05735             if( PlayersOfferArea[ uiCnt ].uiFlags & ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_VALUE )
05736             {
05737                   AddItemToArmsDealerOfferArea( &PlayersOfferArea[ uiCnt ], -1 );
05738             }
05739       }
05740 }
05741 
05742 */
05743 
05744 
05745 
05746 UINT32 CalculateHowMuchMoneyIsInPlayersOfferArea( )
05747 {
05748       UINT8 ubCnt;
05749       UINT32      uiTotalMoneyValue=0;
05750 
05751 
05752       for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; ubCnt++)
05753       {
05754             //if there is an item here
05755             if( PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].fActive )
05756             {
05757                   if( Item[ PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].sItemIndex ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
05758                   {
05759                         uiTotalMoneyValue += PlayersOfferArea[ ubCnt ].ItemObject.uiMoneyAmount;
05760                   }
05761             }
05762       }
05763 
05764       return( uiTotalMoneyValue );
05765 }
05766 
05767 
05768 
05769 void MovePlayersItemsToBeRepairedToArmsDealersInventory()
05770 {
05771       //for all items in the dealers items offer area
05772       UINT32      uiCnt;
05773       
05774       //loop through all the slots in the shopkeeper's offer area
05775       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; uiCnt++)
05776       {
05777             //if there is a item here
05778             if( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ uiCnt ].fActive )
05779             {
05780                   // NOTE:  Any items that make it into a repairman's dealer offer area are guaranteed to be:
05781                   //                      a) Repairable
05782                   //                      b) Actually damaged
05783                   //                      c) Already stripped of all attachments
05784                   //                      d) If a gun, stripped of any non-ammo-class GunAmmoItems, and bullets
05785 
05786                   // add it to the arms dealer's inventory
05787                   GiveObjectToArmsDealerForRepair( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, &( ArmsDealerOfferArea[ uiCnt ].ItemObject ), ArmsDealerOfferArea[ uiCnt ].ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem );
05788                   ArmsDealerOfferArea[ uiCnt ].sSpecialItemElement = gubLastSpecialItemAddedAtElement;
05789 
05790                   //Remove the item from the owner merc's inventory
