07576       //if we don't have an item, pick one up
07577       if( gMoveingItem.sItemIndex != 0 )
07578             return( TRUE );
07579       else
07580             return( FALSE );
07581 }
07582 
07583 void DisplayTheSkiDropItemToGroundString()
07584 {
07585       UINT16      usHeight;
07586 
07587       //get the height of the displayed text
07588       usHeight = DisplayWrappedString( SKI_DROP_ITEM_TO_GROUND_START_X, SKI_DROP_ITEM_TO_GROUND_TEXT_START_Y, (UINT16)(SCREEN_WIDTH-SKI_DROP_ITEM_TO_GROUND_START_X), 2, SKI_LABEL_FONT, SKI_TITLE_COLOR, SKI_Text[ SKI_TEXT_DROP_ITEM_TO_GROUND ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED | DONT_DISPLAY_TEXT );
07589 
07590       // WANNE 2 - not needed to show the string
07591       //display the 'drop item to ground' text
07592       //DisplayWrappedString( SKI_DROP_ITEM_TO_GROUND_START_X, (UINT16)(SKI_DROP_ITEM_TO_GROUND_TEXT_START_Y-usHeight), (UINT16)(SCREEN_WIDTH-SKI_DROP_ITEM_TO_GROUND_START_X), 2, SKI_LABEL_FONT, SKI_TITLE_COLOR, SKI_Text[ SKI_TEXT_DROP_ITEM_TO_GROUND ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED | INVALIDATE_TEXT );
07593 }
07594 
07595 
07596 
07597 UINT32 EvaluateInvSlot( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT *pInvSlot )
07598 {
07599       UINT32      uiEvalResult = EVAL_RESULT_NORMAL;
07600       FLOAT       dPriceModifier;
07601       UINT32      uiBuyingPrice;
07602 
07603 
07604       //if the dealer is Micky
07605       if( gbSelectedArmsDealerID == ARMS_DEALER_MICKY )
07606       {
07607             INT16 sSoldierID;
07608             sSoldierID = GetSoldierIDFromMercID( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubShopKeeperID );
07609             if( ( sSoldierID != -1 ) && ( GetDrunkLevel( &Menptr[ sSoldierID ] ) == DRUNK ) )
07610             {
07611                   //Micky is DRUNK, pays more!
07612                   dPriceModifier = ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].dSellModifier;
07613             }
07614             else
07615             {
07616                   // Micky isn't drunk, charge regular price
07617                   dPriceModifier = ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].dBuyModifier;
07618             }
07619       }
07620       else
07621       {
07622             dPriceModifier = ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].dBuyModifier;
07623       }
07624 
07625 
07626       // Calculate dealer's buying price for the item
07627       uiBuyingPrice = CalcShopKeeperItemPrice( DEALER_BUYING, FALSE, pInvSlot->sItemIndex, dPriceModifier, &( pInvSlot->ItemObject ) );
07628 
07629       pInvSlot->uiItemPrice = uiBuyingPrice;
07630 
07631       if ( uiBuyingPrice > 0 )
07632       {
07633             // check if the item is really badly damaged
07634             if( Item[ pInvSlot->sItemIndex ].usItemClass != IC_AMMO )
07635             {
07636                   if( pInvSlot->ItemObject.bStatus[ 0 ] < REALLY_BADLY_DAMAGED_THRESHOLD )
07637                   {
07638                         uiEvalResult = EVAL_RESULT_OK_BUT_REALLY_DAMAGED;
07639                   }
07640             }
07641 
07642             //the item can be sold here, so mark it as such
07643             pInvSlot->uiFlags |= ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_VALUE;
07644       }
07645       else
07646       {
07647             // he normally buys this, but it's in such bad shape that he won't, it's worthless (different quote)
07648             uiEvalResult = EVAL_RESULT_WORTHLESS;
07649 
07650             pInvSlot->uiFlags &= ~ARMS_INV_PLAYERS_ITEM_HAS_VALUE;
07651       }
07652 
07653       return( uiEvalResult );
07654 }
07655 
07656 
07657 
07658 // round off reapir times shown to the near quarter-hour
07659 #define REPAIR_MINUTES_INTERVAL     15
07660 
07661 
07662 void BuildRepairTimeString( wchar_t sString[], UINT32 uiTimeInMinutesToFixItem )
07663 {
07664       UINT16      usNumberOfHoursToFixItem = 0;
07665 
07666 
07667       // if it's 0, it shouldn't be up here any more!
07668       Assert ( uiTimeInMinutesToFixItem > 0 );
07669 
07670 
07671       // round off to next higher 15 minutes
07672       if ( ( uiTimeInMinutesToFixItem % REPAIR_MINUTES_INTERVAL ) > 0 )
07673       {
07674             uiTimeInMinutesToFixItem += REPAIR_MINUTES_INTERVAL - ( uiTimeInMinutesToFixItem % REPAIR_MINUTES_INTERVAL );
07675       }
07676 
07677       if ( uiTimeInMinutesToFixItem < REPAIR_MINUTES_INTERVAL )
07678       {
07679             uiTimeInMinutesToFixItem = REPAIR_MINUTES_INTERVAL;
07680       }
07681 
07682       // show up to 1.5 hrs in minutes
07683       if ( uiTimeInMinutesToFixItem <= 90 )
07684       {
07685             // show minutes
07686             swprintf( sString, SKI_Text[ SKI_TEXT_MINUTES ], uiTimeInMinutesToFixItem );
07687       }
07688       else
07689       {
07690             // show hours
07691 
07692             // round fractions of 15+ minutes up to next full hour
07693             usNumberOfHoursToFixItem = (UINT16) ( ( uiTimeInMinutesToFixItem + 45 ) / 60 );
07694 
07695             if ( usNumberOfHoursToFixItem > 1 )
07696             {
07697                   swprintf( sString, SKI_Text[ SKI_TEXT_PLURAL_HOURS ], usNumberOfHoursToFixItem );
07698             }
07699             else
07700             {
07701                   wcscpy( sString, SKI_Text[ SKI_TEXT_ONE_HOUR ] );
07702             }
07703       }
07704 }
07705 
07706 
07707 
07708 void BuildDoneWhenTimeString( wchar_t sString[], UINT8 ubArmsDealer, UINT16 usItemIndex, UINT8 ubElement )
07709 {
07710       UINT32 uiDoneTime;
07711       UINT32 uiDay, uiHour, uiMin;
07712 
07713 
07714       //dealer must be a repair dealer
07715       Assert( DoesDealerDoRepairs( ubArmsDealer ) );
07716       // element index must be valid
07717       Assert( ubElement < gArmsDealersInventory[ ubArmsDealer ][ usItemIndex ].ubElementsAlloced );
07718       // that item must be active
07719       Assert( gArmsDealersInventory[ ubArmsDealer ][ usItemIndex ].SpecialItem[ ubElement ].fActive );
07720       // that item must be in repair
07721       Assert( gArmsDealersInventory[ ubArmsDealer ][ usItemIndex ].SpecialItem[ ubElement ].Info.bItemCondition < 0 );
07722 
07723       //if the item has already been repaired
07724       if( gArmsDealersInventory[ ubArmsDealer ][ usItemIndex ].SpecialItem[ ubElement ].uiRepairDoneTime <= GetWorldTotalMin() )
07725       {
07726             wcscpy( sString, L"" );
07727             return;
07728       }
07729 
07730       uiDoneTime = gArmsDealersInventory[ ubArmsDealer ][ usItemIndex ].SpecialItem[ ubElement ].uiRepairDoneTime;
07731 
07732       // round off to next higher 15 minutes
07733       if ( ( uiDoneTime % REPAIR_MINUTES_INTERVAL ) > 0 )
07734       {
07735             uiDoneTime += REPAIR_MINUTES_INTERVAL - ( uiDoneTime % REPAIR_MINUTES_INTERVAL );
07736       }
07737 
07738       // uiDoneTime is in minutes...
07739       uiDay  = ( uiDoneTime / NUM_MIN_IN_DAY );
07740       uiHour = ( uiDoneTime - ( uiDay * NUM_MIN_IN_DAY ) ) / NUM_MIN_IN_HOUR;
07741       uiMin  = uiDoneTime - ( ( uiDay * NUM_MIN_IN_DAY ) + ( uiHour * NUM_MIN_IN_HOUR ) );
07742 
07743       // only show day if it's gonna take overnight
07744       if ( GetWorldDay() != uiDay )
07745       {
07746             swprintf( sString, L"%s %d %02d:%02d", pDayStrings[ 0 ], uiDay, uiHour, uiMin );
07747       }
07748       else
07749       {
07750             swprintf( sString, L"%02d:%02d", uiHour, uiMin );
07751       }
07752 }
07753 
07754 
07755 void BuildItemHelpTextString( wchar_t sString[], INVENTORY_IN_SLOT *pInv, UINT8 ubScreenArea )
07756 {
07757       CHAR16 zHelpText[ 512 ];
07758       CHAR16 zRepairTime[ 64 ];
07759 
07760       if( pInv != NULL )
07761       {
07762             GetHelpTextForItem( (INT16 *)zHelpText, &( pInv->ItemObject ), NULL );
07763 
07764             // add repair time for items in a repairman's offer area
07765             if ( ( ubScreenArea == ARMS_DEALER_OFFER_AREA ) &&
07766                          ( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS ) )
07767             {
07768                   BuildRepairTimeString( zRepairTime, CalculateObjectItemRepairTime( gbSelectedArmsDealerID, &( pInv->ItemObject ) ) );
07769                   swprintf( sString, L"%s\n(%s: %s)", zHelpText, gzLateLocalizedString[ 44 ], zRepairTime );
07770             }
07771             else
07772             {
07773                   wcscpy( sString, zHelpText );
07774             }
07775       }
07776       else
07777       {
07778             sString[ 0 ] = '\0';
07779       }
07780 }
07781 
07782 
07783 
07784 void DisableAllDealersInventorySlots( void )
07785 {
07786       INT32 iCnt;
07787 
07788       for (iCnt = 0; iCnt < SKI_NUM_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_SLOTS; iCnt++)
07789       {
07790             MSYS_DisableRegion( &gDealersInventoryMouseRegions[ iCnt ] );
07791 
07792             //if the dealer repairs
07793             if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
07794             {
07795                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &gRepairmanInventorySmallFaceMouseRegions[ iCnt ] );
07796             }
07797       }
07798 }
07799 
07800 
07801 void EnableAllDealersInventorySlots( void )
07802 {
07803       INT32 iCnt;
07804 
07805       for (iCnt = 0; iCnt < SKI_NUM_ARMS_DEALERS_INV_SLOTS; iCnt++)
07806       {
07807             MSYS_EnableRegion( &gDealersInventoryMouseRegions[ iCnt ] );
07808 
07809             //if the dealer repairs
07810             if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
07811             {
07812                   MSYS_EnableRegion( &gRepairmanInventorySmallFaceMouseRegions[ iCnt ] );
07813             }
07814       }
07815 }
07816

07819 void DisableAllDealersOfferSlots( void )
07820 {

07822 
07823       for (iCnt = 0; iCnt < SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; iCnt++)

07826

07829             {
07830                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &gDealersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ iCnt ] );
07831             }
07832       }
07833 }

07835 
07836 void EnableAllDealersOfferSlots( void )
07837 {
07838       INT32 iCnt;
07839 
07840       for (iCnt = 0; iCnt < SKI_NUM_TRADING_INV_SLOTS; iCnt++)
07841       {
07842             MSYS_EnableRegion( &gDealersOfferSlotsMouseRegions[ iCnt ] );
07843 
07844             //if the dealer repairs
07845             if( ArmsDealerInfo[ gbSelectedArmsDealerID ].ubTypeOfArmsDealer == ARMS_DEALER_REPAIRS )
07846             {
07847                   MSYS_EnableRegion( &gDealersOfferSlotsSmallFaceMouseRegions[ iCnt ] );
07848             }
07849       }
07850 }
07851 
07852 
07853 
07854 void HatchOutInvSlot( UINT16 usPosX, UINT16 usPosY )
07855 {
07856       UINT16 usSlotX, usSlotY;
07857       UINT16 usSlotWidth, usSlotHeight;
07858 
07859       //if we are in the item desc panel
07860       if( InItemDescriptionBox( ) && pShopKeeperItemDescObject != NULL )
07861       {
07862             // do nothing, don't wanna shade things twice!
07863             return;
07864       }
07865 
07866       usSlotX = ( UINT16 ) ( usPosX - 1 );
07867       usSlotY = ( UINT16 ) ( usPosY - 1 );
07868       usSlotWidth = SKI_INV_SLOT_WIDTH;
07869       usSlotHeight = SKI_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT;
07870 
07871       //Hatch it out
07872       DrawHatchOnInventory( guiRENDERBUFFER, usSlotX, usSlotY, usSlotWidth, usSlotHeight );
07873       InvalidateRegion( usSlotX, usSlotY, usSlotX + usSlotWidth, usSlotY + usSlotHeight );
07874 }
Generated on Sat Sep 9 13:48:56 2006 for Build by  1.4.7
